atk-vin01a:470_0: Tena kho pana samayena thūpārāme aṭṭhasaṭṭhi bhikkhusahassāni sannipatiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:470_3: Atha kho mahāariṭṭhatthero mahindattherena ajjhiṭṭho attano anurūpena pattānukkamena dhammāsane nisīdi.
atk-vin01a:470_4: Mahindattherapamukhā aṭṭhasaṭṭhi mahātherā dhammāsanaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:470_5: Raññopi kaniṭṭhabhātā mattābhayatthero nāma “dhuraggāho hutvā vinayaṃ uggaṇhissāmī”ti pañcahi bhikkhusatehi
atk-vin01a:470_7: Avasesāpi bhikkhū sarājikā ca parisā attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:471_0: Athāyasmā mahāariṭṭhatthero tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūleti vinayanidānaṃ abhāsi.
atk-vin01a:471_1: Bhāsite ca panāyasmatā ariṭṭhattherena vinayanidāne ākāsaṃ mahāviravaṃ ravi.
atk-vin01a:471_5: Evaṃ anekesu pāṭihāriyesu vattamānesu āyasmā ariṭṭhatthero mahāmahindapamukhehi aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā paccekagaṇīhi
atk-vin01a:471_6: khīṇāsavamahātherehi tadaññehi ca aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusahassehi parivuto paṭhamakattikapavāraṇādivase thūpārāmavihāramajjhe
atk-vin01a:471_7: satthu karuṇāguṇadīpakaṃ bhagavato anusiṭṭhikarānaṃ kāyakammavacīkammavipphanditavinayanaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-vin01a:471_8: Pakāsetvā ca yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhamāno bahūnaṃ vācetvā bahūnaṃ hadaye patiṭṭhāpetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-vin01a:478_0: Tesaṃ parinibbānato aparabhāge aññepi tesaṃ therānaṃ antevāsikā tissadattakāḷasumana-
atk-vin01a:478_2: antevāsikānaṃ antevāsikā cāti evaṃ pubbe vuttappakārā ācariyaparamparā imaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ yāvajjatanā ānesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:479_0: “Tatiyasaṅgahato pana uddhaṃ imaṃ dīpaṃ mahindādīhi ābhataṃ,
atk-vin01a:479_1: mahindato uggahetvā kañci kālaṃ ariṭṭhattherādīhi ābhataṃ,
atk-vin01a:479_2: tato yāvajjatanā tesaṃyeva antevāsikaparamparabhūtāya ācariyaparamparāya ābhata”nti.
atk-vin01a:480_1: Yesaṃ pāḷito ca atthato ca anūnaṃ vattati,
atk-vin01a:480_4: mantesu lajjīsu kukkuccakesu sikkhākāmesu puggalesu patiṭṭhitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:480_5: Tasmā vinayapatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ vinayapariyattiyā ānisaṃsaṃ sallakkhetvā sikkhākāmena bhikkhunā vinayo pariyāpuṇitabbo.
atk-vin01a:481_1: vinayapariyattikusalo hi puggalo sāsane paṭiladdhasaddhānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ mātāpituṭṭhāniyo hoti,
atk-vin01a:481_2: tadāyattā hi nesaṃ pabbajjā upasampadā vattānuvattapaṭipatti ācāragocarakusalatā.
atk-vin01a:481_3: Api cassa vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito;
atk-vin01a:482_0: Ye cāpi saṃvaramūlakā kusalā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
atk-vin01a:483_0: Ettāvatā ca yā sā vinayasaṃvaṇṇanatthaṃ mātikā ṭhapitā tattha –
atk-vin01a:484_0: “Vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā, dhāritaṃ yena cābhataṃ;
atk-vin01a:486_0: Imissā tāva gāthāya attho pakāsito vinayassa ca bāhiranidānavaṇṇanā yathādhippāyaṃ saṃvaṇṇitā hotīti.
atk-vin01a:493_0: Vuttattā tena samayena buddho bhagavātiādīnaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-vin01a:493_3: Tassa sarūpena avuttenapi aparabhāge atthato siddhena yenāti iminā vacanena paṭiniddeso kātabbo.
atk-vin01a:493_4: Aparabhāge hi vinayapaññattiyācanahetubhūto āyasmato sāriputtassa parivitakko siddho.
atk-vin01a:493_5: Tasmā yena samayena so parivitakko udapādi,
atk-vin01a:493_6: tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:493_8: yadidaṃ yattha yattha “tenā”ti vuccati tattha tattha pubbe vā pacchā vā atthato siddhena “yenā”ti iminā vacanena paṭiniddeso kātabboti.
atk-vin01a:494_6: Evaṃ tāva pubbe atthato siddhena yenāti iminā vacanena paṭiniddeso yujjati.
atk-vin01a:494_7: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati,
atk-vin01a:494_8: yena samayena dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto rañño dārūni adinnaṃ ādiyīti evaṃ pacchā atthato siddhena yenāti
atk-vin01a:494_9: iminā vacanena paṭiniddeso yujjatīti vutto tenāti vacanassa attho.
atk-vin01a:496_0: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati.
atk-vin01a:497_1: “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu samavāyo attho.
atk-vin01a:497_4: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”ti evamādīsu khaṇo.
atk-vin01a:497_11: bhaddāli nāma bhikkhu satthusāsane sikkhāya aparipūrakārī’ti ayampi kho te, bhaddāli,
atk-vin01a:497_13: “Tena kho pana samayena uggahamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake
atk-vin01a:498_0: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-vin01a:500_2: “Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”ti evamādīsu paṭivedho attho.
atk-vin01a:500_4: Tasmā yena kālena āyasmato sāriputtassa vinayapaññattiyācanahetubhūto parivitakko udapādi,
atk-vin01a:501_1: “atha kasmā yathā suttante ‘ekaṃ samaya’nti upayogavacanena niddeso kato,
atk-vin01a:501_3: tathā akatvā idha ‘tena samayenā’ti karaṇavacanena niddeso kato”ti?
atk-vin01a:501_7: Yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā brahmajālādīni suttantāni desesi,
atk-vin01a:501_10: Abhidhamme ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho ca sambhavati.
atk-vin01a:501_12: tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhiyati.
atk-vin01a:501_13: Tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ tattha bhummavacanena niddeso kato.
atk-vin01a:501_14: Idha pana hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati.
atk-vin01a:501_15: Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi dubbiññeyyo,
atk-vin01a:501_16: tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi;
atk-vin01a:501_17: tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ idha karaṇavacanena niddeso katoti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:503_0: Aññatra samayo vutto, karaṇeneva so idhā”ti.
atk-vin01a:504_1: ‘ekaṃ samaya’nti vā ‘yasmiṃ samaye’ti vā ‘tena samayenā’ti vā abhilāpamattabhedo esa,
atk-vin01a:504_3: Tasmā tesaṃ laddhiyā “tena samayenā”ti vuttepi “tasmiṃ samaye”ti attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:505_0: Buddho bhagavāti imesaṃ padānaṃ parato atthaṃ vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-vin01a:505_1: Verañjāyaṃ viharatīti ettha pana verañjāti aññatarassa nagarassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:505_6: tena ṭhitopi gacchantopi nisinnopi sayānopi bhagavā viharaticceva veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:505_7: So hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati pavatteti,
atk-vin01a:506_11: tasmā naḷeruyakkhena adhiggahitassa pucimandassa samīpeti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:506_12: So kira pucimando ramaṇīyo pāsādiko anekesaṃ rukkhānaṃ ādhipaccaṃ viya kurumāno tassa nagarassa avidūre gamanāgamanasampanne ṭhāne ahosi.
atk-vin01a:506_13: Atha bhagavā verañjaṃ gantvā patirūpe ṭhāne viharanto tassa rukkhassa samīpe heṭṭhābhāge vihāsi.
atk-vin01a:507_0: Tattha siyā yadi tāva bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharati,
atk-vin01a:507_4: na hi sakkā ubhayattha teneva samayena apubbaṃ acarimaṃ viharitunti?
atk-vin01a:507_7: Tasmā yathā gaṅgāyamunādīnaṃ samīpe goyūthāni carantāni “gaṅgāya caranti,
atk-vin01a:507_9: evamidhāpi yadidaṃ verañjāya samīpe naḷerupucimandamūlaṃ tattha viharanto vuccati “verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle”ti.
atk-vin01a:508_0: Tattha verañjākittanena āyasmā upālitthero bhagavato gahaṭṭhānuggahakaraṇaṃ dasseti,
atk-vin01a:508_18: loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
atk-vin01a:508_20: Tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti vacanato yadatthaṃ bhagavā uppanno tadatthaparinipphādanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:508_23: dutiyaṃ bodhimaṇḍeti lokiyalokuttarāya uppattiyā vaneyeva uppanno,
atk-vin01a:508_24: tenassa vaneyeva vihāraṃ dassetīti evamādinā nayenettha atthayojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:509_0: Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti ettha mahatāti guṇamahattenapi mahatā;
atk-vin01a:509_2: so hi bhikkhusaṅgho guṇehipi mahā ahosi,
atk-vin01a:509_3: yasmā yo tattha pacchimako so sotāpanno;
atk-vin01a:509_8: Pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehīti pañca mattā etesanti pañcamattāni.
atk-vin01a:509_10: Tasmā yathā “bhojane mattaññū”ti vutte bhojane mattaṃ jānāti,
atk-vin01a:509_12: evamidhāpi tesaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pañca mattā pañcappamāṇanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:509_17: ettha tassa mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa saṅkhyāmahattaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:509_19: sāriputta bhikkhusaṅgho nirādīnavo apagatakāḷako suddho sāre patiṭṭhito. Imesañhi,
atk-vin01a:509_21: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ yo pacchimako so sotāpanno”ti vacanena guṇamahattaṃ āvibhavissati.
atk-vin01a:510_0: Assosi kho verañjo brāhmaṇoti assosīti suṇi upalabhi,
atk-vin01a:510_4: nāssa koci savanantarāyo ahosīti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:511_1: taṃ pakāsento samaṇo khalu bho gotamotiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:512_3: tasmā “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo”ti ettha samaṇo kira bho gotamagottoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:512_7: taṃ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāya pabbajitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:512_10: tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho.
atk-vin01a:513_0: Itipi so bhagavātiādīsu pana ayaṃ tāva yojanā –
atk-vin01a:513_3: itipi bhagavāti iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:514_0: Idāni vinayadharānaṃ suttantanayakosallatthaṃ vinayasaṃvaṇṇanārambhe buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā
atk-vin01a:514_1: kathāya cittasampahaṃsanatthañca etesaṃ padānaṃ vitthāranayena vaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-vin01a:514_7: pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi so bhagavā arahanti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:514_8: Ārakā hi so sabbakilesehi suvidūravidūre ṭhito,
atk-vin01a:514_9: maggena savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattāti ārakattā arahaṃ;
atk-vin01a:514_10: te cānena kilesārayo maggena hatāti arīnaṃ hatattāpi arahaṃ.
atk-vin01a:514_13: tassānena bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇapharasuṃ
atk-vin01a:514_14: gahetvā sabbe arā hatāti arānaṃ hatattāpi arahaṃ.
atk-vin01a:515_7: kāmabhave ca avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:515_8: Rūpabhave avijjā rūpabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:515_9: Arūpabhave avijjā arūpabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:515_10: Kāmabhave saṅkhārā kāmabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccayā honti.
atk-vin01a:515_12: Kāmabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ kāmabhave nāmarūpassa paccayo hoti,
atk-vin01a:515_15: Kāmabhave nāmarūpaṃ kāmabhave saḷāyatanassa paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:515_16: Rūpabhave nāmarūpaṃ rūpabhave tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:515_17: Arūpabhave nāmaṃ arūpabhave ekassāyatanassa paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:515_18: Kāmabhave saḷāyatanaṃ kāmabhave chabbidhassa phassassa paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:515_19: Rūpabhave tīṇi āyatanāni rūpabhave tiṇṇaṃ phassānaṃ;
atk-vin01a:515_20: arūpabhave ekamāyatanaṃ arūpabhave ekassa phassassa paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:515_21: Kāmabhave cha phassā kāmabhave channaṃ vedanānaṃ paccayā honti.
atk-vin01a:515_23: arūpabhave eko tattheva ekissā vedanāya paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:515_24: Kāmabhave cha vedanā kāmabhave channaṃ taṇhākāyānaṃ paccayā honti.
atk-vin01a:515_26: arūpabhave ekā vedanā arūpabhave ekassa taṇhākāyassa paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:515_27: Tattha tattha sā sā taṇhā tassa tassa upādānassa paccayo;
atk-vin01a:516_1: Idhekacco “kāme paribhuñjissāmī”ti kāmupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ carati,
atk-vin01a:517_2: Tatthassa upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavoti so eva nayo.
atk-vin01a:518_0: Aparo pana “brahmalokasampattiṃ anubhavissāmī”ti kāmupādānapaccayā eva mettaṃ bhāveti, karuṇaṃ… muditaṃ…
atk-vin01a:518_3: Tatthassa nibbattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavoti soyeva nayo.
atk-vin01a:520_7: ubhopete hetusamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti etena nayena sabbapadāni vitthāretabbāni.
atk-vin01a:520_8: Tattha avijjā saṅkhārā eko saṅkhepo, viññāṇa- nāmarūpa-
atk-vin01a:520_16: Avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇena cettha taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva hontīti ime pañca dhammā atīte kammavaṭṭaṃ;
atk-vin01a:520_18: Taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāva hontīti ime pañca dhammā etarahi kammavaṭṭaṃ;
atk-vin01a:520_19: jātijarāmaraṇāpadesena viññāṇādīnaṃ niddiṭṭhattā ime pañca dhammā āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:520_27: tisandhiṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ sabbākārato jānāti passati aññāti paṭivijjhati.
atk-vin01a:520_32: Iminā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena bhagavā te dhamme yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā tesu nibbindanto virajjanto vimuccanto vuttappakārassa
atk-vin01a:520_33: imassa saṃsāracakkassa are hani vihani viddhaṃsesi.
atk-vin01a:521_1: teneva ca uppanne tathāgate ye keci mahesakkhā devamanussā na te aññattha pūjaṃ karonti.
atk-vin01a:521_2: Tathā hi brahmā sahampati sinerumattena ratanadāmena tathāgataṃ pūjesi,
atk-vin01a:521_3: yathābalañca aññepi devā manussā ca bimbisārakosalarājādayo.
atk-vin01a:521_4: Parinibbutampi ca bhagavantaṃ uddissa channavutikoṭidhanaṃ visajjetvā asokamahārājā sakalajambudīpe caturāsītivihārasahassāni patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-vin01a:521_5: Ko pana vādo aññesaṃ pūjāvisesānanti! Evaṃ paccayādīnaṃ arahattāpi arahaṃ.
atk-vin01a:521_6: Yathā ca loke keci paṇḍitamānino bālā asilokabhayena raho pāpaṃ karonti;
atk-vin01a:521_7: evamesa na kadāci karotīti pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvatopi arahaṃ.
atk-vin01a:524_0: Na raho karoti pāpāni, arahaṃ tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:525_0: Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā pana sammāsambuddho.
atk-vin01a:525_1: Tathā hesa sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho,
atk-vin01a:527_0: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-vin01a:528_3: nirodhappajānanā paṭipadā maggasaccanti evaṃ ekekapaduddhārenāpi sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho.
atk-vin01a:529_5: Evaṃ ekekapaduddhārena sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho anubuddho paṭividdho.
atk-vin01a:529_7: sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā pana sammāsambuddhoti.
atk-vin01a:530_0: Vijjāhi pana caraṇena ca sampannattā vijjācaraṇasampanno;
atk-vin01a:530_5: Tatra hi vipassanāñāṇena manomayiddhiyā ca saha cha abhiññā pariggahetvā aṭṭha vijjā vuttā.
atk-vin01a:530_11: cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānānīti ime pannarasa dhammā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:530_13: yasmā etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati amataṃ disaṃ tasmā,
atk-vin01a:530_16: Bhagavā imāhi vijjāhi iminā ca caraṇena samannāgato,
atk-vin01a:530_18: Tattha vijjāsampadā bhagavato sabbaññutaṃ pūretvā ṭhitā,
atk-vin01a:530_20: So sabbaññutāya sabbasattānaṃ atthānatthaṃ ñatvā mahākāruṇikatāya anatthaṃ parivajjetvā atthe niyojeti,
atk-vin01a:530_22: Tenassa sāvakā suppaṭipannā honti no duppaṭipannā,
atk-vin01a:531_8: Tena hesa gamanena khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gatoti sobhanagamanattā sugato.
atk-vin01a:531_9: Sundaraṃ cesa ṭhānaṃ gato amataṃ nibbānanti sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattāpi sugato.
atk-vin01a:531_10: Sammā ca gato tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto.
atk-vin01a:531_13: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato…pe…
atk-vin01a:531_15: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato”ti.
atk-vin01a:531_16: Sammā vā āgato dīpaṅkarapādamūlato pabhuti yāva bodhimaṇḍo tāva samatiṃsapāramipūritāya sammāpaṭipattiyā
atk-vin01a:531_17: sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto sassataṃ ucchedaṃ kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathanti ime ca ante anupagacchanto
atk-vin01a:531_20: yuttaṭṭhāne yuttameva vācaṃ bhāsatīti sammā gadattāpi sugato.
atk-vin01a:532_1: “yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:532_4: Yampi tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:532_7: Yañca kho tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:532_9: tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāya.
atk-vin01a:532_10: Yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:532_13: Yampi tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:532_16: Yañca kho tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:532_18: tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
atk-vin01a:533_1: So hi bhagavā sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathā lokaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a:533_3: na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati,
atk-vin01a:533_4: nāhaṃ taṃ gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ daṭṭheyyaṃ patteyyanti vadāmi; na cāhaṃ, āvuso,
atk-vin01a:533_5: appatvāva lokassa antaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmi.
atk-vin01a:533_7: imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca lokanirodhañca lokanirodhagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ.
atk-vin01a:535_0: Na ca appatvā lokantaṃ, dukkhā atthi pamocanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:540_5: sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:540_6: “Sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vā”ti āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko.
atk-vin01a:542_0: Tāva sahassadhā loko, ettha te vattatī vaso”ti. –
atk-vin01a:544_0: Yasmā panesa sabbesampi sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti,
atk-vin01a:544_4: apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye bhabbe abhabbe satte jānāti,
atk-vin01a:544_7: Tathā hesa ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanānaṃ dvādasa satasahassāni tīṇi sahassāni cattāri satāni paññāsañca yojanāni.
atk-vin01a:555_0: Saṭṭhi ceva sahassāni, esā lokassa saṇṭhiti.
atk-vin01a:575_13: Evaṃ anantāni cakkavāḷāni anantā lokadhātuyo bhagavā anantena buddhañāṇena avedi, aññāsi,
atk-vin01a:576_0: Attano pana guṇehi visiṭṭhatarassa kassaci abhāvā natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro.
atk-vin01a:576_4: sīlaguṇenāpi asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo…pe…
atk-vin01a:577_0: Evaṃ aggappasādasuttādīni “na me ācariyo atthī”tiādikā gāthāyo ca vitthāretabbā.
atk-vin01a:578_2: Tattha purisadammāti adantā dametuṃ yuttā tiracchānapurisāpi manussapurisāpi amanussapurisāpi.
atk-vin01a:578_3: Tathā hi bhagavatā tiracchānapurisāpi apalāḷo nāgarājā, cūḷodaro, mahodaro,
atk-vin01a:578_20: Atha vā visuddhasīlādīnaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīni sotāpannādīnañca uttarimaggapaṭipadaṃ ācikkhanto dantepi dametiyeva.
atk-vin01a:579_0: Atha vā anuttaro purisadammasārathīti ekamevidaṃ atthapadaṃ.
atk-vin01a:579_2: yathā ekapallaṅkeneva nisinnā aṭṭha disā asajjamānā dhāvanti.
atk-vin01a:579_6: hatthidammo sārito ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvatī”ti idañcettha suttaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:580_9: evameva bhagavā satthā satthavāho satte kantāraṃ tāreti jātikantāraṃ tāretī”tiādinā niddesanayenapettha attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:581_3: Tepi hi bhagavato dhammasavanena upanissayasampattiṃ patvā tāya eva upanissayasampattiyā dutiye tatiye vā attabhāve maggaphalabhāgino honti.
atk-vin01a:581_5: Bhagavati kira gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre campānagaravāsīnaṃ dhammaṃ desayamāne eko maṇḍūko bhagavato sare nimittaṃ aggahesi.
atk-vin01a:581_6: Taṃ eko vacchapālako daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto tassa sīse sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:581_7: So tāvadeva kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti.
atk-vin01a:581_8: Suttappabuddho viya ca tattha accharāsaṅghaparivutaṃ attānaṃ disvā “are,
atk-vin01a:581_9: ahampi nāma idha nibbattosmi! Kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ akāsi”nti āvajjento nāññaṃ kiñci addasa,
atk-vin01a:581_11: So taāvadeva saha vimānena āgantvā bhagavato pāde sirasā vandi.
atk-vin01a:582_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-vin01a:586_2: Devaputtopi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya sitaṃ katvā pakkāmīti.
atk-vin01a:587_0: Yaṃ pana kiñci atthi ñeyyaṃ nāma,
atk-vin01a:587_2: Yasmā vā cattāri saccāni attanāpi bujjhi,
atk-vin01a:587_6: bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”ti evaṃ pavatto sabbopi niddesanayo paṭisambhidānayo vā vitthāretabbo.
atk-vin01a:590_0: Garu gāravayutto so, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:591_10: na mahāmāyāya na suddhodanamahārājena na asītiyā ñātisahassehi kataṃ,
atk-vin01a:591_14: vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikāpaññatti,
atk-vin01a:592_0: Yaṃguṇanemittikañcetaṃ nāmaṃ, tesaṃ guṇānaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ vadanti –
atk-vin01a:597_0: Niddese vuttanayeneva cettha tesaṃ tesaṃ padānamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:601_0: Tattha vaṇṇāgamo vaṇṇavipariyayoti etaṃ niruttilakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā saddanayena vā pisodarādipakkhepalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a:601_1: gahetvā yasmā lokiyalokuttarasukhābhinibbattakaṃ dānasīlādipārappattaṃ bhāgyamassa atthi,
atk-vin01a:601_32: tasmā bhaggattā etesaṃ parissayānaṃ bhaggavāti vattabbe bhagavāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:603_0: Bhaggāssa pāpakā dhammā, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:605_0: Yasmā ca loke issariya- dhamma- yasa- sirī- kāma-
atk-vin01a:605_3: aṇimā laghimādikaṃ vā lokiyasammataṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ atthi tathā lokuttaro dhammo lokattayabyāpako yathābhuccaguṇādhigato ativiya parisuddho yaso,
atk-vin01a:605_5: yaṃ yaṃ etena icchitaṃ patthitaṃ attahitaṃ parahitaṃ vā,
atk-vin01a:605_9: tasmā imehi bhagehi yuttattāpi bhagā assa santīti iminā atthena bhagavāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:606_4: santāpavipariṇāmaṭṭhena vā dukkhamariyasaccaṃ, āyūhana- nidāna- saṃyoga-
atk-vin01a:607_0: Yasmā ca esa dibbabrahmaariyavihāre kāyacittaupadhiviveke suññatappaṇihitānimittavimokkhe aññe ca lokiyalokuttare
atk-vin01a:608_0: Yasmā pana tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ gamanamanena vantaṃ,
atk-vin01a:608_1: tasmā bhavesu vantagamanoti vattabbe bhavasaddato bhakāraṃ,
atk-vin01a:608_3: vantasaddato vakārañca dīghaṃ katvā ādāya bhagavāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:608_4: Yathā loke “mehanassa khassa mālā”ti vattabbe “mekhalā”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:609_0: So imaṃ lokanti so bhagavā imaṃ lokaṃ.
atk-vin01a:610_4: sassamaṇabrāhmaṇādiggahaṇena catuparisavasena sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko,
atk-vin01a:611_0: Apicettha sadevakavacanena ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbassāpi lokassa sacchikatabhāvaṃ sādhento tassa bhagavato kittisaddo abbhuggato.
atk-vin01a:611_6: “brahmā mahānubhāvo ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati, dvīhi…pe…
atk-vin01a:611_7: dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati,
atk-vin01a:611_14: Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajanti abbhuggato.
atk-vin01a:611_15: Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhānaṃ sacchikatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā atha sammutideve avasesamanusse ca upādāya ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena
atk-vin01a:612_0: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetīti ettha pana sayanti sāmaṃ,
atk-vin01a:612_8: pariyosānakalyāṇanti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-vin01a:612_9: Tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti.
atk-vin01a:613_1: Ekagāthāpi hi samantabhadrakattā dhammassa paṭhamapādena ādikalyāṇā,
atk-vin01a:613_10: Sakalopi sāsanadhammo attano atthabhūtena sīlena ādikalyāṇo,
atk-vin01a:613_19: Taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipannena adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā vā ādikalyāṇo,
atk-vin01a:613_22: Suyyamāno cesa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato savanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti ādikalyāṇo,
atk-vin01a:613_23: paṭipajjiyamāno samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato paṭipattiyāpi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo,
atk-vin01a:613_24: tathā paṭipanno ca paṭipattiphale niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti pariyosānakalyāṇo.
atk-vin01a:613_28: Tasmā eso bhagavā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva desetīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:614_0: Sātthaṃ sabyañjananti evamādīsu pana yasmā imaṃ dhammaṃ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti,
atk-vin01a:614_21: sikkhattayapariggahitattā brahmabhūtehi seṭṭhehi caritabbato tesañca cariyabhāvato brahmacariyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:615_0: Apica yasmā sanidānaṃ sauppattikañca desento ādikalyāṇaṃ deseti,
atk-vin01a:615_1: veneyyānaṃ anurūpato atthassa aviparītatāya ca hetudāharaṇayuttato ca majjhekalyāṇaṃ,
atk-vin01a:615_2: sotūnaṃ saddhāpaṭilābhena nigamanena ca pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ deseti.
atk-vin01a:615_7: nirupakkilesato nittharaṇatthāya pavattito lokāmisanirapekkhato ca parisuddhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:616_0: Sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho pana atthāvahaṃ sukhāvahanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:616_1: Tathārūpānaṃ arahatanti yathārūpo so bhava gotamo,
atk-vin01a:616_2: evarūpānaṃ yathābhuccaguṇādhigamena loke arahantoti laddhasaddānaṃ arahataṃ.
atk-vin01a:616_3: Dassanaṃ hotīti pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīlitvā “dassanamattampi sādhu hotī”ti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a:616_4: atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti.
atk-vin01a:617_2: Tasmā yattha bhagavā tattha upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:617_3: Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo,
atk-vin01a:617_4: tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:617_10: Atha vā evaṃ gato tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:618_0: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena,
atk-vin01a:618_1: evaṃ sopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi,
atk-vin01a:618_2: sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ agamāsi.
atk-vin01a:618_7: ca sāvakānañca appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya sammodi,
atk-vin01a:618_8: taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātaṃ sammodaṃ jananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:618_9: Atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:618_14: Evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhāpetvā yenatthena āgato taṃ pucchitukāmo ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-vin01a:619_1: Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṃ nisinno hoti tathā nisīdīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:619_4: Paṇḍitā hi purisā garuṭṭhāniyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṃ nisīdanti.
atk-vin01a:620_0: Kathaṃ nisinno pana ekamantaṃ nisinno hotīti?
atk-vin01a:620_8: Atidūre nisinno hi sace kathetukāmo hoti uccāsaddena kathetabbaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:620_14: Atipacchā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti gīvaṃ pasāretvā daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:620_15: Tasmā ayampi ete cha nisajjadose vajjetvā nisīdi.
atk-vin01a:621_0: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti etanti idāni vattabbamatthaṃ dasseti.
atk-vin01a:621_4: etaṃ mayā sutanti idāni vattabbamatthaṃ dasseti.
atk-vin01a:622_1: taṃ dassento na samaṇo gotamoti evamādimāha.
atk-vin01a:623_7: Vayoanuppatteti jātivuḍḍhabhāvaṃ antimavayaṃ anuppatteti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:624_0: Idāni abhivādetīti evamādīni “na samaṇo gotamo”ti ettha vuttanakārena yojetvā evamatthato veditabbāni –
atk-vin01a:624_3: nāpi ‘idha bhonto nisīdantū’ti evaṃ āsanena vā upanimantetī”ti.
atk-vin01a:624_4: Ettha hi vā saddo vibhāvane nāma atthe,
atk-vin01a:624_6: Evaṃ vatvā atha attano abhivādanādīni akarontaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā āha –
atk-vin01a:624_10: taṃ savanañca me dassanañca saṃsandati sameti,
atk-vin01a:624_13: āsanena vā nimantetī”ti evaṃ attanā sutaṃ diṭṭhena nigametvā nindanto āha –
atk-vin01a:624_14: “tayidaṃ bho gotama na sampannamevā”ti taṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ na yuttameva.
atk-vin01a:625_0: Athassa bhagavā attukkaṃsanaparavambhanadosaṃ anupagamma karuṇāsītalahadayena taṃ aññāṇaṃ vidhamitvā yuttabhāvaṃ dassetukāmo āha –
atk-vin01a:625_4: appaṭihatena sabbaññutaññāṇacakkhunā olokentopi taṃ puggalaṃ etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke na passāmi,
atk-vin01a:625_5: yamahaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ vā paccuṭṭheyyaṃ vā āsanena vā nimanteyyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:625_7: yvāhaṃ ajja sabbaññutaṃ patto evarūpaṃ nipaccakārārahaṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi.
atk-vin01a:625_8: Apica kho yadāpāhaṃ sampatijātova uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā sakalaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokesiṃ;
atk-vin01a:625_9: tadāpi etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke taṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi,
atk-vin01a:625_10: yamahaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ vā paccuṭṭheyyaṃ vā āsanena vā nimanteyyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:625_11: Atha kho maṃ soḷasakappasahassāyuko khīṇāsavamahābrahmāpi añjaliṃ paggahetvā “tvaṃ loke mahāpuriso,
atk-vin01a:625_12: tvaṃ sadevakassa lokassa aggo ca jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca,
atk-vin01a:625_14: tadāpi cāhaṃ attanā uttaritaraṃ apassanto āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchāresiṃ –
atk-vin01a:625_18: Evaṃ sampatijātassapi mayhaṃ abhivādanādiraho puggalo natthi,
atk-vin01a:625_19: svāhaṃ idāni sabbaññutaṃ patto kaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ vā…pe…
atk-vin01a:625_22: mā tathāgate evarūpaṃ nipaccakāraṃ patthayittha. Yañhi, brāhmaṇa,
atk-vin01a:625_25: muddhāpi tassa puggalassa rattipariyosāne paripākasithilabandhanaṃ vaṇṭā pavuttatālaphalamiva gīvato pacchijjitvā sahasāva bhūmiyaṃ vipateyyāti.
atk-vin01a:626_1: Evaṃ vuttepi brāhmaṇo duppaññatāya tathāgatassa loke jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ asallakkhento kevalaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ asahamāno āha –
atk-vin01a:626_8: Athassa bhagavā cittamudubhāvajananatthaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvaṃ pariharanto aññathā tassa vacanassatthaṃ
atk-vin01a:627_3: “Madhupiṇḍikapariyāyotveva naṃ dhārehī”tiādīsu hi esa desanāyaṃ vattati.
atk-vin01a:627_5: ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”ntiādīsu vāre. “Sādhu, bhante,
atk-vin01a:627_12: yena kāraṇena maṃ “arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo”ti vadamāno puggalo sammā vadeyya,
atk-vin01a:627_18: Ye te jātivasena vā upapattivasena vā seṭṭhasammatānampi puthujjanānaṃ rūpārammaṇādīni assādentānaṃ abhinandantānaṃ
atk-vin01a:627_20: ye imaṃ lokaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā viya āviñchanti,
atk-vin01a:627_23: Mayhaṃ pahīnāti vattabbepi mamākārena attānaṃ anukkhipanto dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-vin01a:628_0: Tattha pahīnāti cittasantānato vigatā jahitā vā.
atk-vin01a:628_3: Tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā.
atk-vin01a:628_4: Yathā hi tālarukkhaṃ samūlaṃ uddharitvā tassa vatthumatte tasmiṃ padese kate na puna tassa tālassa uppatti paññāyati;
atk-vin01a:628_5: evaṃ ariyamaggasatthena samūle rūpādirase uddharitvā tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte cittasantāne
atk-vin01a:628_7: Avirūḷhidhammattā vā matthakacchinnatālo viya katāti tālāvatthukatā.
atk-vin01a:628_8: Yasmā pana evaṃ tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā honti,
atk-vin01a:628_17: Tattha padacchedo anuabhāvaṃ gatā anabhāvaṃ gatāti,
atk-vin01a:629_0: Ayaṃ kho brāhmaṇa pariyāyoti idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa,
atk-vin01a:629_1: kāraṇaṃ yena maṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya “arasarūpo samaṇo gotamo”ti.
atk-vin01a:629_2: No ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesīti yañca kho tvaṃ sandhāya vadesi,
atk-vin01a:629_5: Nanu evaṃ vutte yo brāhmaṇena vutto sāmaggiraso tassa attani vijjamānatā anuññātā hotīti. Vuccate, na hoti.
atk-vin01a:629_6: Yo hi taṃ sāmaggirasaṃ kātuṃ bhabbo hutvā na karoti,
atk-vin01a:629_10: “no ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesī”ti.
atk-vin01a:629_11: Yaṃ pariyāyaṃ sandhāya tvaṃ maṃ “arasarūpo”ti vadesi,
atk-vin01a:630_1: Evaṃ brāhmaṇo attanā adhippetaṃ arasarūpataṃ āropetuṃ asakkonto athāparaṃ nibbhogo bhavaṃ gotamotiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:630_2: Sabbapariyāyesu cettha vuttanayeneva yojanakkamaṃ viditvā sandhāya bhāsitamattaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:630_3: Brāhmaṇo tameva vayovuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanakammādiṃ loke sāmaggiparibhogoti maññamāno tadabhāvena bhagavantaṃ nibbhogoti āha.
atk-vin01a:630_4: Bhagavā pana yvāyaṃ rūpādīsu sattānaṃ chandarāgaparibhogo tadabhāvaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:631_1: Puna brāhmaṇo yaṃ loke vayovuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikulasamudācārakammaṃ lokiyā karonti tassa akiriyaṃ sampassamāno bhagavantaṃ akiriyavādoti āha.
atk-vin01a:631_4: taṃ akiriyavādaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:631_14: avasesā akusalā dhammā “anekavihitā pāpakā akusalā dhammā”ti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:632_1: Puna brāhmaṇo tameva abhivādanādikammaṃ bhagavati apassanto imaṃ “āgamma ayaṃ lokatanti lokapaveṇī ucchijjatī”ti
atk-vin01a:632_3: Bhagavā pana yasmā aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittesu pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa dvīsu akusalacittesu uppajjamānakadosassa ca anāgāmimaggena ucchedaṃ vadati.
atk-vin01a:632_4: Sabbākusalasambhavassa pana niravasesassa mohassa arahattamaggena ucchedaṃ vadati.
atk-vin01a:632_6: avasesānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathānurūpaṃ catūhi maggehi ucchedaṃ vadati;
atk-vin01a:632_7: tasmā taṃ ucchedavādaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:633_1: Puna brāhmaṇo “jigucchati maññe samaṇo gotamo idaṃ vayovuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikulasamudācārakammaṃ,
atk-vin01a:633_2: tena taṃ na karotī”ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ jegucchīti āha.
atk-vin01a:633_8: yā ca ṭhapetvā tāni duccaritāni avasesānaṃ lāmakaṭṭhena pāpakānaṃ akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpatti samāpajjanā samaṅgibhāvo,
atk-vin01a:633_9: taṃ sabbampi gūthaṃ viya maṇḍanakajātiyo puriso jigucchati hirīyati,
atk-vin01a:633_10: tasmā taṃ jegucchitaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:634_1: Puna brāhmaṇo tameva abhivādanādikammaṃ bhagavati apassanto “ayaṃ imaṃ lokajeṭṭhakakammaṃ vineti vināseti,
atk-vin01a:634_2: atha vā yasmā etaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ na karoti tasmā ayaṃ vinetabbo niggaṇhitabbo”ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ venayikoti āha.
atk-vin01a:634_10: yasmā rāgādīnaṃ vinayāya vūpasamāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-vin01a:634_14: Vicitrā hi taddhitavutti! Svāyaṃ taṃ venayikabhāvaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:635_1: Puna brāhmaṇo yasmā abhivādanādīni sāmīcikammāni karontā vayovuḍḍhe tosenti hāsenti,
atk-vin01a:635_2: akarontā pana tāpenti vihesenti domanassaṃ nesaṃ uppādenti,
atk-vin01a:635_4: tasmā “ayaṃ vayovuḍḍhe tapatī”ti maññamāno sappurisācāravirahitattā vā “kapaṇapuriso aya”nti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ tapassīti āha.
atk-vin01a:635_10: Dutiye atthavikappe byañjanāni avicāretvā loke kapaṇapuriso “tapassī”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:635_11: Bhagavā pana ye akusalā dhammā lokaṃ tapanato tapanīyāti vuccanti,
atk-vin01a:635_12: tesaṃ pahīnattā yasmā tapassīti saṅkhyaṃ gato,
atk-vin01a:635_13: tasmā taṃ tapassitaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:635_19: Tathā te tape assi nirassi pahāsi viddhaṃsesīti tapassī.
atk-vin01a:636_1: Puna brāhmaṇo taṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ devalokagabbhasampattiyā devalokapaṭisandhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattatīti
atk-vin01a:636_2: maññamāno bhagavati cassa abhāvaṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ apagabbhoti āha.
atk-vin01a:636_3: Kodhavasena vā bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassentopi evamāha.
atk-vin01a:636_9: hīno vāssa mātukucchimhi gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo.
atk-vin01a:636_10: Bhagavato pana yasmā āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā apagatā,
atk-vin01a:636_11: tasmā so taṃ apagabbhataṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:636_12: Tatra ca yassa kho brāhmaṇa āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbatti pahīnāti etesaṃ padānaṃ evamattho daṭṭhabbo – brāhmaṇa,
atk-vin01a:636_14: punabbhave ca abhinibbatti anuttarena maggena vihatakāraṇattā pahīnāti.
atk-vin01a:637_1: punabbhavo eva abhinibbatti punabbhavābhinibbattīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:637_2: Yathā ca viññāṇaṭṭhitīti vuttepi na viññāṇato aññā ṭhiti atthi,
atk-vin01a:637_3: evamidhāpi na gabbhato aññā seyyāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:637_4: Abhinibbatti ca nāma yasmā punabbhavabhūtāpi apunabbhavabhūtāpi atthi,
atk-vin01a:638_1: Evaṃ āgatakālato paṭṭhāya arasarūpatādīhi aṭṭhahi akkosavatthūhi akkosantampi brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavā dhammissaro
atk-vin01a:638_2: dhammarājā dhammassāmī tathāgato anukampāya sītaleneva cakkhunā olokento yaṃ dhammadhātuṃ paṭivijjhitvā
atk-vin01a:638_4: tassā dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā vigatavalāhake antalikkhe samabbhuggato puṇṇacando viya saradakāle
atk-vin01a:638_5: sūriyo viya ca brāhmaṇassa hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamanto tāniyeva akkosavatthūni tena tena pariyāyena aññathā dassetvā,
atk-vin01a:638_6: punapi attano karuṇāvipphāraṃ aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi akampiyabhāvena paṭiladdhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:638_7: tādiguṇalakkhaṇaṃ pathavīsamacittataṃ akuppadhammatañca pakāsento “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo kevalaṃ palitasirakhaṇḍadantavalittacatādīhi
atk-vin01a:638_9: no ca kho jānāti attānaṃ jātiyā anugataṃ jarāya anusaṭaṃ byādhinā abhibhūtaṃ maraṇena abbhāhataṃ vaṭṭakhāṇubhūtaṃ
atk-vin01a:638_11: Mahantena kho pana ussāhena mama santikaṃ āgato,
atk-vin01a:638_12: tadassa āgamanaṃ sātthakaṃ hotū”ti cintetvā imasmiṃ loke attano appaṭisamaṃ purejātabhāvaṃ dassento seyyathāpi
atk-vin01a:639_3: Kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vāti ettha pana kiñcāpi kukkuṭiyā vuttappakārato ūnādhikānipi aṇḍāni honti,
atk-vin01a:639_4: atha kho vacanasiliṭṭhatāya evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:639_8: Kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitānīti tāya janettiyā kukkuṭiyā pakkhe pasāretvā tesaṃ upari sayantiyā sammā adhisayitāni.
atk-vin01a:639_9: Sammā pariseditānīti kālena kālaṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā suṭṭhu samantato seditāni,
atk-vin01a:639_11: Sammā paribhāvitānīti kālena kālaṃ suṭṭhu samantato bhāvitāni,
atk-vin01a:640_0: Idāni yasmā tāya kukkuṭiyā evaṃ tīhi pakārehi tāni aṇḍāni paripāliyamānāni na pūtīni honti.
atk-vin01a:640_1: Yopi nesaṃ allasineho so pariyādānaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin01a:640_5: kapālassa tanukattā bahiddhā āloko anto paññāyati.
atk-vin01a:640_6: Atha te kukkuṭapotakā “ciraṃ vata mayaṃ saṅkuṭitahatthapādā sambādhe sayimha,
atk-vin01a:640_8: ettha dāni no sukhavihāro bhavissatī”ti nikkhamitukāmā hutvā kapālaṃ pādena paharanti,
atk-vin01a:640_11: kukkuṭapotakā pakkhe vidhunantā taṅkhaṇānurūpaṃ viravantā nikkhamanti.
atk-vin01a:640_12: Evaṃ nikkhamantānañca nesaṃ yo paṭhamataraṃ nikkhamati so ‘jeṭṭho’ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:640_13: Tasmā bhagavā tāya upamāya attano jeṭṭhakabhāvaṃ sādhetukāmo brāhmaṇaṃ pucchi –
atk-vin01a:640_17: Kinti svassa vacanīyoti so kinti vacanīyo assa,
atk-vin01a:640_18: kinti vattabbo bhaveyya jeṭṭho vā kaniṭṭho vāti.
atk-vin01a:641_8: Yathā so kukkuṭacchāpako jeṭṭhoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati;
atk-vin01a:641_13: Tasmā ettha avijjaṇḍakosassa anto paviṭṭhesu sattesūti evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:641_15: Yathā hi aṇḍe nibbattā ekacce sattā aṇḍabhūtāti vuccanti;
atk-vin01a:641_16: evamayaṃ sabbāpi pajā avijjaṇḍakose nibbattattā aṇḍabhūtāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:641_17: Pariyonaddhāyāti tena avijjaṇḍakosena samantato onaddhāya baddhāya veṭhitāya.
atk-vin01a:641_18: Avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvāti taṃ avijjāmayaṃ aṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā.
atk-vin01a:641_19: Ekova loketi sakalepi lokasannivāse ahameva eko adutiyo.
atk-vin01a:641_20: Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti anuttaranti uttaravirahitaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ.
atk-vin01a:641_23: bodhīti rukkhopi maggopi sabbaññutaññāṇampi nibbānampi vuccati.
atk-vin01a:641_24: “Bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti ca “antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhi”nti ca āgataṭṭhānesu hi rukkho bodhīti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:641_25: “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne maggo.
atk-vin01a:641_41: Tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā bodhi na hotīti.
atk-vin01a:642_0: Idāni yadetaṃ bhagavatā “evameva kho ahaṃ brāhmaṇā”ti ādinā nayena vuttaṃ opammasampaṭipādanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:642_2: Yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā attano aṇḍesu adhisayanāditividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ;
atk-vin01a:642_3: evaṃ bodhipallaṅke nisinnassa bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato attano cittasantāne aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti tividhānupassanākaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a:642_4: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇassa aparihāni.
atk-vin01a:642_5: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍānaṃ allasinehapariyādānaṃ viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-vin01a:642_7: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍakapālānaṃ tanubhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo.
atk-vin01a:642_8: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭacchāpakassa pādanakhasikhātuṇḍakānaṃ thaddhakharabhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa
atk-vin01a:642_10: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭacchāpakassa paripākakālo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-vin01a:643_0: Tato kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭacchāpakassa pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṃ
atk-vin01a:643_1: padāletvā pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā abhinibbhidākālo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-vin01a:643_2: vipassanāñāṇaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā anupubbādhigatena arahattamaggena avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe
atk-vin01a:644_0: Svāhaṃ brāhmaṇa jeṭṭho seṭṭho lokassāti so ahaṃ brāhmaṇa yathā tesaṃ kukkuṭapotakānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosaṃ
atk-vin01a:644_2: evaṃ avijjāgatāya pajāya taṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamataraṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātattā jeṭṭho vuḍḍhataroti saṅkhyaṃ gato.
atk-vin01a:645_0: Evaṃ bhagavā attano anuttaraṃ jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ brāhmaṇassa pakāsetvā idāni yāya paṭipadāya taṃ adhigato
atk-vin01a:645_1: taṃ paṭipadaṃ pubbabhāgato pabhuti dassetuṃ “āraddhaṃ kho pana me brāhmaṇā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:645_2: Imaṃ vā bhagavato anuttaraṃ jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ sutvā brāhmaṇassa cittamevamuppannaṃ –
atk-vin01a:645_4: Tassa cittamaññāya “imāyāhaṃ paṭipadāya imaṃ anuttaraṃ jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ patto”ti dassento evamāha.
atk-vin01a:645_5: Tattha āraddhaṃ kho pana me brāhmaṇa vīriyaṃ ahosīti brāhmaṇa,
atk-vin01a:645_6: na mayā ayaṃ anuttaro jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvo kusītena muṭṭhassatinā sāraddhakāyena vikkhittacittena adhigato,
atk-vin01a:645_7: apica kho tadadhigamāya āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ ahosi,
atk-vin01a:645_8: bodhimaṇḍe nisinnena mayā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ ahosi,
atk-vin01a:645_10: Āraddhattāyeva ca me taṃ asallīnaṃ ahosi.
atk-vin01a:645_14: Passaddho kāyo asāraddhoti kāyacittapassaddhivasena kāyopi me passaddho ahosi.
atk-vin01a:645_15: Tattha yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hoti,
atk-vin01a:645_16: tasmā nāmakāyo rūpakāyoti avisesetvāva passaddho kāyoti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:645_17: Asāraddhoti so ca kho passaddhattāyeva asāraddho,
atk-vin01a:645_19: Samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagganti cittampi me sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ viya ahosi;
atk-vin01a:645_20: samāhitattā eva ca ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandananti.
atk-vin01a:647_0: Idāni imāya paṭipadāya adhigataṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā vijjattayapariyosānaṃ visesaṃ dassento “so kho aha”nti ādimāha.
atk-vin01a:647_1: Tattha vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehītiādīnaṃ kiñcāpi “tattha katame kāmā?
atk-vin01a:647_13: Iti imehi ca kāmehi imehi ca akusalehi dhammehi vivitto hoti pavivitto,
atk-vin01a:647_15: ‘vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī”’tiādinā nayena vibhaṅgeyeva attho vutto.
atk-vin01a:647_16: Tathāpi aṭṭhakathānayaṃ vinā na suṭṭhu pākaṭoti aṭṭhakathānayeneva naṃ pakāsayissāma.
atk-vin01a:648_1: vivicceva kāmehīti kāmehi viviccitvā vinā hutvā apasakketvā.
atk-vin01a:648_5: tasmā tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇasamaye avijjamānānampi kāmānaṃ tassa paṭhamajjhānassa
atk-vin01a:648_6: paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ kāmapariccāgeneva cassa adhigamaṃ dīpeti. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a:648_7: “Vivicceva kāmehī”ti evañhi niyame kariyamāne idaṃ paññāyati.
atk-vin01a:649_2: kiṃ akusalehi dhammehi aviviccāpi jhānaṃ upasampajja vihareyyā”ti?
atk-vin01a:649_5: Kāmadhātusamatikkamanato hi kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato ca idaṃ jhānaṃ kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a:649_11: idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti ettha evakāro ānetvā vuccati,
atk-vin01a:649_13: Na hi sakkā ito aññehipi nīvaraṇasaṅkhātehi akusalehi dhammehi avivicca jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
atk-vin01a:649_14: Tasmā “vivicceva kāmehi vivicceva akusalehi dhammehī”ti evaṃ padadvayepi esa daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:649_15: Padadvayepi ca kiñcāpi “viviccā”ti iminā sādhāraṇavacanena tadaṅgavivekādayo kāyavivekādayo ca sabbepi vivekā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
atk-vin01a:649_19: “Kāmehī”ti iminā pana padena ye ca niddese “katame vatthukāmā manāpiyā rūpā”tiādinā nayena vatthukāmā vuttā,
atk-vin01a:649_20: ye ca tattheva vibhaṅge ca “chando kāmo”tiādinā nayena kilesakāmā vuttā,
atk-vin01a:649_22: Evañhi sati “vivicceva kāmehī”ti vatthukāmehipi viviccevāti attho yujjati.
atk-vin01a:650_0: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti kilesakāmehi sabbākusalehi dhammehi vā viviccāti attho yujjati.
atk-vin01a:650_3: dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato nekkhammasukhapariggaho vibhāvito hoti.
atk-vin01a:650_4: Evaṃ vatthukāmakilesakāmavivekavacanatoyeva ca etesaṃ paṭhamena saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ,
atk-vin01a:650_10: Esa tāva nayo “kāmehī”ti ettha vuttakāmesu vatthukāmapakkhe.
atk-vin01a:651_0: Kilesakāmapakkhe pana chandoti ca rāgoti ca evamādīhi anekabhedo kāmacchandoyeva kāmoti adhippeto.
atk-vin01a:651_2: “tattha katamo kāmachando kāmo”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge jhānapaṭipakkhato visuṃ vutto.
atk-vin01a:651_5: Anekabhedato cassa kāmatoti avatvā kāmehīti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:651_6: Aññesampi ca dhammānaṃ akusalabhāve vijjamāne “tattha katame akusalā dhammā kāmacchando”tiādinā nayena
atk-vin01a:652_0: Evamettha “vivicceva kāmehī”ti iminā kāmacchandassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hoti.
atk-vin01a:652_4: Tathā paṭhamena tīsu akusalamūlesu pañcakāmaguṇabhedavisayassa lobhassa,
atk-vin01a:652_6: Oghādīsu vā dhammesu paṭhamena kāmogha- kāmayoga- kāmāsava-
atk-vin01a:652_15: dutiyena sesānaṃ catunnaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:652_16: Ayaṃ tāva “vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī”ti ettha atthappakāsanā.
atk-vin01a:653_0: Ettāvatā ca paṭhamassa jhānassa pahānaṅgaṃ dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgaṃ dassento savitakkaṃ savicārantiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:653_5: Tathā hi “tena yogāvacaro ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotī”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:653_12: Santepi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge oḷārikaṭṭhena ghaṇṭābhighātasaddo viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko,
atk-vin01a:653_15: ākāse uppatitukāmassa pakkhino pakkhavikkhepo viya padumābhimukhapāto viya ca gandhānubandhacetaso bhamarassa.
atk-vin01a:653_17: ākāse uppatitassa pakkhino pakkhappasāraṇaṃ viya paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa padumassa uparibhāge.
atk-vin01a:653_20: Iti iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena saha vattati rukkho viya pupphena ca phalena cāti idaṃ jhānaṃ “savitakkaṃ savicāra”nti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:653_21: Vibhaṅge pana “iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena upeto hoti samupeto”tiādinā nayena puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā.
atk-vin01a:654_11: suṭṭhu vā khādati khanati ca kāyacittābādhanti sukhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:654_15: Satipi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge iṭṭhārammaṇapaṭilābhatuṭṭhi pīti,
atk-vin01a:654_18: yattha sukhaṃ tattha na niyamato pīti.
atk-vin01a:654_23: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye pākaṭabhāvato cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:654_27: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ “pītisukha”nti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:655_0: Atha vā pīti ca sukhañca pītisukhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:655_3: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti evampi vivekajaṃpītisukhaṃ.
atk-vin01a:655_6: tañcassa atthīti tasmā ekapadeneva “vivekajaṃ pītisukha”ntipi vattuṃ yujjati.
atk-vin01a:655_7: Vibhaṅge pana “idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagata”ntiādinā nayenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:656_4: paccanīkadhamme ḍahanti gocaraṃ vā cintentīti attho.
atk-vin01a:656_5: Sayaṃ vā taṃ jhāyati upanijjhāyatīti jhānaṃ,
atk-vin01a:656_9: Tattha ārammaṇūpanijjhānanti saha upacārena aṭṭha samāpattiyo vuccanti. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:656_14: vipassanāya upanijjhāyanakiccaṃ pana maggena sijjhatīti maggo lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:656_15: Phalaṃ pana nirodhassa tathalakkhaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:657_4: yathā sadhano saparijanotiādīsu ṭhapetvā dhanañca parijanañca añño apadesāraho hoti,
atk-vin01a:657_5: evaṃ ṭhapetvā vitakkādidhamme aññaṃ apadesārahaṃ natthi.
atk-vin01a:657_6: Yathā pana sarathā sapatti senāti vutte senaṅgesuyeva senāsammuti,
atk-vin01a:657_8: Katamesu pañcasu? Vitakko, vicāro, pīti, sukhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:657_10: Etāneva hissa “savitakkaṃ savicāra”ntiādinā nayena aṅgabhāvena vuttāni.
atk-vin01a:657_11: Avuttattā ekaggatā aṅgaṃ na hotīti ce tañca na. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:657_13: Sāpi hi vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti evaṃ vuttāyeva.
atk-vin01a:657_15: evaṃ sacittekaggatanti idha avuttepi iminā vibhaṅgavacanena cittekaggatāpi aṅgamevāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:657_16: Yena hi adhippāyena bhagavatā uddeso kato,
atk-vin01a:658_4: Vibhaṅge pana “upasampajjāti paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā samphusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:658_6: Vihāsinti bodhimaṇḍe nisajjasaṅkhātena iriyāpathavihārena itivuttappakārajhānasamaṅgī hutvā attabhāvassa
atk-vin01a:658_7: iriyaṃ vuttiṃ pālanaṃ yapanaṃ yāpanaṃ cāraṃ vihāraṃ abhinipphādesinti attho.
atk-vin01a:658_9: “viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati,
atk-vin01a:659_0: Kiṃ pana katvā bhagavā imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsīti?
atk-vin01a:659_4: Aññenapi etaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ bhāvetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:659_6: Idha pana vuccamāne atibhāriyaṃ vinayanidānaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:662_0: Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti vitakkassa ca vicārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vūpasamā samatikkamā;
atk-vin01a:662_2: Tattha kiñcāpi dutiyajjhāne sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā na santi,
atk-vin01a:662_5: oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti
atk-vin01a:662_10: tasmā attani jātaṃ attano santāne nibbattanti ayamettha attho.
atk-vin01a:663_3: Yasmā vā taṃ jhānaṃ sampasādanasamannāgatattā vitakkavicārakkhobhavūpasamanena ceto sampasādayati,
atk-vin01a:663_5: Imasmiñca atthavikappe sampasādanaṃ cetasoti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:663_6: Purimasmiṃ pana atthavikappe cetasoti etaṃ ekodibhāvena saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:663_9: vitakkavicārehi anajjhārūḷhattā aggo seṭṭho hutvā udetīti attho.
atk-vin01a:663_11: Vitakkavicāravirahato vā eko asahāyo hutvātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:663_14: Seṭṭhaṭṭhena eko ca so udi cāti ekodi,
atk-vin01a:663_16: Iti imaṃ ekodiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhayatīti idaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ ekodibhāvaṃ.
atk-vin01a:664_2: atha kasmā idameva sampasādanaṃ “cetaso ekodibhāvañcā”ti vuttanti? Vuccate –
atk-vin01a:664_3: aduñhi paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:664_4: tasmā satiyāpi saddhāya sampasādananti na vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:664_5: Na suppasannattāyeva cettha samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo,
atk-vin01a:664_7: Imasmiṃ pana jhāne vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā,
atk-vin01a:664_10: Vibhaṅge pana “sampasādananti yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo,
atk-vin01a:664_13: Evaṃ vuttena panetena saddhiṃ ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā yathā na virujjhati aññadatthu saṃsandati ceva sameti ca evaṃ veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:665_0: Avitakkaṃ avicāranti bhāvanāya pahīnattā etasmiṃ etassa vā vitakko natthīti avitakkaṃ.
atk-vin01a:665_2: Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ “iti ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā
atk-vin01a:666_1: nanu ca “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti imināpi ayamattho siddho,
atk-vin01a:666_2: atha kasmā puna vuttaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti? Vuccate –
atk-vin01a:666_6: “oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti
atk-vin01a:667_2: Vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā ekodibhāvaṃ na upacārajjhānamiva nīvaraṇappahānā,
atk-vin01a:667_3: na paṭhamajjhānamiva ca aṅgapātubhāvāti evaṃ sampasādanaekodibhāvānaṃ hetuparidīpakamidaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:667_5: na tatiyacatutthajjhānāni viya cakkhuviññāṇādīni viya ca abhāvāti evaṃ avitakkaavicārabhāvassa hetuparidīpakañca,
atk-vin01a:668_0: Samādhijanti paṭhamajjhānasamādhito sampayuttasamādhito vā jātanti attho.
atk-vin01a:668_2: atha kho ayameva “samādhī”ti vattabbataṃ arahati vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahena ativiya acalattā suppasannattā ca.
atk-vin01a:669_2: Jhānanti ettha pana yathā paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkādīhi pañcaṅgikaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:669_7: Sampasādanaṃ pana ṭhapetvā nippariyāyena tivaṅgikamevetaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a:669_8: “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye tivaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti? Pīti, sukhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:672_0: Pītiyā ca virāgāti ettha vuttatthāyeva pīti.
atk-vin01a:672_1: Virāgoti tassā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā.
atk-vin01a:672_3: so hi vūpasamaṃ vā sampiṇḍeti vitakkavicāravūpasamaṃ vā.
atk-vin01a:672_6: kiñca bhiyyo vūpasamā cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:672_7: Imissā ca yojanāyaṃ virāgo jigucchanattho hoti.
atk-vin01a:672_8: Tasmā pītiyā jigucchanā ca vūpasamā cāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:672_11: kiñca bhiyyo vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:672_12: Imissā ca yojanāyaṃ virāgo samatikkamanattho hoti.
atk-vin01a:673_0: Kāmañcete vitakkavicārā dutiyajjhāneyeva vūpasantā imassa pana jhānassa maggaparidīpanatthaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthañcetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:673_3: Yathā ca tatiye ariyamagge appahīnānampi sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānā”ti
atk-vin01a:673_4: evaṃ pahānaṃ vuccamānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti tadadhigamāya ussukānaṃ ussāhajanakaṃ;
atk-vin01a:673_5: evamevaṃ idha avūpasantānampi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo vuccamāno vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:674_0: Upekkhako ca vihāsinti ettha upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā,
atk-vin01a:674_3: Tāya visadāya vipulāya thāmagatāya samannāgatattā tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī “upekkhako”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:674_15: Evamayaṃ dasavidhāpi tattha tattha āgatanayato bhūmipuggalacittārammaṇato,
atk-vin01a:674_17: ekakkhaṇakusalattikasaṅkhepavasena ca aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāya vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:674_18: Idha pana vuccamānā vinayanidānaṃ atibhāriyaṃ karotīti na vuttā.
atk-vin01a:675_3: tasmā tatrāpi “upekkhako ca vihāsi”nti evamayaṃ vattabbā siyā,
atk-vin01a:675_8: Idha panāyaṃ vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā ukkhittasirā viya hutvā paribyattakiccā jātā,
atk-vin01a:676_0: Niṭṭhitā “upekkhako ca vihāsi”nti etassa sabbaso atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-vin01a:677_0: Idāni sato ca sampajānoti ettha saratīti sato,
atk-vin01a:677_9: Tattha kiñcāpi idaṃ satisampajaññaṃ purimajjhānesupi atthi,
atk-vin01a:677_10: muṭṭhassatissa hi asampajānassa upacārajjhānamattampi na sampajjati,
atk-vin01a:677_12: oḷārikattā pana tesaṃ jhānānaṃ bhūmiyaṃ viya purisassa cittassa gati sukhā hoti,
atk-vin01a:677_14: Oḷārikaṅgappahānena pana sukhumattā imassa jhānassa purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ viya satisampajaññakiccapariggahitāyeva
atk-vin01a:677_17: Yathāpi dhenupago vaccho dhenuto apanīto arakkhiyamāno punadeva dhenuṃ upagacchati;
atk-vin01a:677_18: evamidaṃ tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ pītito apanītampi satisampajaññārakkhena arakkhiyamānaṃ punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyya pītisampayuttameva siyā.
atk-vin01a:677_23: no aññathāti imampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ idheva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:678_0: Idāni sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedesinti ettha kiñcāpi tatiyajjhānasamaṅgino sukhappaṭisaṃvedanābhogo natthi,
atk-vin01a:678_1: evaṃ santepi yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:678_3: taṃsamuṭṭhānenassa yasmā atipaṇītena rūpena rūpakāyo phuṭo,
atk-vin01a:678_4: yassa phuṭattā jhānā vuṭṭhitopi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya,
atk-vin01a:678_5: tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento “sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedesi”nti āha.
atk-vin01a:679_0: Idāni yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti ettha yaṃjhānahetu yaṃjhānakāraṇā taṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgīpuggalaṃ
atk-vin01a:679_1: buddhādayo ariyā ācikkhanti desenti paññapenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti pakāsenti,
atk-vin01a:679_4: Taṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsinti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:680_0: Kasmā pana taṃ te evaṃ pasaṃsantīti?
atk-vin01a:680_2: Ayañhi yasmā atimadhurasukhe sukhapāramippattepi tatiyajjhāne upekkhako,
atk-vin01a:680_6: Yasmā ca ariyakantaṃ ariyajanasevitameva ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedeti,
atk-vin01a:680_8: Iti pasaṃsārahato naṃ ariyā te evaṃ pasaṃsāhetubhūte guṇe pakāsentā “upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti evaṃ pasaṃsantīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:681_2: Jhānanti ettha ca yathā dutiyaṃ sampasādādīhi caturaṅgikaṃ;
atk-vin01a:681_4: “jhānanti upekkhā sati sampajaññaṃ sukhaṃ cittassa ekaggatā”ti.
atk-vin01a:681_6: Upekkhāsatisampajaññāni pana ṭhapetvā nippariyāyena duvaṅgikamevetaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a:681_7: “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti? Sukhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:684_0: Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa ca kāyikadukkhassa ca pahānā.
atk-vin01a:684_3: Somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa cāti imesampi dvinnaṃ pubbeva atthaṅgamā pahānā icceva vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:684_9: indriyavibhaṅge pana indriyānaṃ uddesakkameneva idhāpi vuttānaṃ sukhadukkhasomanassa domanassānaṃ pahānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:685_0: Yadi panetāni tassa tassa jhānassupacārakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti,
atk-vin01a:685_1: atha kasmā “kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati? Idha,
atk-vin01a:685_12: etthuppannaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti evaṃ jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti?
atk-vin01a:685_18: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānūpacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena vā visamāsanupatāpena vā siyā uppatti,
atk-vin01a:685_20: Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti;
atk-vin01a:685_22: Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti.
atk-vin01a:685_23: Sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ;
atk-vin01a:685_25: Nānāvajjane eva ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārappaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati,
atk-vin01a:685_28: Appahīnā eva ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti;
atk-vin01a:685_32: Tathā tatiyajjhānūpacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa siyā uppatti,
atk-vin01a:685_34: Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso niruddhāti.
atk-vin01a:685_36: appanāppattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca siyā uppatti,
atk-vin01a:685_38: Tasmā eva ca “etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ katanti.
atk-vin01a:686_1: “athevaṃ tassa tassa jhānassūpacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāharī”ti?
atk-vin01a:686_3: Yā hi ayaṃ “adukkhamasukha”nti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
atk-vin01a:686_4: sā sukhumā atidubbiññeyyā na sakkā sukhena gahetuṃ.
atk-vin01a:686_5: Tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā vā tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa gahaṇatthaṃ gopo ekasmiṃ vaje sabbe gāvo samāharati,
atk-vin01a:686_8: evameva bhagavā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ sabbā etā samāhari.
atk-vin01a:686_9: Evañhi samāhaṭā etā dassetvā “yaṃ neva sukhaṃ na dukkhaṃ na somanassaṃ na domanassaṃ,
atk-vin01a:686_10: ayaṃ adukkhamasukhā vedanā”ti sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ.
atk-vin01a:687_0: Apica adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:687_3: paccayā adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā. Idhāvuso, bhikkhu,
atk-vin01a:687_5: catutthajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Ime kho, āvuso,
atk-vin01a:687_7: Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ tattha pahīnāti vuttā;
atk-vin01a:687_8: evaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttātipi veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:687_9: Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānaṃ atidūrabhāvaṃ dassetumpetā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:687_14: Sukhādighātena ca te sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
atk-vin01a:688_17: “ayaṃ sati imāya upekkhāya visadā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā,
atk-vin01a:688_20: Yāya ca upekkhāya ettha satiyā pārisuddhi hoti,
atk-vin01a:689_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati,
atk-vin01a:689_1: yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā
atk-vin01a:689_2: divā vijjamānāpi candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā;
atk-vin01a:689_5: Tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti;
atk-vin01a:689_7: Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṃ
atk-vin01a:689_9: tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo parisuddhā honti pariyodātā,
atk-vin01a:690_2: Jhānanti ettha yathā tatiyaṃ upekkhādīhi pañcaṅgikaṃ;
atk-vin01a:690_7: Ṭhapetvā pana satiṃ upekkhekaggatameva gahetvā nippariyāyena duvaṅgikamevetaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a:690_8: “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti? Upekkhā,
atk-vin01a:693_1: Iti imāni cattāri jhānāni kesañci cittekaggatatthāni honti,
atk-vin01a:693_7: te hi samāpajjitvā “ekaggacittā sukhaṃ divasaṃ viharissāmā”ti iccevaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattenti.
atk-vin01a:693_8: Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ “samāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāhitena cittena vipassissāmā”ti nibbattentānaṃ vipassanāpādakāni honti.
atk-vin01a:693_9: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “ekopi
atk-vin01a:693_10: hutvā bahudhā hotī”ti vuttanayā abhiññāyo patthentā nibbattenti,
atk-vin01a:693_12: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā “nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā sattāhaṃ acittakā hutvā diṭṭheva
atk-vin01a:693_13: dhamme nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmā”ti nibbattenti,
atk-vin01a:693_15: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā “aparihīnajjhānā hutvā brahmaloke uppajjissāmā”ti nibbattenti,
atk-vin01a:694_1: taṃ tassa vipassanāpādakañceva ahosi abhiññāpādakañca nirodhapādakañca sabbakiccasādhakañca sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇadāyakanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:694_3: tesaṃ ekadesaṃ dassento “so evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:695_2: Iminā kamena catutthajjhānaṃ paṭilabhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:695_15: Mudu hi cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti sudhantamiva suvaṇṇaṃ,
atk-vin01a:695_19: yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ mudu ca hoti kammaniyañca,
atk-vin01a:696_3: Mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā ṭhite,
atk-vin01a:696_11: Imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:696_12: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya.
atk-vin01a:697_12: Evampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya,
atk-vin01a:698_0: Pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāyāti evaṃ abhiññāpādake jāte etasmiṃ citte pubbenivāsānussatimhi yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tadatthāya.
atk-vin01a:698_2: Nivutthāti ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā nivutthadhammā vā nivutthā,
atk-vin01a:698_9: Evamimassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa atthāya pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya etassa ñāṇassa adhigamāya pattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:699_2: anekehi vā pakārehi pavattitaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti attho.
atk-vin01a:699_3: Pubbenivāsanti samanantarātītaṃ bhavaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha nivutthasantānaṃ.
atk-vin01a:699_4: Anussarāmīti “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”ti evaṃ jātipaṭipāṭiyā anugantvā anugantvā sarāmi,
atk-vin01a:699_10: tasmā tesaṃ vasena parikammaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā.
atk-vin01a:699_11: Taṃ pana vuccamānaṃ atibhāriyaṃ vinayanidānaṃ karoti,
atk-vin01a:700_3: Tattha ekampi jātinti ekampi paṭisandhimūlaṃ cutipariyosānaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhasantānaṃ.
atk-vin01a:700_5: Anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappetiādīsu pana parihāyamāno kappo saṃvaṭṭakappo,
atk-vin01a:700_7: Tattha ca saṃvaṭṭena saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī gahito hoti tammūlakattā.
atk-vin01a:700_14: vivaṭṭo vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī”ti vuttāni tāni sabbāni pariggahitāni honti.
atk-vin01a:701_14: Vitthārato pana sadāpi ekaṃ buddhakkhettaṃ vinassati.
atk-vin01a:702_13: “yaṃ yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vuttaṃ yattha yaṃ yaṃ ākaṅkhati taṃ taṃ anussarati.
atk-vin01a:702_14: Evametesu tīsu buddhakkhettesu ekaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ vinassati.
atk-vin01a:702_15: Tasmiṃ pana vinassante jātikkhettampi vinaṭṭhameva hoti;
atk-vin01a:702_18: Tassa vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:703_1: etesu bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhanatthāya nisinno anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe sari. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a:703_3: Tattha amutrāsinti amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe ahaṃ amumhi bhave vā yoniyā vā gatiyā vā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā sattanikāye vā ahosiṃ.
atk-vin01a:703_8: Evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedīti anekappakārena kāyikacetasikānaṃ sāmisanirāmisādippabhedānaṃ vā sukhadukkhānaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
atk-vin01a:703_9: Evamāyupariyantoti evaṃ vassasataparamāyupariyanto vā caturāsītikappasahassaparamāyupariyanto vā.
atk-vin01a:704_0: So tato cuto amutra udapādinti so ahaṃ tato bhavato yonito gatito viññāṇaṭṭhitito sattāvāsato sattanikāyato vā cuto,
atk-vin01a:704_1: puna amukasmiṃ nāma bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā udapādiṃ.
atk-vin01a:704_2: Tatrāpāsinti atha tatrāpi bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā puna ahosiṃ.
atk-vin01a:705_0: Atha vā yasmā amutrāsinti idaṃ anupubbena ārohantassa yāvadicchakaṃ saraṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a:705_2: Tasmā idhūpapannoti imissā idhūpapattiyā anantaraṃ amutra udapādinti tusitabhavanaṃ sandhāyāhāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:705_3: Tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmoti tatrāpi tusitabhavane setaketu nāma devaputto ahosiṃ.
atk-vin01a:705_10: So tato cutoti so ahaṃ tato tusitabhavanato cuto.
atk-vin01a:705_11: Idhūpapannoti idha mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchimhi nibbatto.
atk-vin01a:706_9: Kiṃ pana buddhāyeva pubbenivāsaṃ sarantīti? Vuccate –
atk-vin01a:706_26: Paṭipāṭiṃ muñcitvā cutipaṭisandhivasena sarituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-vin01a:706_30: Buddhā pana khandhapaṭipāṭiyāpi cutipaṭisandhivasenapi sīhokkantavasenapi anekāsu kappakoṭīsu heṭṭhā vā upari vā yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākaṅkhanti,
atk-vin01a:707_0: Ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇātiādīsu meti mayā.
atk-vin01a:707_4: Avijjāti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādakamoho vuccati.
atk-vin01a:707_7: Ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti ayaṃ attho,
atk-vin01a:708_4: Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahitattassa,
atk-vin01a:708_7: yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā vihaññeyya vijjā uppajjeyya,
atk-vin01a:708_9: evameva mama avijjā vihatā vijjā uppannā,
atk-vin01a:708_11: Etassa me padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ laddhanti.
atk-vin01a:709_0: Ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇa paṭhamā abhinibbhidā ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhāti ayaṃ kho mama brāhmaṇa
atk-vin01a:709_1: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇamukhatuṇḍakena pubbe nivutthakkhandhapaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamā
atk-vin01a:709_2: abhinibbhidā paṭhamā nikkhanti paṭhamā ariyājāti ahosi,
atk-vin01a:709_3: kukkuṭacchāpakasseva mukhatuṇḍakena vā pādanakhasikhāya vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tamhā aṇḍakosamhā abhinibbhidā nikkhanti kukkuṭanikāye paccājātīti.
atk-vin01a:712_2: cutūpapātañāṇāyāti cutiyā ca upapāte ca ñāṇāya;
atk-vin01a:712_3: yena ñāṇena sattānaṃ cuti ca upapāto ca ñāyati,
atk-vin01a:712_7: passāmīti ettha pana pūritapāramīnaṃ mahāsattānaṃ parikammakaraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-vin01a:712_8: Te hi citte abhininnāmitamatte eva dibbena cakkhunā satte passanti,
atk-vin01a:712_10: Tasmā tesaṃ vasena parikammaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā.
atk-vin01a:712_11: Taṃ pana vuccamānaṃ atibhāriyaṃ vinayanidānaṃ karoti;
atk-vin01a:713_2: Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavinimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ
atk-vin01a:713_4: Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:713_5: dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:713_12: Yo hi cutimattameva passati na upapātaṃ,
atk-vin01a:713_17: so yasmā duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati,
atk-vin01a:714_4: ‘vicikicchā cittassa upakkileso’ti iti viditvā vicikicchaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahiṃ.
atk-vin01a:714_13: ‘atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ cittassa upakkileso’ti iti viditvā atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahiṃ.
atk-vin01a:714_16: appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañhi kho sañjānāmi,
atk-vin01a:715_1: mānusakaṃ vā maṃsacakkhuṃ atikkantattā atikkantamānusakanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:716_0: Satte passāmīti manussamaṃsacakkhunā viya satte passāmi dakkhāmi olokemi.
atk-vin01a:716_1: Cavamāne upapajjamāneti ettha cutikkhaṇe vā upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunā daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā,
atk-vin01a:716_2: ye pana āsannacutikā idāni cavissanti te cavamānā.
atk-vin01a:716_5: Te evarūpe cavamāne upapajjamāne ca passāmīti dasseti.
atk-vin01a:716_6: Hīneti mohanissandayuttattā hīnānaṃ jātikulabhogādīnaṃ vasena hīḷite ohīḷite uññāte avaññāte.
atk-vin01a:716_15: Yathākammūpageti yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ upacitaṃ tena tena upagate.
atk-vin01a:717_1: so heṭṭhā nirayābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nerayikasatte passati mahantaṃ dukkhamanubhavamāne,
atk-vin01a:717_4: “kinnu kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ dukkhamanubhavantī”ti?
atk-vin01a:717_5: Athassa “idaṃ nāma katvā”ti taṃ kammārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-vin01a:717_6: Tathā upari devalokābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nandanavana-
atk-vin01a:717_11: “kinnu kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavantī”ti?
atk-vin01a:717_12: Athassa “idaṃ nāma katvā”ti taṃkammārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-vin01a:717_17: Dibbacakkhupādakāneva hi imāni dibbacakkhunā saheva ijjhanti.
atk-vin01a:718_0: Kāyaduccaritenātiādīsu duṭṭhu caritaṃ duṭṭhaṃ vā caritaṃ kilesapūtikattāti duccaritaṃ;
atk-vin01a:718_7: buddhasāvakānaṃ ariyānaṃ antamaso gihisotāpannānampi anatthakāmā hutvā antimavatthunā vā guṇaparidhaṃsanena vā upavādakā; akkosakā,
atk-vin01a:718_11: “Natthi imesaṃ jhānaṃ vā vimokkho vā maggo vā phalaṃ vā”ti vadanto guṇaparidhaṃsanena upavadatīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:718_12: So ca jānaṃ vā upavadeyya ajānaṃ vā,
atk-vin01a:719_0: “Aññatarasmiṃ kira gāme eko thero ca daharabhikkhu ca piṇḍāya caranti.
atk-vin01a:719_5: yāva na sītalā hoti tāva naṃ pivāmī’ti.
atk-vin01a:719_6: So manussehi ummāratthāya āhaṭe dārukkhandhe nisīditvā taṃ pivi.
atk-vin01a:719_9: Thero gāme caritvā vihāraṃ gantvā daharabhikkhuṃ āha –
atk-vin01a:719_19: tena gantvā sace attanā vuḍḍhataro hoti,
atk-vin01a:719_23: vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ahaṃ bhante tumhe idañcidañca avacaṃ,
atk-vin01a:719_25: Sace so nakkhamati disāpakkanto vā hoti,
atk-vin01a:719_26: ye tasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū vasanti tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sace attanā vuḍḍhataro hoti ṭhitakeneva,
atk-vin01a:719_27: sace navakataro ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:719_29: khamatu me so āyasmā”ti evaṃ vadantena khamāpetabbo.
atk-vin01a:719_31: parinibbutamañcaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā yāva sivathikaṃ gantvāpi khamāpetabbo.
atk-vin01a:719_32: Evaṃ kate saggāvaraṇañca maggāvaraṇañca na hoti,
atk-vin01a:720_2: ye ca micchādiṭṭhimūlakesu kāyakammādīsu aññepi samādapenti.
atk-vin01a:720_4: manoduccaritaggahaṇena ca micchādiṭṭhiyā saṅgahitāyapi imesaṃ dvinnaṃ puna vacanaṃ mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:720_8: bhikkhu sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṃ ārādheyya;
atk-vin01a:720_11: vadāmi taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā yathābhataṃ nikkhitto,
atk-vin01a:721_0: Micchādiṭṭhito ca mahāsāvajjataraṃ nāma aññaṃ natthi. Yathāha – “nāhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:722_5: Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā apetattā,
atk-vin01a:722_8: dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gatīti duggati.
atk-vin01a:722_10: vinassantā vā ettha nipatanti sambhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgāti vinipāto.
atk-vin01a:723_6: So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā,
atk-vin01a:723_11: So hi yathāvuttenatthena apāyo ceva duggati ca sabbasamussayehi ca vinipatitattā vinipātoti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:724_5: So sabbopi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti ayaṃ vacanattho.
atk-vin01a:724_10: yathā pubbenivāsakathāyaṃ “pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇamukhatuṇḍakena pubbenivutthakkhandhapaacchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā”ti vuttaṃ;
atk-vin01a:727_1: So evaṃ samāhite citteti idha vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:727_3: Arahattamaggo hi āsavavināsanato āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:727_7: na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ jāniṃ paṭivijjhiṃ.
atk-vin01a:727_8: Tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti,
atk-vin01a:727_9: tadubhayampi yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhati taṃ tesaṃ appavattiṃ nibbānaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti,
atk-vin01a:727_10: tassa ca sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ
atk-vin01a:728_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento “ime āsavā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:728_1: Tassa me evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa mayhaṃ evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ katheti.
atk-vin01a:728_6: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dasseti.
atk-vin01a:728_8: Tena hi ñāṇena bhagavā paccavekkhanto “khīṇā jātī”tiādīni abbhaññāsiṃ.
atk-vin01a:728_17: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti,
atk-vin01a:728_18: sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā;
atk-vin01a:728_19: taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā “kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ hotī”ti jānanto abbhaññāsiṃ.
atk-vin01a:729_3: puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma,
atk-vin01a:729_5: Tasmā bhagavā attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti abbhaññāsiṃ.
atk-vin01a:729_6: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
atk-vin01a:729_9: Tasmā bhagavā attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti abbhaññāsiṃ.
atk-vin01a:729_10: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti abbhaññāsiṃ.
atk-vin01a:730_0: Idāni evaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitaṃ taṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇādhigamaṃ brāhmaṇassa dassento ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:730_5: ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇa tatiyā abhinibbhidā ahosīti ettha ayaṃ kho mama brāhmaṇa āsavānaṃ khayañāṇamukhatuṇḍakena
atk-vin01a:730_6: catusaccapaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tatiyā abhinibbhidā tatiyā nikkhanti tatiyā ariyajāti ahosi,
atk-vin01a:730_7: kukkuṭacchāpakasseva mukhatuṇḍakena vā pādanakhasikhāya vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tamhā aṇḍakosamhā abhinibbhidā nikkhanti kukkuṭanikāye paccājātīti.
atk-vin01a:731_0: Ettāvatā kiṃ dassetīti? So hi brāhmaṇa kukkuṭacchāpako aṇḍakosaṃ
atk-vin01a:732_2: nivutthakkhandhapaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā paṭhamaṃ tāva pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇavijjāya jāto,
atk-vin01a:732_3: tato sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhipaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā dutiyaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇavijjāya jāto,
atk-vin01a:732_4: puna catusaccapaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tatiyaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇavijjāya jāto;
atk-vin01a:732_6: Sā ca me jāti ariyā suparisuddhāti idaṃ dassesi.
atk-vin01a:732_9: āsavakkhayena sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇanti evaṃ tīhi vijjāhi sabbepi sabbaññuguṇe pakāsetvā attano ariyāya
atk-vin01a:735_1: Evaṃ vutte verañjo brāhmaṇoti evaṃ bhagavatā lokānukampakena brāhmaṇaṃ anukampamānena vinigūhitabbepi
atk-vin01a:735_2: attano ariyāya jātiyā jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāve vijjattayapakāsikāya dhammadesanāya vutte pītivipphāraparipuṇṇagattacitto
atk-vin01a:735_3: verañjo brāhmaṇo taṃ bhagavato ariyāya jātiyā jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ viditvā “īdisaṃ nāmāhaṃ sabbalokajeṭṭhaseṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a:735_4: sabbaguṇasamannāgataṃ sabbaññuṃ ‘aññesaṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ na karotī’ti avacaṃ –
atk-vin01a:735_5: ‘dhīratthu vatare aññāṇa”’nti attānaṃ garahitvā “ayaṃ dāni loke ariyāya jātiyā purejātaṭṭhena jeṭṭho,
atk-vin01a:735_6: sabbaguṇehi appaṭisamaṭṭhena seṭṭho”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
atk-vin01a:735_8: Evañca pana vatvā puna taṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodamāno “abhikkantaṃ,
atk-vin01a:736_5: imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
atk-vin01a:737_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-vin01a:741_0: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho”ti.
atk-vin01a:742_0: Iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena cāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:743_0: Atha vā abhikkantanti atiiṭṭhaṃ atimanāpaṃ atisundaranti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:743_7: abhikkantaṃ yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādo”ti.
atk-vin01a:743_8: Bhagavatoyeva vā vacanaṃ dve dve atthe sandhāya thometi –
atk-vin01a:743_9: bhoto gotamassa vacanaṃ abhikkantaṃ dosanāsanato abhikkantaṃ guṇādhigamanato,
atk-vin01a:744_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi.
atk-vin01a:744_7: Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā esa maggoti vadeyya.
atk-vin01a:744_14: evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ asaddhamme patiṭṭhitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena;
atk-vin01a:744_16: evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānā pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena;
atk-vin01a:744_20: evaṃ mohandhakāre nimuggassa me buddhādiratanattayarūpāni apassato tappaṭicchādakamohandhakāraviddhaṃsakadesanāpajjotaṃ dhārentena,
atk-vin01a:744_21: mayhaṃ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-vin01a:747_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto “esāha”ntiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:747_2: Bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇanti gacchāmi;
atk-vin01a:747_6: hitassa ca vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ gacchāmi bhajāmi sevāmi payirupāsāmi,
atk-vin01a:747_10: tasmā “gacchāmī”ti imassa jānāmi bujjhāmīti ayampi attho vutto.
atk-vin01a:747_11: Dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ettha pana adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne ca catūsu apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo;
atk-vin01a:747_16: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vitthāro.
atk-vin01a:747_18: api ca kho ariyaphalehi saddhiṃ pariyattidhammopi.
atk-vin01a:750_3: Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā sabbadhammakkhandhāti.
atk-vin01a:752_0: Aṭṭha ca puggaladhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. ;
atk-vin01a:753_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho bhikkhusaṅgho. Ettāvatā ca brāhmaṇo tīṇi saraṇagamanāni paṭivedesi.
atk-vin01a:756_0: Idāni tesveva tīsu saraṇagamanesu kosallatthaṃ saraṇaṃ, saraṇagamanaṃ, yo saraṇaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin01a:757_4: So pana idha vuccamāno atibhāriyaṃ vinayanidānaṃ karotīti na vutto.
atk-vin01a:757_5: Atthikehi pana papañcasūdaniyaṃ vā majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ bhayabheravasuttavaṇṇanato sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṃ
atk-vin01a:760_0: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretūti maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo “upāsako aya”nti evaṃ dhāretūti attho.
atk-vin01a:760_7: atthikehi pana papañcasūdaniyaṃ majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:760_8: Ajjataggeti ettha ayaṃ aggasaddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu dissati.
atk-vin01a:760_11: āvarāmi dvāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu hi ādimhi dissati.
atk-vin01a:760_14: “Ambilaggaṃ vā madhuraggaṃ vā tittakaggaṃ vā anujānāmi,
atk-vin01a:760_16: vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā,
atk-vin01a:760_21: Tasmā ajjataggeti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:760_28: tāva upetaṃ anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇagataṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu jānātu,
atk-vin01a:760_29: ahañhi sacepi me tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindeyyuṃ,
atk-vin01a:760_33: Ettha ca brāhmaṇo pāṇupetaṃ saraṇagatanti puna saraṇagamanaṃ vadanto attasanniyyātanaṃ pakāsetīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:761_0: Evaṃ attānaṃ niyyātetvā bhagavantaṃ saparisaṃ upaṭṭhātukāmo āha –
atk-vin01a:761_1: “adhivāsetu ca me bhavaṃ gotamo verañjāyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
atk-vin01a:761_5: tayo māse verañjaṃ upanissāya mama anuggahatthaṃ vāsaṃ sampaṭicchatūti.
atk-vin01a:761_6: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvenāti athassa vacanaṃ sutvā bhagavā kāyaṅgaṃ vā vācaṅgaṃ vā acopetvā abbhantareyeva
atk-vin01a:761_8: brāhmaṇassa anuggahatthaṃ manasāva sampaṭicchīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:762_0: Atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvāti atha verañjo brāhmaṇo sace me samaṇo gotamo nādhivāseyya,
atk-vin01a:762_2: Yasmā pana appaṭikkhipitvā abbhantare khantiṃ dhāresi,
atk-vin01a:762_3: tasmā me manasāva adhivāsesīti evaṃ ākārasallakkhaṇakusalatāya bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā,
atk-vin01a:762_4: attano nisinnāsanato vuṭṭhāya catūsu disāsu bhagavantaṃ sakkaccaṃ vanditvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a:762_5: āgatakālato pabhuti jātimahallakabrāhmaṇānaṃ abhivādanādīni na karotīti vigarahitvāpi idāni viññātabuddhaguṇo
atk-vin01a:762_6: kāyena vācāya manasā ca anekakkhattuṃ vandantopi atittoyeva hutvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ
atk-vin01a:762_7: paggayha sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā yāva dassanavisayo tāva paṭimukhoyeva apakkamitvā dassanavisayaṃ vijahanaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a:765_1: Tena kho pana samayena verañjā dubbhikkhā hotīti yasmiṃ samaye verañjena brāhmaṇena bhagavā verañjaṃ upanissāya vassāvāsaṃ yācito,
atk-vin01a:765_4: sā pana dullabhabhikkhatā yattha manussā assaddhā honti appasannā,
atk-vin01a:765_6: Verañjāyaṃ pana yasmā na tathā ahosi,
atk-vin01a:765_7: apica kho dusassatāya chātakadosena ahosi tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento dvīhitikātiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:765_11: “Ettha lacchāma nu kho kiñci bhikkhamānā na lacchāmā”ti,
atk-vin01a:765_12: “jīvituṃ vā sakkhissāma nu kho no”ti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-vin01a:766_1: īhitaṃ īhā iriyanaṃ pavattanaṃ jīvitantiādīni padāni ekatthāni.
atk-vin01a:766_2: Tasmā dukkhena īhitaṃ ettha pavattatīti dvīhitikāti ayamettha padattho.
atk-vin01a:766_4: Divasampi yācitvā kiñci aladdhā matānaṃ kapaṇamanussānaṃ ahicchattakavaṇṇehi aṭṭhīhi tatra tatra parikiṇṇāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:766_9: Tattha ca sassānaṃ gabbhaggahaṇakāle setakarogena upahatameva pacchinnakhīraṃ aggahitataṇḍulaṃ paṇḍarapaṇḍaraṃ
atk-vin01a:767_0: Vappakāle suṭṭhu abhisaṅkharitvāpi vuttasassaṃ tattha salākā eva sampajjatīti salākāvuttā;
atk-vin01a:767_1: salākāya vā tattha jīvitaṃ pavattentīti salākāvuttā.
atk-vin01a:767_3: Tattha kira dhaññavikkayakānaṃ santikaṃ kayakesu gatesu dubbalamanusse abhibhavitvā balavamanussāva dhaññaṃ kiṇitvā gacchanti.
atk-vin01a:767_5: Dhaññavikkayakā “sabbesaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmā”ti dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhāne dhaññamāpakaṃ nisīdāpetvā ekapasse vaṇṇajjhakkhaṃ nisīdāpesuṃ.
