atk-vin01a:767_7: So āgatapaṭipāṭiyā mūlaṃ gahetvā “itthannāmassa ettakaṃ dātabba”nti salākaṃ likhitvā deti,
atk-vin01a:767_8: te taṃ gahetvā dhaññamāpakassa santikaṃ gantvā dinnapaṭipāṭiyā dhaññaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-vin01a:767_9: Evaṃ salākāya tattha jīvitaṃ pavattentīti salākāvuttā.
atk-vin01a:768_0: Na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetunti paggahena yo uñcho,
atk-vin01a:768_2: Pattaṃ gahetvā yaṃ ariyā uñchaṃ karonti,
atk-vin01a:768_4: tena uñchena yāpetuṃ na sukarāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:768_5: Tadā kira tattha sattaṭṭhagāme piṇḍāya caritvā ekadivasampi yāpanamattaṃ na labhanti.
atk-vin01a:769_0: Tena kho pana samayena uttarāpathakā assavāṇijā…pe…
atk-vin01a:769_2: tenāti yasmiṃ samaye bhagavā verañjaṃ upanissāya vassāvāsaṃ upagato tena samayena.
atk-vin01a:769_3: Uttarāpathavāsikā uttarāpathato vā āgatattā evaṃ laddhavohārā assavāṇijā uttarāpathe assānaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a:769_4: pañca assasatāni gahetvā diguṇaṃ tiguṇaṃ lābhaṃ patthayamānā desantaraṃ gacchantā tehi attano vikkāyikabhaṇḍabhūtehi
atk-vin01a:769_5: pañcamattehi assasatehi verañjaṃ vassāvāsaṃ upagatā honti. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:769_6: Na hi sakkā tasmiṃ dese vassike cattāro māse addhānaṃ paṭipajjituṃ.
atk-vin01a:769_7: Upagacchantā ca bahinagare udakena anajjhottharaṇīye ṭhāne attano ca vāsāgārāni assānañca mandiraṃ kārāpetvā vatiyā parikkhipiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:769_15: Pulakaṃ nāma nitthusaṃ katvā ussedetvā gahitayavataṇḍulā vuccanti.
atk-vin01a:769_19: Tasmā te vāṇijā addhānakkhamaṃ katvā yavataṇḍulamādāya addhānaṃ paṭipajjanti “yattha assānaṃ khādanīyaṃ tiṇaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavissati,
atk-vin01a:770_0: Kasmā pana tehi taṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paññattanti? Vuccate –
atk-vin01a:770_1: “na hi te dakkhiṇāpathamanussā viya assaddhā appasannā,
atk-vin01a:770_5: te pubbaṇhasamayaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena nagaraṃ pavisantā dve tayo divase addasaṃsu sattaṭṭha bhikkhū
atk-vin01a:770_6: sunivatthe supārute iriyāpathasampanne sakalampi nagaraṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci alabhamāne.
atk-vin01a:770_13: na sakkoma nesaṃ devasikaṃ yāguñca bhattañca paṭiyādetuṃ.
atk-vin01a:770_14: Amhākaṃ pana assā sāyañca pāto ca dvikkhattuṃ bhattaṃ labhanti.
atk-vin01a:770_15: Yaṃnūna mayaṃ ekamekassa assassa pātarāsabhattato ekamekassa bhikkhuno patthapatthapulakaṃ dadeyyāma.
atk-vin01a:770_18: Te bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā etamatthaṃ ārocetvā “bhante,
atk-vin01a:770_19: tumhe patthapatthapulakaṃ paṭiggahetvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā katvā paribhuñjathā”ti yācitvā devasikaṃ patthapatthapulakaṃ paññapesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:771_1: Idāni bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvātiādīsu pubbaṇhasamayanti divasassa pubbabhāgasamayaṃ,
atk-vin01a:771_8: Na hi te tato pubbe anivatthā ahesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:771_9: Pattacīvaramādāyāti pattaṃ hatthehi cīvaraṃ kāyena ādiyitvā sampaṭicchādetvā,
atk-vin01a:771_11: Yena vā tena vā hi pakārena gaṇhantā ādāyaicceva vuccanti,
atk-vin01a:771_13: Piṇḍaṃ alabhamānāti sakalampi verañjaṃ caritvā tiṭṭhatu piṇḍo,
atk-vin01a:772_0: Patthapatthapulakaṃ ārāmaṃ āharitvāti gatagataṭṭhāne laddhaṃ ekamekaṃ patthapatthapulakaṃ gahetvā ārāmaṃ netvā.
atk-vin01a:772_1: Udukkhale koṭṭetvā koṭṭetvā paribhuñjantīti therānaṃ koci kappiyakārako natthi,
atk-vin01a:772_2: yo nesaṃ taṃ gahetvā yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā paceyya.
atk-vin01a:772_3: Sāmampi pacanaṃ samaṇasāruppaṃ na hoti na ca vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:772_4: Te evaṃ no sallahukavuttitā ca bhavissati,
atk-vin01a:772_5: sāmapākaparimocanañcāti aṭṭha aṭṭha janā vā dasa dasa janā vā ekato hutvā udukkhale koṭṭetvā koṭṭetvā
atk-vin01a:772_6: sakaṃ sakaṃ paṭivīsaṃ udakena temetvā paribhuñjanti.
atk-vin01a:772_8: Bhagavato pana te assavāṇijā patthapulakañca denti,
atk-vin01a:772_10: Taṃ āyasmā ānando āharitvā silāyaṃ pisati.
atk-vin01a:772_12: Atha naṃ pisitvā sappiādīhi sammā yojetvā bhagavato upanāmesi.
atk-vin01a:773_0: Kiṃ panānandatthero tadā bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hotīti? Hoti,
atk-vin01a:773_2: Bhagavato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassantare nibaddhupaṭṭhāko nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a:773_9: Te attano ruciyā upaṭṭhahitvā yadā icchanti tadā pakkamanti.
atk-vin01a:773_10: Ānandatthero tesu tesu upaṭṭhahantesu appossukko hoti,
atk-vin01a:773_12: Bhagavāpi kiñcāpi me ñātiseṭṭho upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ na tāva labhati,
atk-vin01a:773_13: atha kho evarūpesu ṭhānesu ayameva patirūpoti adhivāsesi.
atk-vin01a:773_15: “āyasmā panānando patthapulakaṃ silāyaṃ pisitvā bhagavato upanāmesi,
atk-vin01a:774_0: Nanu ca manussā dubbhikkhakāle ativiya ussāhajātā puññāni karonti,
atk-vin01a:774_2: Te tadā kasmā kaṭacchubhikkhampi na adaṃsu?
atk-vin01a:774_3: Ayañca verañjo brāhmaṇo mahatā ussāhena bhagavantaṃ vassāvāsaṃ yāci,
atk-vin01a:774_4: so kasmā bhagavato atthibhāvampi na jānātīti? Vuccate –
atk-vin01a:774_6: Verañjañhi brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavato santikā pakkantamattameva sakalañca nagaraṃ samantā ca yojanamattaṃ yattha
atk-vin01a:774_8: taṃ sabbaṃ māro āvaṭṭetvā mohetvā sabbesaṃ asallakkhaṇabhāvaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-vin01a:774_9: Tasmā na koci antamaso sāmīcikammampi kattabbaṃ maññittha.
atk-vin01a:775_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavāpi mārāvaṭṭanaṃ ajānitvāva tattha vassaṃ upagatoti?
atk-vin01a:775_6: sacepi bhagavā tasmiṃ saṃvacchare uttarakuruṃ vā tidasapuraṃ vā gantvā vassaṃ upagaccheyya,
atk-vin01a:775_8: So kira taṃ saṃvaccharaṃ ativiya āghātena pariyuṭṭhitacitto ahosi.
atk-vin01a:775_9: Idha pana bhagavā imaṃ atirekakāraṇaṃ addasa –
atk-vin01a:776_0: Kiṃ pana māro vāṇijake āvaṭṭetuṃ na sakkotīti?
atk-vin01a:776_5: Na hi so tathāgatassa abhihaṭabhikkhāya nibaddhadānassa appitavattassa antarāyaṃ kātuṃ visahati.
atk-vin01a:776_8: Tathāgatassa abhihaṭabhikkhāsaṅkhepena vā nibaddhadānassa appitavattasaṅkhepena vā pariccattānaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ.
atk-vin01a:776_9: Buddhānaṃ jīvitassa na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ.
atk-vin01a:776_10: Asītiyā anubyañjanānaṃ byāmappabhāya vā na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ.
atk-vin01a:776_11: Candimasūriyadevabrahmānampi hi pabhā tathāgatassa anubyañjanabyāmappabhāppadesaṃ patvā vihatānubhāvā honti.
atk-vin01a:776_12: Buddhānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇassa na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātunti imesaṃ catunnaṃ na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ.
atk-vin01a:776_13: Tasmā mārena akatantarāyaṃ bhikkhaṃ bhagavā sasāvakasaṅgho tadā paribhuñjatīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:777_0: Evaṃ paribhuñjanto ca ekadivasaṃ assosi kho bhagavā udukkhalasaddanti bhagavā patthapatthapulakaṃ koṭṭentānaṃ
atk-vin01a:777_2: Tato paraṃ jānantāpi tathāgatāti evamādi yaṃ parato “kinnu kho so, ānanda,
atk-vin01a:777_6: tathāgatā nāma jānantāpi sace tādisaṃ pucchākāraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:777_10: Yasmā pana buddhānaṃ ajānanaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-vin01a:777_12: Kālaṃ viditvā pucchantīti sace tassā pucchāya so kālo hoti,
atk-vin01a:777_16: Evaṃ pucchantāpi ca atthasaṃhitaṃ tathāgatā pucchanti,
atk-vin01a:778_0: Idāni atthasaṃhitanti ettha yaṃ atthasannissitaṃ vacanaṃ tathāgatā pucchanti,
atk-vin01a:778_3: Dhammaṃ vā desessāmāti aṭṭhuppattiyuttaṃ suttaṃ vā pubbacaritakāraṇayuttaṃ jātakaṃ vā kathayissāma.
atk-vin01a:778_4: Sāvakānaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmāti sāvakānaṃ vā tāya pucchāya vītikkamaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā garukaṃ vā
atk-vin01a:778_5: lahukaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāma āṇaṃ ṭhapessāmāti.
atk-vin01a:779_1: etamatthaṃ ārocesīti ettha natthi kiñci vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:779_2: Pubbe vuttameva hi bhikkhūnaṃ patthapatthapulakapaṭilābhaṃ sallahukavuttitaṃ sāmapākaparimocanañca ārocento etamatthaṃ ārocesīti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:779_4: ānandā”ti idaṃ pana bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sampahaṃsento āha.
atk-vin01a:779_5: Sādhukāraṃ pana datvā dvīsu ākāresu ekaṃ gahetvā dhammaṃ desento āha – “tumhehi, ānanda,
atk-vin01a:779_9: sappurisehi evaṃ dubbhikkhe dullabhapiṇḍe imāya sallahukavuttitāya iminā ca sallekhena vijitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:779_15: samantato pana anantarā gāmanigamā phalabhāranamitasassā subhikkhā sulabhapiṇḍā.
atk-vin01a:779_16: Evaṃ santepi bhagavā idheva amhe niggaṇhitvā vasatī”ti ekabhikkhussapi cintā vā vighāto vā natthi.
atk-vin01a:779_17: Evaṃ tāva dubbhikkhaṃ vijitaṃ abhibhūtaṃ attano vase vattitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:780_2: samantato pana anantarā gāmanigamā phalabhāranamitasassā subhikkhā sulabhapiṇḍā.
atk-vin01a:780_3: Handa mayaṃ tattha gantvā paribhuñjissāmā”ti lobhavasena ekabhikkhunāpi ratticchedo vā “pacchimikāya
atk-vin01a:780_4: tattha vassaṃ upagacchāmā”ti vassacchedo vā na kato.
atk-vin01a:781_2: ime ca manussā amhe dve tayo māse vasantepi na kismiñci maññanti.
atk-vin01a:781_3: Yaṃnūna mayaṃ guṇavāṇijjaṃ katvā “asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī…pe…
atk-vin01a:781_4: asuko chaḷabhiññoti evaṃ manussānaṃ aññamaññaṃ pakāsetvā kucchiṃ paṭijaggitvā pacchā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhaheyyāmā”ti
atk-vin01a:781_6: Evaṃ icchācāro vijito abhibhūto attano vase vattitoti.
atk-vin01a:782_0: Anāgate pana pacchimā janatā vihāre nisinnā appakasireneva labhitvāpi “kiṃ idaṃ uttaṇḍulaṃ atikilinnaṃ aloṇaṃ atiloṇaṃ anambilaṃ accambilaṃ,
atk-vin01a:782_1: ko iminā attho”ti ādinā nayena sālimaṃsodanaṃ atimaññissati,
atk-vin01a:782_3: Atha vā janapado nāma na sabbakālaṃ dubbhikkho hoti.
atk-vin01a:782_7: tadā tumhākaṃ sappurisānaṃ imāya paṭipattiyā pasannā manussā bhikkhūnaṃ yāgukhajjakādippabhedena anekappakāraṃ
atk-vin01a:782_9: Taṃ tumhe nissāya uppannaṃ sakkāraṃ tumhākaṃ sabrahmacārīsaṅkhātā pacchimā janatā tumhākaṃ antare nisīditvā anubhavamānāva atimaññissati,
atk-vin01a:785_1: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānotiādīsu āyasmāti piyavacanametaṃ,
atk-vin01a:785_3: Mahāmoggallānoti mahā ca so guṇamahantatāya moggallāno ca gottenāti mahāmoggallāno.
atk-vin01a:785_7: Thero kira pabbajitvā sattame divase sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto,
atk-vin01a:785_9: So taṃ attano mahiddhikataṃ nissāya cintesi –
atk-vin01a:785_12: yaṃnūnāhaṃ pathaviṃ parivattetvā bhikkhū pappaṭakojaṃ bhojeyya”nti.
atk-vin01a:785_14: “sace panāhaṃ bhagavato santike viharanto bhagavantaṃ ayācitvā evaṃ kareyyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:785_16: yugaggāho viya bhagavatā saddhiṃ kato bhaveyyā”ti.
atk-vin01a:786_0: Heṭṭhimatalaṃ sampannanti pathaviyā kira heṭṭhimatale pathavimaṇḍo pathavojo pathavi-
atk-vin01a:786_5: Yatheva hi “tatrassa rukkho sampannaphalo ca upapannaphalo cā”ti ettha madhuraphaloti attho;
atk-vin01a:786_7: Seyyathāpi khuddamadhuṃ anīḷakanti idaṃ panassa madhuratāya opammanidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:786_10: Etaṃ kira madhu sabbamadhūhi aggañca seṭṭhañca surasañca ojavantañca. Tenāha –
atk-vin01a:787_3: Pathaviparivattanaṃ āyācanto hi thero bhagavantaṃ evamāha.
atk-vin01a:787_6: Evañhi kate sukhena bhikkhū pappaṭakojaṃ pathavimaṇḍaṃ paribhuñjissantīti.
atk-vin01a:787_7: Atha bhagavā ananuññātukāmopi theraṃ sīhanādaṃ nadāpetuṃ pucchi –
atk-vin01a:787_12: te pathaviyā parivattiyamānāya ākāse saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonte kathaṃ karissasi,
atk-vin01a:787_14: Atha thero bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapitabhāvānurūpaṃ attano iddhānubhāvaṃ pakāsento “ekāhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:787_17: ekaṃ ahaṃ bhante hatthaṃ yathā ayaṃ mahāpathavī evaṃ abhinimminissāmi,
atk-vin01a:787_19: Evaṃ katvā ye pathavinissitā pāṇā te ekasmiṃ hatthatale ṭhite pāṇe tato dutiyahatthatale saṅkāmento viya tattha saṅkāmessāmīti.
atk-vin01a:788_2: Vipallāsampi sattā paṭilabheyyunti viparītaggāhampi sattā sampāpuṇeyyuṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a:788_5: Atha vā amhākaṃ nu kho ayaṃ gāmo,
atk-vin01a:788_11: idaṃ dubbhikkhaṃ nāma na idāniyeva hoti,
atk-vin01a:788_13: Tadā bhikkhū tādisaṃ iddhimantaṃ sabrahmacāriṃ kuto labhissanti?
atk-vin01a:788_18: paṭisambhidāppattakhīṇāsavāpi samānā iddhibalābhāvā parakulāni piṇḍāya upasaṅkamissanti.
atk-vin01a:788_21: Te guṇe nibbattetvā dubbhikkhakāle pathaviṃ parivattetvā pappaṭakojaṃ paribhuñjiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:788_25: Na amhākaṃ yaṃ kiñci pakkaṃ vā āmaṃ vā khādituṃ dadeyyu”nti.
atk-vin01a:788_26: Evaṃ tesuyeva ariyapuggalesu “natthi ariyapuggalā”ti imaṃ vipallāsaṃ paṭilabheyyuṃ.
atk-vin01a:788_27: Vipallāsavasena ca ariye garahantā upavadantā apāyupagā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-vin01a:788_28: Tasmā mā te rucci pathaviṃ parivattetunti.
atk-vin01a:789_0: Atha thero imaṃ yācanaṃ alabhamāno aññaṃ yācanto “sādhu,
atk-vin01a:789_3: Tattha kiñcāpi na vuttaṃ “vipallāsampi sattā paṭilabheyyu”nti,
atk-vin01a:789_8: Mahāsamuddaṃ ekena padavītihārena atikkamitabbaṃ mātikāmattaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā naḷerupucimandato uttarakuruabhimukhaṃ
atk-vin01a:789_9: maggaṃ nīharitvā uttarakuruṃ gamanāgamanasampanne ṭhāne katvā dasseyya,
atk-vin01a:789_10: yathā bhikkhū gocaragāmaṃ viya yathāsukhaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā nikkhameyyunti.
atk-vin01a:792_1: Idāni āyasmā upāli vinayapaññattiyā mūlato pabhuti nidānaṃ dassetuṃ sāriputtattherassa sikkhāpadapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-vin01a:793_0: Kiṃ pana thero imaṃ attano parivitakkaṃ sayaṃ vinicchinituṃ na sakkotīti? Vuccate –
atk-vin01a:793_2: Ayañhi imesaṃ nāma buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosi,
atk-vin01a:793_4: Iminā pana kāraṇena na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosi,
atk-vin01a:793_7: “etampi soḷasavidhāya paññāya matthakaṃ pattassa aggasāvakassa na bhāriyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:793_8: sammāsambuddhena pana saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasantassa sayaṃ vinicchayakaraṇaṃ tulaṃ chaḍḍetvā hatthena tulanasadisaṃ
atk-vin01a:793_10: Athassa bhagavā taṃ vissajjento “bhagavato ca sāriputta vipassissā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:794_1: Puna thero kāraṇaṃ pucchanto ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-vin01a:794_3: Tattha ko nu kho bhanteti kāraṇapucchā,
atk-vin01a:794_4: tassa katamo nu kho bhanteti attho.
atk-vin01a:794_6: kāraṇañhi yasmā tena tassa phalaṃ hinoti pavattati,
atk-vin01a:794_10: Evaṃ atthato ekampi vohāravasena ca vacanasiliṭṭhatāya ca tatra tatra etaṃ ubhayampi vuccati.
atk-vin01a:795_0: Idāni taṃ hetuñca paccayañca dassetuṃ “bhagavā ca sāriputta vipassī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:795_2: na hi buddhānaṃ ālasiyaṃ vā osannavīriyatā vā atthi.
atk-vin01a:795_3: Buddhā hi ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā sakalacakkavāḷassa vā dhammaṃ desentā samakeneva ussāhena dhammaṃ desenti,
atk-vin01a:795_4: na parisāya appabhāvaṃ disvā osannavīriyā honti,
atk-vin01a:795_6: Yathā hi sīho migarājā sattannaṃ divasānaṃ accayena gocarāya pakkanto khuddake vā mahante vā pāṇe ekasadiseneva vegena dhāvati.
atk-vin01a:795_9: Evaṃ buddhā appakāya vā mahatiyā vā parisāya samakeneva ussāhena dhammaṃ desenti.
atk-vin01a:796_0: Yathā pana amhākaṃ bhagavā mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamāno viya vitthārena dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-vin01a:796_3: Tesaṃ kira kāle dīghāyukā sattā apparajakkhā ahesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:796_4: Te catusaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ ekagāthampi sutvā dhammaṃ abhisamenti,
atk-vin01a:796_6: Teneva kāraṇena appakañca nesaṃ ahosi suttaṃ…pe…
atk-vin01a:797_0: Apaññattaṃ sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadanti sāvakānaṃ niddosatāya dosānurūpato paññapetabbaṃ sattāpattikkhandhavasena āṇāsikkhāpadaṃ apaññattaṃ.
atk-vin01a:797_1: Anuddiṭṭhaṃ pātimokkhanti anvaddhamāsaṃ āṇāpātimokkhaṃ anuddiṭṭhaṃ ahosi.
atk-vin01a:797_4: Tathā hi vipassī bhagavā channaṃ channaṃ vassānaṃ sakiṃ sakiṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisi;
atk-vin01a:797_6: Sāvakā panassa attano attano vasanaṭṭhānesu na uddisiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:797_7: Sakalajambudīpe ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne bandhumatiyā rājadhāniyā kheme migadāye vipassissa bhagavato vasanaṭṭhāne sabbopi bhikkhusaṅgho uposathaṃ akāsi.
atk-vin01a:798_1: Ekamekasmiṃ vihāre abbokiṇṇāni dasapi vīsatipi bhikkhusahassāni vasanti,
atk-vin01a:798_3: Uposathārocikā devatā tattha tattha gantvā ārocenti – “mārisā,
atk-vin01a:798_5: dve tīṇi cattāri pañca vassāni atikkantāni,
atk-vin01a:798_7: āgāminiyā puṇṇamāsiyā buddhadassanatthaṃ uposathakaraṇatthañca gantabbaṃ! Sampatto vo sannipātakālo”ti.
atk-vin01a:798_8: Tato sānubhāvā bhikkhū attano attano ānubhāvena gacchanti,
atk-vin01a:798_10: Te kira bhikkhū pācīnasamuddante vā pacchimauttaradakkhiṇasamuddante vā ṭhitā gamiyavattaṃ pūretvā pattacīvaramādāya “gacchāmā”ti cittaṃ uppādenti;
atk-vin01a:798_13: Bhagavāpi sannisinnāya parisāya imaṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisati.
atk-vin01a:807_0: Adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti. ;
atk-vin01a:808_0: Eteneva upāyena itaresampi buddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddeso veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:808_7: Tasmā amhākampi bhagavā paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassamattameva idaṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisi.
atk-vin01a:808_8: Athekadivasaṃ pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde nisinno bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-vin01a:808_11: ito paraṃ uposathaṃ karissāmi pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi,
atk-vin01a:808_12: tumheva dāni bhikkhave ito paraṃ uposathaṃ kareyyātha,
atk-vin01a:808_16: anavakāso yaṃ tathāgato aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ kareyya,
atk-vin01a:809_0: Tesaṃ buddhānanti tesaṃ vipassīādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ.
atk-vin01a:809_3: Buddhānubuddhānanti ye tesaṃ buddhānaṃ anubuddhā sammukhasāvakā tesañca khandhantaradhānena.
atk-vin01a:809_4: Ye te pacchimā sāvakāti ye tesaṃ sammukhasāvakānaṃ santike pabbajitā pacchimā sāvakā.
atk-vin01a:809_11: Nānākulā pabbajitāti khattiyakulādivase neva uccanīcauḷāruḷārabhogādikulavasena vā vividhakulā nikkhamma pabbajitā.
atk-vin01a:810_0: Te taṃ brahmacariyanti te pacchimā sāvakā yasmā ekanāmā ekagottā ekajātikā ekakulā pabbajitā “amhākaṃ
atk-vin01a:810_1: sāsanaṃ tanti paveṇī”ti attano bhāraṃ katvā brahmacariyaṃ rakkhanti,
atk-vin01a:810_4: Tasmā aññamaññaṃ viheṭhentā vilomaṃ gaṇhantā “asuko thero jānissati,
atk-vin01a:810_5: asuko thero jānissatī”ti sithilaṃ karontā taṃ brahmacariyaṃ khippaññeva antaradhāpesuṃ,
atk-vin01a:810_11: Yathā taṃ suttena asaṅgahitattāti yathā suttena asaṅgahitattā aganthitattā abaddhattā evaṃ vikirati yathā suttena asaṅgahitāni vikiriyanti,
atk-vin01a:810_15: paṇṇāsasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgaṇhantā yaṃ yaṃ attano ruccati,
atk-vin01a:810_16: taṃ tadeva gahetvā sesaṃ vināsesuṃ adassanaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:811_0: Akilāsuno ca te bhagavanto ahesuṃ sāvake cetasā ceto paricca ovaditunti apica sāriputta te buddhā attano
atk-vin01a:811_1: cetasā sāvakānaṃ ceto paricca paricchinditvā ovadituṃ akilāsuno ahesuṃ,
atk-vin01a:811_2: paracittaṃ ñatvā anusāsaniṃ na bhāriyato na papañcato addasaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:811_5: Evaṃ vitakkethāti nekkhammavitakkādayo tayo vitakke vitakketha.
atk-vin01a:811_6: Mā evaṃ vitakkayitthāti kāmavitakkādayo tayo akusalavitakke mā vitakkayittha.
atk-vin01a:811_7: Evaṃ manasi karothāti “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā asubha”nti manasi karotha.
atk-vin01a:811_8: Mā evaṃ manasā katthāti “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā subha”nti mā manasi akarittha.
atk-vin01a:811_10: Idaṃ upasampajja viharathāti kusalaṃ upasampajja paṭilabhitvā nipphādetvā viharatha.
atk-vin01a:812_0: Anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsūti aggahetvā vimucciṃsu.
atk-vin01a:812_6: Sabbepi te arahattaṃ patvā sūriyarasmisamphuṭṭhamiva padumavanaṃ vikasitacittā ahesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:812_7: Tatra sudaṃ sāriputta bhiṃsanakassa vanasaṇḍassa bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ hotīti tatrāti purimavacanāpekkhaṃ;
atk-vin01a:812_12: tatra yo so bhiṃsanakoti vanasaṇḍo vutto,
atk-vin01a:813_2: “kiṃ su nāma te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-vin01a:813_3: Idanti adhippetamatthaṃ paccakkhaṃ viya katvā dassanavacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:813_11: tassa sāriputta bhiṃsanakassa vanasaṇḍassa bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ idaṃsu hoti.
atk-vin01a:813_20: Yo koci avītarāgo taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati,
atk-vin01a:813_21: yebhuyyena lomāni haṃsantīti bahutarāni lomāni haṃsanti uddhaṃ mukhāni sūcisadisāni kaṇṭakasadisāni ca hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-vin01a:814_6: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosīti,
atk-vin01a:814_8: Vassagaṇanāya hi vipassissa bhagavato asītivassasahassāni āyu,
atk-vin01a:814_11: tena saha ghaṭetvā satasahassaṃ saṭṭhimattāni ca vassasahassāni brahmacariyaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:814_12: Purisayugavasena pana yugaparamparāya āgantvā dveyeva purisayugāni aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:814_18: Evaṃ tesampi ye sabbapacchimakā sāvakā tehi saha ghaṭetvā satasahassato uddhaṃ cattālīsamattāni vīsatimattāni ca vassasahassāni brahmacariyaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:814_19: Purisayugavasena pana yugaparamparāya āgantvā dve dveyeva purisayugāni aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:815_1: Evaṃ āyasmā sāriputto tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ brahmacariyassa na ciraṭṭhitikāraṇaṃ sutvā itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ brahmacariyassa
atk-vin01a:815_2: ciraṭṭhitikāraṇaṃ sotukāmo puna bhagavantaṃ “ko pana bhante hetū”ti ādinā nayena pucchi.
atk-vin01a:815_5: Ciraṭṭhitikabhāvepi cettha tesaṃ buddhānaṃ āyuparimāṇatopi purisayugatopi ubhayathā ciraṭṭhitikatā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:815_10: Bahūni ca nesaṃ sāvakayugāni paramparāya brahmacariyaṃ pavattesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:815_11: Evaṃ tesaṃ āyuparimāṇatopi sāvakayugatopi ubhayathā brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosi.
atk-vin01a:816_0: Amhākaṃ pana bhagavato kassapassa bhagavato upaḍḍhāyukappamāṇe dasavassasahassāyukakāle uppajjitabbaṃ siyā.
atk-vin01a:816_4: Yasmā panassa buddhattakārake dhamme esantassa pariyesantassa ñāṇaṃ paripācentassa gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentassa vassasatāyukakāle ñāṇaṃ paripākamagamāsi.
atk-vin01a:816_6: Tenassa sāvakaparamparāvasena ciraṭṭhitikampi brahmacariyaṃ āyuparimāṇavasena vassagaṇanāya naciraṭṭhitikamevāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:817_1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputtoti ko anusandhi?
atk-vin01a:817_2: Evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitikāraṇaṃ sutvā sikkhāpadapaññattiyeva ciraṭṭhitikabhāvahetūti
atk-vin01a:817_3: niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhagavatopi brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitikabhāvaṃ icchanto āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṃ sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ yāci.
atk-vin01a:818_0: Athassa bhagavā “na tāvāyaṃ sikkhāpadapaññattikālo”ti pakāsento “āgamehi tvaṃ sāriputtā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:818_1: Tattha āgamehi tvanti tiṭṭha tāva tvaṃ;
atk-vin01a:818_4: Etena bhagavā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sāvakānaṃ visayabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “buddhavisayova sikkhāpadapaññattī”ti āvikaronto “tathāgato vā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:818_8: tattha tassā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā tathāgatoyeva kālaṃ jānissatīti.
atk-vin01a:818_9: Evaṃ vatvā akālaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “na tāva sāriputtā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:819_1: Yesu diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikā dukkhāsavā kilesāsavā ca parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhanādayo ceva apāyadukkhavisesabhūtā ca āsavā tiṭṭhantiyeva,
atk-vin01a:819_2: yasmā nesaṃ te kāraṇaṃ hontīti attho.
atk-vin01a:819_3: Te āsavaṭṭhānīyā vītikkamadhammā yāva na saṅghe pātubhavanti,
atk-vin01a:819_4: na tāva satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti ayamettha yojanā.
atk-vin01a:820_1: Paññapentena hi “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”tiādi sabbaṃ paññapetabbaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-vin01a:820_2: Adisvāva vītikkamadosaṃ imaṃ paññattiṃ ñatvā pare evaṃ upavādañca upārambhañca garahañca pavatteyyuṃ –
atk-vin01a:820_3: “kathañhi nāma samaṇo gotamo bhikkhusaṅgho me anvāyiko vacanakaroti ettāvatā sikkhāpadehi paliveṭhessati,
atk-vin01a:820_5: Nanu ime kulaputtā mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahantañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ hatthagatāni ca rajjānipi pahāya pabbajitā,
atk-vin01a:820_8: kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhā viharanti.
atk-vin01a:820_9: Tesu nāma ko lokāmisabhūtaṃ methunaṃ vā paṭisevissati,
atk-vin01a:820_11: parassa vā iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ atimadhuraṃ jīvitaṃ upacchindissati,
atk-vin01a:820_12: abhūtaguṇakathāya vā jīvitaṃ kappessati! Nanu pārājike apaññattepi pabbajjāsaṅkhepenevetaṃ pākaṭaṃ kata”nti.
atk-vin01a:820_13: Tathāgatassa ca thāmañca balañca sattā na jāneyyuṃ.
atk-vin01a:820_16: Seyyathāpi nāma akusalo vejjo kañci anuppannagaṇḍaṃ purisaṃ pakkosāpetvā “ehi bho purisa,
atk-vin01a:820_17: imasmiṃ te sarīrappadese mahāgaṇḍo uppajjitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpessati,
atk-vin01a:820_19: tvaṃyeva naṃ tikicchassū”ti vutto tassa arogaṃ sarīrappadesaṃ phāletvā lohitaṃ nīharitvā ālepanabandhanadhovanādīhi
atk-vin01a:820_20: taṃ padesaṃ sañchaviṃ katvā taṃ purisaṃ vadeyya –
atk-vin01a:820_24: Kataro kira me iminā rogo tikicchito?
atk-vin01a:820_26: lohitakkhayañca maṃ pāpetī”ti evaṃ upavadeyya ceva upārambheyya ca garaheyya ca,
atk-vin01a:820_28: Evameva yadi anuppanne vītikkamadose satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyya,
atk-vin01a:820_30: na cassa thāmaṃ vā balaṃ vā sattā jāneyyuṃ,
atk-vin01a:821_0: Evaṃ akālaṃ dassetvā puna kālaṃ dassetuṃ “yato ca kho sāriputtā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:821_5: yasmiṃ samaye “āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatā vītikkamadosā saṅghe pātubhavanti,
atk-vin01a:821_8: Tesaṃyeva “āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatānaṃ vītikkamadosānaṃ paṭighātāya.
atk-vin01a:821_9: Evaṃ paññapento yathā nāma kusalo vejjo uppannaṃ gaṇḍaṃ phālanalepanabandhanadhovanādīhi tikicchanto
atk-vin01a:821_10: rogaṃ vūpasametvā sañchaviṃ katvā na tveva upavādādiraho hoti,
atk-vin01a:821_11: sake ca ācariyake viditānubhāvo hutvā sakkāraṃ pāpuṇāti;
atk-vin01a:821_13: sake ca sabbaññuvisaye viditānubhāvo hutvā sakkāraṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-vin01a:822_0: Evaṃ āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppattiṃ sikkhāpadapaññattiyā akālaṃ uppattiñca kālanti vatvā idāni
atk-vin01a:822_1: tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppattikālañca uppattikālañca dassetuṃ “na tāva sāriputta idhekacce”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:822_5: attano pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bahukā rattiyo jānanti,
atk-vin01a:822_9: Tatra rattaññumahattaṃ patte saṅghe upasenaṃ vaṅgantaputtaṃ ārabbha sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:822_10: So hāyasmā ūnadasavasse bhikkhū upasampādente disvā ekavasso saddhivihārikaṃ upasampādesi.
atk-vin01a:822_16: Evaṃ paññatte sikkhāpade puna bhikkhū “dasavassāmha dasavassāmhā”ti bālā abyattā upasampādenti.
atk-vin01a:822_24: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena dasavassena vā atirekadasavassena vā upasampādetu”nti rattaññumahattaṃ pattakāle dve sikkhāpadāni paññattāni.
atk-vin01a:823_1: Saṅgho hi yāva na theranavamajjhimānaṃ vasena vepullamahattaṃ patto hoti,
atk-vin01a:823_3: Sāsane ekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā na uppajjanti.
atk-vin01a:823_6: Tattha vepullamahattaṃ patte saṅghe paññattasikkhāpadāni “yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttari dirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya,
atk-vin01a:823_10: “yā pana bhikkhunī ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpeyya,
atk-vin01a:824_5: Saṅgho hi yāva na lābhaggamahattaṃ patto hoti,
atk-vin01a:824_6: tāva na lābhaṃ paṭicca āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā uppajjanti.
atk-vin01a:824_9: “yo pana bhikkhu acelakassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyya,
atk-vin01a:824_11: Idañhi lābhaggamahattaṃ patte saṅghe sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-vin01a:825_1: Saṅgho hi yāva na bāhusaccamahattaṃ patto hoti,
atk-vin01a:825_3: Bāhusaccamahattaṃ patte pana yasmā ekampi nikāyaṃ, dvepi…pe…
atk-vin01a:825_4: pañcapi nikāye uggahetvā ayoniso ummujjamānā puggalā rasena rasaṃ saṃsanditvā uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpenti.
atk-vin01a:825_5: Atha satthā “yo pana bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya –
atk-vin01a:825_7: samaṇuddesopi ce evaṃ vadeyyā”tiādinā nayena sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti.
atk-vin01a:826_0: Evaṃ bhagavā āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppattikālañca uppattikālañca dassetvā tasmiṃ samaye sabbasopi
atk-vin01a:826_5: Corāti ca imasmiṃ atthe dussīlāva adhippetā.
atk-vin01a:826_6: Te hi assamaṇāva hutvā samaṇapaṭiññatāya paresaṃ paccaye corenti.
atk-vin01a:826_12: te hi suvaṇṇavaṇṇāpi samānā kāḷakadhammayogā kāḷakātveva veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:826_16: Sāre patiṭṭhitoti sāro vuccanti sīla- samādhi-
atk-vin01a:827_0: Evaṃ sāre patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ vatvā puna so cassa sāre patiṭṭhitabhāvo evaṃ veditabboti dassento imesañhi sāriputtāti ādimāha.
atk-vin01a:827_2: yānimāni verañjāyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ upagatāni pañca bhikkhusatāni,
atk-vin01a:827_3: imesaṃ yo guṇavasena pacchimako sabbaparittaguṇo bhikkhu,
atk-vin01a:828_18: Idha pana maggena phalassa nāmaṃ dinnaṃ.
atk-vin01a:829_2: na attānaṃ apāyesu vinipātanasabhāvoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:829_7: apāyesu vinipātanasabhāvo assa natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:829_9: Sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ parā gati assāti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-vin01a:829_10: Upari maggattayaṃ avassaṃ sampāpakoti attho. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:832_1: Evaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ saññāpetvā verañjāyaṃ taṃ vassāvāsaṃ vītināmetvā vutthavasso mahāpavāraṇāya pavāretvā
atk-vin01a:832_2: atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi.
atk-vin01a:832_6: Taṃ kho panetaṃ āciṇṇaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti –
atk-vin01a:832_12: na te anapaloketvā anāpucchitvā janapadacārikaṃ pakkamanti.
atk-vin01a:832_13: Sāvakā pana apaloketvā vā anapaloketvā vā yathāsukhaṃ pakkamanti.
atk-vin01a:833_2: Janapadacārikaṃ carantā ca mahāmaṇḍalaṃ majjhimamaṇḍalaṃ antimamaṇḍalanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maṇḍalānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ maṇḍale caranti.
atk-vin01a:833_7: tadā mahāpavāraṇāya pavāretvā pāṭipadadivase mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivārā nikkhamitvā gāmanigamādīsu mahājanaṃ
atk-vin01a:833_8: āmisapaṭiggahena anuggaṇhantā dhammadānena cassa vivaṭṭupanissitaṃ kusalaṃ vaḍḍhentā navahi māsehi janapadacārikaṃ
atk-vin01a:833_10: Sace pana antovasse bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanā taruṇā honti,
atk-vin01a:833_11: mahāpavāraṇāya appavāretvā pavāraṇāsaṅgahaṃ datvā kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ pavāretvā māgasirassa paṭhamadivase
atk-vin01a:833_12: mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivārā nikkhamitvā vuttanayeneva majjhimamaṇḍale aṭṭhahi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpenti.
atk-vin01a:833_13: Sace pana nesaṃ vutthavassānaṃ aparipākindriyā veneyyasattā honti,
atk-vin01a:833_14: tesaṃ indriyaparipākaṃ āgamentā māgasiramāsampi tattheva vasitvā phussamāsassa paṭhamadivase mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivārā
atk-vin01a:833_15: nikkhamitvā vuttanayeneva antimamaṇḍale sattahi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpenti.
atk-vin01a:833_16: Tesu ca maṇḍalesu yattha katthaci vicarantāpi te te satte kilesehi viyojentā sotāpattiphalādīhi payojentā
atk-vin01a:833_17: veneyyavaseneva nānāvaṇṇāni pupphāni ocinantā viya caranti.
atk-vin01a:834_1: devasikaṃ paccūsasamaye santaṃ sukhaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ katvā phalasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:836_1: Buddhassa bhagavato kāle dvikkhattuṃ sannipāto pure vassūpanāyikāya ca kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇatthaṃ,
atk-vin01a:837_7: Evanti iminā vacanena paṭiggahesīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:838_0: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvāti idha pubbaṇhasamayanti vā sāyanhasamayanti vā na vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:838_1: Evaṃ santepi bhagavā katabhattakicco majjhanhikaṃ vītināmetvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a:838_2: nagaradvārato paṭṭhāya nagaravīthiyo suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāhi raṃsīhi samujjotayamāno yena verañjassa brāhmaṇassa
atk-vin01a:838_4: Gharadvāre ṭhitamattameva cassa bhagavantaṃ disvā parijano ārocesi.
atk-vin01a:838_5: Brāhmaṇo satiṃ paṭilabhitvā saṃvegajāto sahasā vuṭṭhāya mahārahaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā bhagavantaṃ paccuggamma “ito, bhagavā,
atk-vin01a:838_8: Atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upanisīditukāmo attanā ṭhitapadesato yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-vin01a:839_4: mayā nimantitānaṃ vassaṃvutthānaṃ tumhākaṃ temāsaṃ divase divase pāto yāgukhajjakaṃ,
atk-vin01a:839_6: sāyanhe anekavidha pānavikati gandhapupphādīhi pūjāsakkāroti evamādiko yo deyyadhammo dātabbo assa,
atk-vin01a:839_8: Tañca kho no asantanti ettha pana liṅgavipallāso veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:839_9: So ca kho deyyadhammo amhākaṃ no asantoti ayañhettha attho.
atk-vin01a:839_10: Atha vā yaṃ dānavatthuṃ mayaṃ tumhākaṃ dadeyyāma,
atk-vin01a:839_11: tañca kho no asantanti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:840_2: Taṃ kutettha labbhā bahukiccā gharāvāsāti tatrāyaṃ yojanā –
atk-vin01a:840_4: tasmā ettha santepi deyyadhamme dātukamyatāya ca taṃ kuto labbhā kuto taṃ sakkā laddhuṃ,
atk-vin01a:840_5: yaṃ mayaṃ tumhākaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dadeyyāmāti gharāvāsaṃ garahanto āha.
atk-vin01a:840_6: So kira mārena āvaṭṭitabhāvaṃ na jānāti,
atk-vin01a:840_9: taṃ kutettha labbhāti imasmiṃ temāsabbhantare yamahaṃ tumhākaṃ dadeyyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:840_11: Bahukiccā hi gharāvāsāti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:841_0: Atha brāhmaṇo “yaṃnūnāhaṃ yaṃ me tīhi māsehi dātabbaṃ siyā,
atk-vin01a:841_1: taṃ sabbaṃ ekadivaseneva dadeyya”nti cintetvā adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamotiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:841_2: Tattha svātanāyāti yaṃ me tumhesu sakkāraṃ karoto sve bhavissati puññañceva pītipāmojjañca,
atk-vin01a:841_6: tena me yāciyamāno ekabhattampi na paṭiggaṇhāti,
atk-vin01a:841_8: asabbaññū aya’nti evaṃ brāhmaṇo ca verañjāvāsino ca garahitvā bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasaveyyuṃ,
atk-vin01a:841_9: taṃ tesaṃ mā ahosī”ti tesaṃ anukampāya adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena.
atk-vin01a:842_0: Adhivāsetvā ca atha kho bhagavā verañjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ “alaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhacintāyā”ti saññāpetvā taṅkhaṇānurūpāya
atk-vin01a:842_1: dhammiyā kathāya diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ sandassetvā kusale dhamme samādapetvā gaṇhāpetvā tattha
atk-vin01a:842_2: ca naṃ samuttejetvā saussāhaṃ katvā tāya saussāhatāya aññehi ca vijjamānaguṇehi sampahaṃsetvā dhammaratanavassaṃ
atk-vin01a:842_4: Pakkante ca pana bhagavati verañjo brāhmaṇo puttadāraṃ āmantesi – “mayaṃ, bhaṇe,
atk-vin01a:842_5: bhagavantaṃ temāsaṃ nimantetvā ekadivasaṃ ekabhattampi nādamha. Handa,
atk-vin01a:842_6: dāni tathā dānaṃ paṭiyādetha yathā temāsikopi deyyadhammo sve ekadivaseneva dātuṃ sakkā hotī”ti.
atk-vin01a:842_7: Tato paṇītaṃ dānaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā yaṃ divasaṃ bhagavā nimantito,
atk-vin01a:842_8: tassā rattiyā accayena āsanaṭṭhānaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā mahārahāni āsanāni paññapetvā gandhadhūmavāsakusumavicitraṃ
atk-vin01a:842_11: “atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo tassā rattiyā accayena…pe…
atk-vin01a:843_5: Atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghanti buddhappamukhanti buddhapariṇāyakaṃ;
atk-vin01a:843_6: buddhaṃ saṅghattheraṃ katvā nisinnanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:843_11: Sampavāretvāti suṭṭhu pavāretvā ‘ala’nti hatthasaññāya mukhasaññāya vacībhedena ca paṭikkhipāpetvā.
atk-vin01a:843_17: tasmiñca ticīvare ekameko sāṭako sahassaṃ agghati.
atk-vin01a:843_18: Iti brāhmaṇo bhagavato tisahassagghanakaṃ ticīvaramadāsi uttamaṃ kāsikavatthasadisaṃ.
atk-vin01a:843_19: Ekamekañca bhikkhuṃ ekamekena dussayugenāti ekamekena dussayugaḷena.
atk-vin01a:843_21: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pañcasatasahassagghanakāni dussāni adāsi.
atk-vin01a:843_22: Brāhmaṇo ettakampi datvā atuṭṭho puna sattaṭṭhasahassagghanake anekarattakambale ca paṭṭuṇṇapattapaṭe
atk-vin01a:843_24: Satapākasahassapākānañca bhesajjatelānaṃ tumbāni pūretvā ekamekassa bhikkhuno abbhañjanatthāya sahassagghanakaṃ telamadāsi.
atk-vin01a:843_26: catūsu paccayesu na koci parikkhāro samaṇaparibhogo adinno nāma ahosi.
atk-vin01a:844_0: Evaṃ mahāyāgaṃ yajitvā saputtadāraṃ vanditvā nisinnaṃ atha kho bhagavā verañjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ temāsaṃ mārāvaṭṭanena
atk-vin01a:844_1: dhammasavanāmatarasaparibhogaparihīnaṃ ekadivaseneva dhammāmatavassaṃ vassetvā puripuṇṇasaṅkappaṃ kurumāno
atk-vin01a:844_4: Brāhmaṇopi saputtadāro bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā “punapi, bhante,
atk-vin01a:844_5: amhākaṃ anuggahaṃ kareyyāthā”ti evamādīni vadanto anubandhitvā assūni pavattayamāno nivatti.
atk-vin01a:845_0: Atha kho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvāti yathājjhāsayaṃ yathārucitaṃ vāsaṃ vasitvā verañjāya
atk-vin01a:845_1: nikkhamitvā mahāmaṇḍale cārikāya caraṇakāle gantabbaṃ buddhavīthi pahāya dubbhikkhadosena kilantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-vin01a:845_2: ujunāva maggena gahetvā gantukāmo soreyyādīni anupagamma payāgapatiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tattha gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ
atk-vin01a:854_0: Sampassataṃ na dissati, kiñci apāsādikaṃ yato ettha;
atk-vin01a:862_1: Ito paraṃ tena kho pana samayena vesāliyā avidūretiādi yebhuyyena uttānatthaṃ.
atk-vin01a:862_2: Tasmā anupadavaṇṇanaṃ pahāya yattha yattha vattabbaṃ atthi,
atk-vin01a:862_6: Kalandaputtoti gāmavasena laddhanāmassa rājasammatassa cattālīsakoṭivibhavassa kalandaseṭṭhino putto.
atk-vin01a:862_7: Yasmā pana tasmiṃ gāme aññepi kalandanāmakā manussā atthi,
atk-vin01a:862_8: tasmā kalandaputtoti vatvā puna seṭṭhiputtoti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:862_10: Sahāyakehīti sukhadukkhāni saha āyanti upagacchantīti sahāyā,
atk-vin01a:863_1: So kira nagarato bhuttapātarāsaṃ suddhuttarāsaṅgaṃ mālāgandhavilepanahatthaṃ buddhadassanatthaṃ dhammasavanatthañca
atk-vin01a:863_4: Tena hi “ahampi gacchāmī”ti gantvā catubbidhāya parisāya parivutaṃ brahmassarena dhammaṃ desentaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-vin01a:863_9: Etadahosīti pubbe katapuññatāya codiyamānassa bhabbakulaputtassa etaṃ ahosi.
atk-vin01a:863_13: Evaṃ kirassa parivitakko uppanno “yamayaṃ parisā ekaggacittā dhammaṃ suṇāti,
atk-vin01a:864_0: Atha kho sudinno kalandaputto yena sā parisāti idha kasmā “yena bhagavā”ti avatvā “yena sā parisā”ti vuttanti ce.
atk-vin01a:864_1: Bhagavantañhi parivāretvā uḷāruḷārajanā mahatī parisā nisinnā,
atk-vin01a:864_2: tatra na sakkā iminā pacchā āgatena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nisīdituṃ.
atk-vin01a:864_3: Parisāya pana ekasmiṃ padese sakkāti so taṃ parisaṃyeva upasaṅkamanto.
atk-vin01a:864_5: “atha kho sudinno kalandaputto yena sā parisā”ti.
atk-vin01a:864_6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa etadahosīti na nisinnamattasseva ahosi,
atk-vin01a:864_7: atha kho bhagavato sittayūpasaṃhitaṃ thokaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā;
atk-vin01a:864_8: taṃ panassa yasmā ekamantaṃ nisinnasseva ahosi.
atk-vin01a:865_1: ahaṃ kho yena yena ākārena bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
atk-vin01a:865_2: tena tena me upaparikkhato evaṃ hoti yadetaṃ sittayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ
atk-vin01a:865_4: ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ.
atk-vin01a:865_6: Idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ.
atk-vin01a:865_7: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca massuñca ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
atk-vin01a:865_8: vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti.
atk-vin01a:865_9: Ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati,
atk-vin01a:866_1: Aciravuṭṭhitāya parisāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti sudinno avuṭṭhitāya parisāya na bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:866_4: na labbhā tayā pabbajitu’nti bāhāyampi gahetvā ākaḍḍheyyuṃ,
atk-vin01a:866_5: tato pabbajjāya antarāyo bhavissatī”ti saheva parisāya uṭṭhahitvā thokaṃ gantvā puna kenaci sarīrakiccalesena
atk-vin01a:867_0: Bhagavā pana yasmā rāhulakumārassa pabbajitato pabhuti mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ na pabbājeti,
atk-vin01a:868_1: Ito paraṃ pāṭhānusāreneva gantvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvāti ettha evamattho veditabbo –
atk-vin01a:868_3: na hi pabbajjāya tibbacchandassa bhaṇḍappayojanauddhārasāraṇādīsu vā nakkhattakīḷāyaṃ vā cittaṃ namati.
atk-vin01a:868_4: Amma tātāti ettha pana ammāti mātaraṃ ālapati;
atk-vin01a:868_8: añño te jeṭṭho vā kaniṭṭho vā natthi.
atk-vin01a:868_15: jātakālato pabhuti dhātīhi aṅkato aṅkaṃ haritvā dhāriyamāno assakarathakādīhi bālakīḷanakehi kīḷamāno sādurasabhojanaṃ bhojiyamāno sukhena parihato.
atk-vin01a:869_2: kiñci dukkhassa jānāsīti tvaṃ tāta sudinna kiñci appamattakampi kalabhāgaṃ dukkhassa na jānāsi;
atk-vin01a:869_3: atha vā kiñci dukkhena nānubhosīti attho.
atk-vin01a:869_6: atha vā kiñci dukkhaṃ nassarasīti attho.
atk-vin01a:869_11: Maraṇenapi mayaṃ te akāmakā vinā bhavissāmāti sacepi tava amhesu jīvamānesu maraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-vin01a:869_12: tena te maraṇenapi mayaṃ akāmakā anicchakā na attano ruciyā,
atk-vin01a:869_15: Kiṃ pana mayaṃ tanti evaṃ sante kiṃ pana kiṃ nāma taṃ kāraṇaṃ yena mayaṃ taṃ jīvantaṃ anujānissāma;
atk-vin01a:869_16: atha vā kiṃ pana mayaṃ tanti kena pana kāraṇena mayaṃ taṃ jīvantaṃ anujānissāmāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:870_1: Tatthevāti yattha naṃ ṭhitaṃ mātāpitaro nānujāniṃsu,
atk-vin01a:871_1: Paricārehīti gandhabbanaṭanāṭakādīni paccupaṭṭhāpetvā tattha sahāyakehi saddhiṃ yathāsukhaṃ indriyāni cārehi sañcārehi;
atk-vin01a:871_2: ito cito ca upanehīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:871_3: Atha vā paricārehīti gandhabbanaṭanāṭakādīni paccupaṭṭhāpetvā tattha sahāyakehi saddhiṃ laḷa, upalaḷa, rama,
atk-vin01a:871_5: Kāme paribhuñjantoti attano puttadārehi saddhiṃ bhoge bhuñjanto.
atk-vin01a:871_6: Puññāni karontoti buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca ārabbha dānappadānādīni sugatimaggasodhakāni kusalakammāni karonto.
atk-vin01a:871_8: Athassa mātāpitaro tikkhattuṃ vatvā paṭivacanampi alabhamānā sahāyake pakkosāpetvā “esa vo sahāyako pabbajitukāmo,
atk-vin01a:872_2: “sace ayaṃ pabbajjaṃ alabhamāno marissati na koci guṇo bhavissati.
atk-vin01a:872_3: Pabbajitaṃ pana naṃ mātāpitaropi kālena kālaṃ passissanti.
atk-vin01a:872_6: divase divase mattikāpattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:872_9: so taṃ carituṃ asakkonto puna idheva āgamissati.
atk-vin01a:872_14: “atha kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa sahāyakā yena sudinnassa kalandaputtassa mātāpitaro…pe…
atk-vin01a:873_6: kāyabalaṃ janetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā assumukhaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami…pe…
atk-vin01a:873_8: Bhagavā samīpe ṭhitaṃ aññataraṃ piṇḍacārikaṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi –
atk-vin01a:873_9: “tena hi bhikkhu sudinnaṃ pabbājehi ceva upasampādehi cā”ti. “Sādhu,
atk-vin01a:873_10: bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā sudinnaṃ kalandaputtaṃ jinadattiyaṃ saddhivihārikaṃ laddhā pabbājesi ceva upasampādesi ca.
atk-vin01a:873_12: “alattha kho sudinno kalandaputto bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ,
atk-vin01a:874_0: Ettha pana ṭhatvā sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca kathitā.
atk-vin01a:874_3: aññampi yaṃ khandhake vā parivāre vā kathetabbaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyehi vibhaṅgekathitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:874_5: Evañhi kathiyamāne pāḷikkameneva vaṇṇanā katā hoti.
atk-vin01a:874_6: Tato tena tena vinicchayena atthikānaṃ pāḷikkameneva imaṃ vinayasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ oloketvā so so vinicchayo suviññeyyo bhavissatīti.
atk-vin01a:875_4: Samādāya vattatīti samādiyitvā gaṇhitvā vattati carati viharati.
atk-vin01a:875_5: Āraññiko hotīti gāmantasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā āraññikadhutaṅgavasena araññavāsiko hoti.
atk-vin01a:875_6: Piṇḍapātikoti atirekalābhapaṭikkhepena cuddasa bhattāni paṭikkhipitvā piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgavasena piṇḍapātiko hoti.
atk-vin01a:875_7: Paṃsukūlikoti gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipitvā paṃsukūlikadhutaṅgavasena paṃsukūliko hoti.
atk-vin01a:875_8: Sapadānacārikoti loluppacāraṃ paṭikkhipitvā sapadānacārikadhutaṅgavasena sapadānacāriko hoti;
atk-vin01a:875_10: Vajjigāmanti vajjīnaṃ gāmaṃ vajjīsu vā gāmaṃ.
atk-vin01a:876_1: ye hi tesaṃ upabhogā yāni ca upabhogūpakaraṇāni,
atk-vin01a:876_2: tāni mahantāni bahulāni sārakānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:876_7: Vohāravasena parivattentassa dhanadhaññassa pahūtatāya pahūtadhanadhaññāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:877_1: yathā na vinassati tathā naṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapetvāti attho.
atk-vin01a:877_3: Ekameko cettha thālipāko dasannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-vin01a:877_4: Taṃ sabbampi channaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ bhattaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:877_15: Bhikkhūnaṃ vissajjetvāti sayaṃ ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātikattā sapadānacāraṃ caritukāmo bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogatthāya pariccajitvā datvā.
atk-vin01a:877_16: Ayaṃ hi āyasmā “bhikkhū ca lābhaṃ lacchanti ahañca piṇḍakena na kilamissāmī”ti etadatthameva āgato.
atk-vin01a:877_17: Tasmā attano āgamanānurūpaṃ karonto bhikkhūnaṃ vissajjetvā sayaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-vin01a:878_10: Chaḍḍetukāmā hotīti yasmā antamaso dāsakammakarānampi gorūpānampi aparibhogāraho,
atk-vin01a:878_11: tasmā taṃ kacavaraṃ viya bahi chaḍḍetukāmā hoti.
atk-vin01a:879_1: viññatti vā payuttavācā vā na hotīti? Na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:879_5: taṃ sabbaṃ “detha āharatha idha ākirathā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:879_6: Tathā hi aggaariyavaṃsiko āyasmā raṭṭhapālopi “chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ kummāsaṃ idha me patte ākirā”ti avaca.
atk-vin01a:879_7: Tasmā yaṃ evarūpaṃ chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ aññaṃ vā apariggahitaṃ vanamūlaphalabhesajjādikaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ yathāsukhaṃ āharāpetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:879_9: Hatthānanti bhikkhāggahaṇatthaṃ pattaṃ upanāmayato maṇibandhato pabhuti dvinnampi hatthānaṃ.
atk-vin01a:879_11: Sarassāti “sacetaṃ bhaginī”ti vācaṃ nicchārayato sarassa ca.
atk-vin01a:879_12: Nimittaṃ aggahesīti gihikāle sallakkhitapubbaṃ ākāraṃ aggahesi sañjāni sallakkhesi.
atk-vin01a:879_13: Sudinno hi bhagavato dvādasame vasse pabbajito vīsatime vasse ñātikulaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho sayaṃ pabbajjāya aṭṭhavassiko hutvā;
atk-vin01a:879_14: tena naṃ sā ñātidāsī disvāva na sañjāni,
atk-vin01a:880_0: Sudinnassa mātaraṃ etadavocāti atigarunā pabbajjūpagatena sāmiputtena saddhiṃ “tvaṃ nu kho me, bhante,
atk-vin01a:880_1: ayyo sudinno”tiādivacanaṃ vattuṃ avisahantī vegena gharaṃ pavisitvā sudinnassa mātaraṃ etaṃ avoca.
atk-vin01a:880_3: Sace je saccanti ettha jeti ālapane nipāto.
atk-vin01a:880_7: sace saccaṃ bhaṇasī”ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:881_1: Aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlanti tasmiṃ kira dese dānapatīnaṃ gharesu sālā honti,
atk-vin01a:881_4: tattha pabbajitā piṇḍāya caritvā nisīditvā bhuñjanti.
atk-vin01a:881_7: Tasmā tampi aññatarassa kulassa īdisāya sālāya aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:881_8: Na hi pabbajitā kapaṇamanussā viya asāruppe ṭhāne nisīditvā bhuñjantīti.
atk-vin01a:882_0: Atthi nāma tātāti ettha atthīti vijjamānatthe;
atk-vin01a:882_7: yesaṃ no tvaṃ īdise ṭhāne nisīditvā ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi”;
atk-vin01a:882_12: yesaṃ no tvaṃ īdise ṭhāne nisīditvā ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi”;
atk-vin01a:882_15: tava abbhantare sāsanaṃ nissāya paṭiladdho samaṇaguṇo,
atk-vin01a:882_16: yaṃ tvaṃ subhojanarasasaṃvaḍḍhitopi imaṃ jigucchaneyyaṃ ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ amatamiva nibbikāro paribhuñjissasī”ti.
atk-vin01a:883_0: So pana gahapati dukkhābhitunnatāya etamatthaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vattumasakkonto “atthi nāma,
atk-vin01a:883_4: anokappanāmarisanatthavasena etaṃ atthināmasadde upapade “paribhuñjissasī”ti anāgatavacanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-vin01a:883_8: idaṃ paccakkhampi ahaṃ na saddahāmi na marisayāmīti.
atk-vin01a:883_9: Tatāyaṃ ābhidosikoti tato tava gehato ayaṃ ābhidosiko kummāso laddhoti attho.
atk-vin01a:883_13: Yena sakapitu nivesananti yena sakassa pitu attano pitu nivesananti attho;
atk-vin01a:883_14: thero pitari pemeneva subbaco hutvā agamāsi.
atk-vin01a:883_15: Adhivāsesīti thero ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātikopi samāno “sace ekabhattampi na gahessāmi,
atk-vin01a:883_16: ativiya nesaṃ domanassaṃ bhavissatī”ti ñātīnaṃ anukampāya adhivāsesi.
atk-vin01a:884_2: Ekaṃ hiraññassāti ettha hiraññanti kahāpaṇo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:884_6: Atha vā tiro karonti etenāti tirokaraṇīyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:884_9: Tena hīti yasmā ajja sudinno āgamissati tena kāraṇena.
atk-vin01a:885_1: Pubbaṇhasamayanti ettha kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ kālārocanaṃ na vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a:885_2: atha kho ārociteyeva kāle agamāsīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:885_3: Idaṃ te tātāti dve puñje dassento āha.
atk-vin01a:885_6: idaṃ te mātāmahiyā mātu imaṃ gehaṃ āgacchantiyā dinnadhananti attho.
atk-vin01a:885_8: Itthikāya nāma itthiparibhogānaṃyeva nhānacuṇṇādīnaṃ atthāya laddhaṃ dhanaṃ kittakaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-vin01a:885_10: Atha vā idaṃ te tāta sudinna mātu dhanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:885_14: Taṃ panetaṃ na kasiyā na vaṇijjāya sambhūtaṃ,
atk-vin01a:885_16: Yaṃ itthikāya ñātikulato sāmikakulaṃ gacchantiyā laddhabbaṃ nhānacuṇṇādīnaṃ atthāya itthidhanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:885_17: taṃ tāva ettakanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:886_0: Aññaṃ pettikaṃ aññaṃ pitāmahanti yaṃ pana te pitu ca pitāmahānañca santakaṃ,
atk-vin01a:886_3: ettha ca pitāmahanti taddhitalopaṃ katvā veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:886_5: Labbhā tāta sudinna hīnāyāvattitvāti tāta, sudinna,
atk-vin01a:886_6: uttamaṃ ariyaddhajaṃ pabbajitaliṅgaṃ pahāya hīnāya gihibhāvāya āvattitvā labbhā bhogā bhuñjituṃ,
atk-vin01a:886_10: Tāta na ussahāmīti ettha pana tātāti vacanaṃ gehasitapemena āha,
atk-vin01a:887_0: “Vadeyyāma kho taṃ gahapatī”ti idaṃ pana vacanaṃ samaṇatejenāha.
atk-vin01a:887_1: Nātikaḍḍheyyāsīti yaṃ te mayi pemaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:887_4: Tato seṭṭhi “putto me saṅgahaṃ maññe kattukāmo”ti udaggacitto āha –
atk-vin01a:887_10: Bhayaṃ vāti “kinti me bhoge neva rājāno hareyyu”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ rājādibhayaṃ;
atk-vin01a:887_12: Chambhitattanti rājūhi vā corehi vā “dhanaṃ dehī”ti kammakāraṇaṃ kāriyamānassa kāyiñjanaṃ kāyakampo hadayamaṃsacalanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:887_13: Lomahaṃsoti uppanne bhaye lomānaṃ haṃsanaṃ uddhaggabhāvo.
atk-vin01a:887_14: Ārakkhoti anto ca bahi ca rattiñca divā ca ārakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a:888_1: Tena hi vadhūti seṭṭhi gahapati dhanaṃ dassetvā puttaṃ attanā gihibhāvatthāya palobhetuṃ asakkonto “mātugāmasadisaṃ
atk-vin01a:888_2: dāni purisānaṃ bandhanaṃ natthī”ti maññitvā tassa purāṇadutiyikaṃ āmantesi –
atk-vin01a:888_4: Purāṇadutiyikanti purāṇaṃ dutiyikaṃ pubbe gihikāle dutiyikaṃ,
atk-vin01a:888_6: Tena hīti yena kāraṇena mātugāmasadisaṃ bandhanaṃ natthi.
atk-vin01a:888_10: “Kīdisā nāma tā ayyaputta accharāyo”ti kasmā evamāha?
atk-vin01a:888_11: Tadā kira sambahule khattiyakumārepi brāhmaṇakumārepi seṭṭhiputtepi mahāsampattiyo pahāya pabbajante
atk-vin01a:888_18: Thero taṃ paṭikkhipanto na kho ahaṃ bhaginīti āha.
atk-vin01a:888_20: Tattheva mucchitā papatāti naṃ bhaginivādena samudācarantaṃ disvā “anatthiko dāni mayā ayaṃ yo maṃ pajāpatiṃ
atk-vin01a:888_21: samānaṃ attanā saddhiṃ ekamātukucchiyā sayitadārikaṃ viya maññatī”ti samuppannabalavasokā hutvā tasmiṃyeva
atk-vin01a:889_0: Mā no viheṭhayitthāti mā amhe dhanaṃ dassetvā mātugāmañca uyyojetvā viheṭhayittha;
atk-vin01a:889_2: Tena hi tāta sudinna bījakampi dehīti ettha tena hīti abhiratiyaṃ uyyojeti.
atk-vin01a:889_5: amhākaṃ pana kulavaṃsabījakaṃ ekaṃ puttaṃ dehi.
atk-vin01a:889_6: Mā no aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ licchavayo atiharāpesunti mayañhi licchavīnaṃ gaṇarājūnaṃ rajje vasāma,
atk-vin01a:889_7: te te pituno accayena imaṃ sāpateyyaṃ evaṃ mahantaṃ amhākaṃ vibhavaṃ aputtakaṃ kuladhanarakkhakena puttena
atk-vin01a:890_6: tenāhaṃ na lacchāmi appossukko samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-vin01a:890_8: tato ahaṃ yathāsukhaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī”ti imaṃ nayaṃ passanto evamāhāti.
atk-vin01a:891_2: Mātugāmassa hi utukāle gabbhapatiṭṭhānaṭṭhāne lohitavaṇṇā piḷakā saṇṭhahitvā satta divasāni vaḍḍhitvā bhijjanti,
atk-vin01a:891_5: Taṃ pana yāva balavaṃ hoti bahu paggharati,
atk-vin01a:891_8: dose pana paggharite suddhe vatthumhi dinnā paṭisandhi khippaṃ patiṭṭhāti.
atk-vin01a:891_10: akāralopena sandhi purāṇadutiyikāya bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti purāṇadutiyikāya yā bāhā,
atk-vin01a:892_1: Bhagavato kira paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni bhikkhū cittaṃ ārādhayiṃsu,
atk-vin01a:892_7: Atha bhagavā ajjhācāraṃ apassanto pārājikaṃ vā saṅghādisesaṃ vā na paññapesi.
atk-vin01a:892_8: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pana vatthusmiṃ avasese pañca khuddakāpattikkhandhe eva paññapesi.
atk-vin01a:893_0: Anādīnavadassoti yaṃ bhagavā idāni sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento ādīnavaṃ dassessati,
atk-vin01a:893_2: Sace hi “ayaṃ idaṃ na karaṇīyanti vā mūlacchejjāya vā saṃvattatī”ti jāneyya,
atk-vin01a:893_3: saddhāpabbajito kulaputto tatonidānaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇantopi na kareyya.
atk-vin01a:893_4: Ettha pana ādīnavaṃ apassanto niddosasaññī ahosi.
atk-vin01a:894_0: Sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhīti sā ca teneva ajjhācārena gabbhaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-vin01a:894_2: Kiṃ pana aññathāpi gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hotīti? Hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a:894_8: Itthiyo hi ekaccā utusamaye chandarāgarattā purisānaṃ hatthaggāha-
atk-vin01a:895_0: Udāyittherassa pana purāṇadutiyikā bhikkhunī taṃ asuciṃ ekadesaṃ mukhena aggahesi,
atk-vin01a:896_0: Migasiṅgatāpasassa mātā migī utusamaye tāpasassa passāvaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā sasambhavaṃ passāvaṃ pivi.
atk-vin01a:896_1: Sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā migasiṅgaṃ vijāyi.
atk-vin01a:897_0: Sāmassa pana bodhisattassa mātāpitūnaṃ cakkhuparihāniṃ ñatvā sakko puttaṃ dātukāmo dukūlapaṇḍitaṃ āha –
atk-vin01a:897_4: “Tena hi imissā utusamaye aṅguṭṭhena nābhiṃ parāmaseyyāthā”ti.
atk-vin01a:897_6: Sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā sāmaṃ tāpasadārakaṃ vijāyi.
atk-vin01a:897_8: Eteneva nayena maṇḍabyassa ca caṇḍapajjotassa ca vatthu veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:898_1: Idhekaccā itthī utusamaye purisasaṃsaggaṃ alabhamānā chandarāgavasena antogehagatāva purisaṃ upanijjhāyati rājorodhā viya,
atk-vin01a:899_1: tā utusamaye meghasaddaṃ sutvā gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-vin01a:899_2: Kukkuṭiyopi kadāci ekassa kukkuṭassa saddaṃ sutvā bahukāpi gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-vin01a:900_0: Gāvī eva ca kadāci usabhagandhena gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti. Evaṃ gandhena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:902_0: Bhummā devā saddamanussāvesunti yasmā natthi loke raho nāma pāpakammaṃ pakubbato.
atk-vin01a:902_1: Sabbapaṭhamaṃ hissa taṃ pāpaṃ attanā jānāti,
atk-vin01a:902_4: Tasmāssa paracittavidū sakalavanasaṇḍanissitā bhummā devā taṃ ajjhācāraṃ disvā saddaṃ anussāvesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:903_0: Bhummānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā cātumahārājikāti ettha pana bhummānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ ākāsaṭṭhadevatā assosuṃ;
atk-vin01a:903_2: Brahmakāyikāti asaññasatte ca arūpāvacare ca ṭhapetvā sabbepi brahmāno assosuṃ;
atk-vin01a:903_4: Itiha tena khaṇenāti evaṃ tena sudinnassa ajjhācārakkhaṇena.
atk-vin01a:904_1: Bījakoti nāmamakaṃsūti na aññaṃ nāmaṃ kātumadaṃsu,
atk-vin01a:904_2: “bījakampi dehī”ti mātāmahiyā vuttabhāvassa pākaṭattā “bījako tvevassa nāmaṃ hotū”ti “bījako”ti nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:904_3: Puttassa pana nāmavaseneva ca mātāpitūnampissa nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:904_4: Te aparena samayenāti bījakañca bījakamātarañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:904_5: Bījakassa kira sattaṭṭhavassakāle tassa mātā bhikkhunīsu so ca bhikkhūsu pabbajitvā kalyāṇamitte upanissāya arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:905_10: So hi viññūhi akattabbatāya kucchitakiriyabhāvato kukkuccaṃ.
atk-vin01a:905_11: Kataṃ ajjhācāraṃ nivattetuṃ asamatthatāya taṃ paṭicca virūpaṃ saraṇabhāvato vippaṭisāroti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:905_12: Alābhā vata meti mayhaṃ vata alābhā;
atk-vin01a:905_16: Na vata me lābhāti yepi me paṭiladdhā pabbajjasaraṇagamanasikkhāsamādānaguṇā,
atk-vin01a:905_18: Dulladdhaṃ vata meti idaṃ sāsanaṃ laddhampi me dulladdhaṃ.
atk-vin01a:905_19: Na vata me suladdhanti yathā aññesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ,
atk-vin01a:905_20: evaṃ na vata me suladdhaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:905_24: Kiso ahosīti khādituṃ vā bhuñjituṃ vā asakkonto tanuko ahosi appamaṃsalohito.
atk-vin01a:905_28: Hadayavatthuṃ nissāya pavattanavasena pana sabbepi antomanāyeva.
atk-vin01a:905_29: Līnamanoti uddese paripucchāya kammaṭṭhāne adhisīle adhicitte adhipaññāya vattapaṭipattipūraṇe ca nikkhittadhuro
atk-vin01a:905_30: avipphāriko aññadatthu kosajjavaseneva līno saṅkucito mano assāti līnamano.
atk-vin01a:905_34: Pajjhāyīti vippaṭisāravasena vahacchinno viya gadrabho taṃ taṃ cintayi.
atk-vin01a:906_1: Sahāyakā bhikkhūti taṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāpapañcena vītināmentaṃ disvā yassa vissāsikā kathāphāsukā bhikkhū te naṃ etadavocuṃ.
atk-vin01a:906_3: So dāni tvanti ettha dānīti nipāto,
atk-vin01a:906_11: Adhikusalānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya abhiratova ahanti.
atk-vin01a:906_12: Atthi me pāpakammaṃ katanti mayā kataṃ ekaṃ pāpakammaṃ atthi upalabbhati saṃvijjati,
atk-vin01a:907_5: Yaṃ tvanti ādimhi yena pāpena tvaṃ na sakkhissasi brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ,
atk-vin01a:907_6: taṃ te pāpaṃ alaṃ kukkuccāyāti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:907_12: Bhagavatā hi “imaṃ me dhammaṃ sutvā sattā sabbabhavabhogesu virajjissanti,
atk-vin01a:907_13: no rajjissantī” etadatthāya dhammo desitoti adhippāyo.
atk-vin01a:908_0: Tattha nāma tvanti tasmiṃ nāma tvaṃ.
atk-vin01a:908_1: Sarāgāya cetessasīti saha rāgena vattamānāya methunadhammāya cetessasi kappessasi pakappessasi;
atk-vin01a:908_4: Puna rāgavirāgādīni nava padāni nibbattitalokuttaranibbānameva sandhāya vuttāni.
atk-vin01a:908_5: Tasmā rāgavirāgāyāti vā madanimmadanāyāti vā vuttepi “nibbānatthāyā”ti evameva attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:908_6: Nibbānañhi yasmā taṃ āgamma ārabbha paṭicca rāgo virajjati na hoti,
atk-vin01a:908_9: purisamadādayo madā nimmadā amadā honti vinassanti,
atk-vin01a:908_11: Yasmā ca taṃ āgamma sabbāpi kāmapipāsā vinayaṃ abbhatthaṃ yāti,
atk-vin01a:908_13: Yasmā pana taṃ āgamma pañca kāmaguṇālayā samugghātaṃ gacchanti,
atk-vin01a:908_15: Yasmā ca taṃ āgamma tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ upacchijjati,
atk-vin01a:908_17: Yasmā pana taṃ āgamma sabbaso taṇhā khayaṃ gacchati virajjati nirujjhati ca,
atk-vin01a:908_23: aparāparabhāvāya vinanato ābandhanato saṃsibbanato vānanti laddhavohārāya taṇhāya nikkhantaṃ nissaṭaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a:909_2: Kāmasaññānaṃ pariññāti sabbāsampi kāmasaññānaṃ ñātatīraṇapahānavasena tividhā pariññā akkhātā.
atk-vin01a:909_3: Kāmapipāsānanti kāmesu pātabyatānaṃ kāme vā pātumicchānaṃ.
atk-vin01a:909_6: Imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu kilesakkhayakaro lokuttaramaggova kathito.
atk-vin01a:909_7: Sabbapaṭhamesu pana tīsu ṭhānesu lokiyalokuttaramissako maggo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:910_1: tava pāpakammaṃ appasannānañca pasādāya evarūpānaṃ pasādatthāya na hoti.
atk-vin01a:910_10: tesaṃ sineru viya vātehi acalo pasādo īdisehi vatthūhi ito vā dāruṇatarehi.
atk-vin01a:911_1: Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesunti bhagavato etaṃ atthaṃ ācikkhiṃsu paṭivedayiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:911_2: Ārocayamānā ca neva piyakamyatāya na bhedapurekkhāratāya,
atk-vin01a:911_5: nāpi “idaṃ sutvā bhagavā imassa sāsane patiṭṭhaṃ na dassati,
atk-vin01a:911_7: Atha kho “imaṃ sāsane uppannaṃ abbudaṃ ñatvā bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessati,
atk-vin01a:912_0: Etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇeti ettha sudinnassa ajjhācāravītikkamo sikkhāpadapaññattiyā kāraṇattā nidānañceva pakaraṇañcāti vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:912_1: Kāraṇañhi yasmā nideti attano phalaṃ “gaṇhātha na”nti dassentaṃ viya appeti,
atk-vin01a:912_5: Vigarahi buddho bhagavāti buddho bhagavā vigarahi nindi;
atk-vin01a:912_6: yathā taṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇārahānaṃ vaṇṇañca avaṇṇañca bhaṇantesu aggapuggalo.
atk-vin01a:912_7: Na hi bhagavato sīlavītikkamakaraṃ puggalaṃ disvā “ayaṃ jātiyā vā gottena vā kolaputtiyena vā ganthena
atk-vin01a:912_8: vā dhutaṅgena vā ñāto yasassī īdisaṃ puggalaṃ rakkhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-vin01a:912_9: nāpi pesalaṃ guṇavantaṃ disvā tassa guṇaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-vin01a:912_13: tasmā taṃ tādilakkhaṇe ṭhito avikampamānena cittena vigarahi buddho bhagavā “ananucchavika”ntiādīhi vacanehi.
atk-vin01a:913_4: taṃ samaṇakaraṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ maggaphalanibbānasāsanānaṃ vā na anucchavikaṃ,
atk-vin01a:913_5: tesaṃ chaviṃ chāyaṃ sundarabhāvaṃ na anveti nānugacchati,
atk-vin01a:913_19: Na hi samaṇā yaṃ na kappati,
atk-vin01a:913_26: kiṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ passantoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:913_27: Tato kāraṇābhāvaṃ dassento parato “nanu mayā moghapurisā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:914_0: Idāni yasmā yaṃ tena pāpakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-vin01a:914_2: tasmāssa taṃ vipākaṃ dassetuṃ katāparādhaṃ viya puttaṃ anukampakā mātāpitaro dayālukena cittena sudinnaṃ paribhāsanto “varaṃ te moghapurisā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:914_3: Tattha āsu sīghaṃ etassa visaṃ āgacchatīti āsīviso.
atk-vin01a:914_7: Īdisassa āsīvisassa ghoravisassa mukhe aṅgajātaṃ varaṃ pakkhittaṃ;
atk-vin01a:914_11: Na tvevāti na tu eva varaṃ na sundarameva na sādhumeva na suṭṭhumeva.
atk-vin01a:914_19: Samantato uṭṭhitāhi jālāhi ekappabhāsamudayabhūtāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:915_0: Taṃ kissa hetūti yaṃ mayā vuttaṃ “vara”nti taṃ kissa hetu,
atk-vin01a:915_2: Maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyyāti yo tattha aṅgajātaṃ pakkhipeyya,
atk-vin01a:915_3: so maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ.
atk-vin01a:915_5: upapajjeyyāti yaṃ idaṃ mātugāmassa aṅgajāte aṅgajātapakkhipanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:915_6: itonidānaṃ tassa kārako puggalo nirayaṃ upapajjeyya;
atk-vin01a:915_7: evaṃ kammassa mahāsāvajjataṃ passanto taṃ garahi,
atk-vin01a:915_9: Tattha nāma tvanti tasmiṃ nāma evarūpe kamme evaṃ mahāsāvajje samānepi tvaṃ.
atk-vin01a:915_10: Yaṃ tvanti ettha yanti hīḷanatthe nipāto.
atk-vin01a:915_13: dvīhipi yaṃ vā taṃ vā hīḷitamavaññātanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:915_21: Duṭṭhullanti duṭṭhu ca kilesadūsitaṃ thūlañca asukhumaṃ,
atk-vin01a:915_23: Odakantikanti udakakiccaṃ antikaṃ avasānaṃ assāti odakantiko,
atk-vin01a:915_27: Ayañhi dhammo jigucchanīyattā na sakkā āvi aññesaṃ dassanavisaye kātuṃ,
atk-vin01a:915_34: Samāpajjissasīti etaṃ “tattha nāma tva”nti ettha vuttanāmasaddena yojetabbaṃ “samāpajjissasi nāmā”ti.
atk-vin01a:916_2: Imasmiṃ sāsane tvaṃ bahūnaṃ puggalānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādikattā,
atk-vin01a:916_7: Imañhi lesaṃ laddhā tava anusikkhamānā bahū puggalā nānappakārake makkaṭiyā methunapaṭisevanādike akusaladhamme karissantīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-vin01a:917_3: kosajjassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvāti dubbharatādīnaṃ vatthubhūtassa asaṃvarassa avaṇṇaṃ nindaṃ garahaṃ bhāsitvāti attho.
atk-vin01a:917_4: Yasmā hi asaṃvare ṭhitassa puggalassa attā dubbharatañceva dupposatañca āpajjati,
atk-vin01a:917_7: Yasmā pana asaṃvare ṭhitassa attā catūsu paccayesu mahicchataṃ sineruppamāṇepi ca paccaye laddhā asantuṭṭhitaṃ āpajjati,
atk-vin01a:917_10: Yasmā ca asaṃvare ṭhitassa attā gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ceva kilesasaṅgaṇikāya ca saṃvattati,
atk-vin01a:918_1: vīriyārambhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvāti subharatādīnaṃ vatthubhūtassa saṃvarassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvāti attho.
atk-vin01a:918_2: Yasmā hi asaṃvaraṃ pahāya saṃvare ṭhitassa attā subharo hoti suposo,
atk-vin01a:918_3: catūsu ca paccayesu appicchataṃ nittaṇhabhāvaṃ āpajjati,
atk-vin01a:918_7: tasmā saṃvaro “subharatā ceva suposatā ca appiccho ca santuṭṭho cā”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:919_0: Yasmā pana asaṃvaraṃ pahāya saṃvare ṭhitassa attā kilesasallekhanatāya ceva niddhunanatāya ca saṃvattati,
atk-vin01a:919_1: tasmā saṃvaro “sallekho ca dhuto cā”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:920_0: Yasmā ca asaṃvaraṃ pahāya saṃvare ṭhitassa attā kāyavācānaṃ appāsādikaṃ appasādanīyaṃ asantaṃ asāruppaṃ
atk-vin01a:920_1: kāyavacīduccaritaṃ cittassa appāsādikaṃ appasādanīyaṃ asantaṃ asāruppaṃ akusalavitakkattayañca anupagamma
atk-vin01a:920_2: tabbiparītassa kāyavacīsucaritassa ceva kusalavitakkattayassa ca pāsādikassa pasādanīyassa santassa sāruppassa
atk-vin01a:921_0: Yasmā pana asaṃvaraṃ pahāya saṃvare ṭhitassa attā sabbakilesāpacayabhūtāya,
atk-vin01a:921_3: tasmā saṃvaro “apacayo ceva vīriyārambho cā”ti vuccatīti.
atk-vin01a:922_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ tadanulomikanti tattha sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yaṃ idāni sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessati,
atk-vin01a:922_2: Yo vā ayaṃ subharatādīhi saṃvaro vutto,
atk-vin01a:922_3: tassa anucchavikañceva anulomikañca saṃvarappahānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ asuttantavinibaddhaṃ pāḷivinimuttaṃ okkantikadhammadesanaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-vin01a:922_4: Bhagavā kira īdisesu ṭhānesu pañcavaṇṇakusumamālaṃ karonto viya,
atk-vin01a:922_6: ca ye paṭikkhipanādhippāyā asaṃvarābhiratā te samparāyikena vaṭṭabhayena tajjento anekappakāraṃ ādīnavaṃ dassento,
atk-vin01a:922_7: ye sikkhākāmā saṃvare ṭhitā te appekacce arahatte patiṭṭhapento appekacce anāgāmi-
atk-vin01a:922_9: sotāpattiphalesu upanissayavirahitepi saggamagge patiṭṭhapento dīghanikāyappamāṇampi majjhimanikāyappamāṇampi dhammadesanaṃ karoti.
atk-vin01a:923_0: Tena hīti tena sudinnassa ajjhācārena kāraṇabhūtena.
atk-vin01a:923_5: Atha vā mūlaṃ nissayo patiṭṭhāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:923_7: Methunasaṃvaro hi tadaññesaṃ sikkhāsaṅkhātānaṃ sīlavipassanājhānamaggadhammānaṃ vuttatthavasena padattā idha “sikkhāpada”nti adhippeto.
atk-vin01a:923_11: “sikkhāpadanti yo tattha nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo”ti.
atk-vin01a:923_12: Atha vā yathā “anabhijjhā dhammapada”nti vutte anabhijjhā eko dhammakoṭṭhāsoti attho hoti,
atk-vin01a:923_13: evamidhāpi “sikkhāpada”nti sikkhākoṭṭhāso sikkhāya eko padesotipi attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:924_0: Dasa atthavase paṭiccāti dasa kāraṇavase sikkhāpadapaññattihetu adhigamanīye hitavisese paṭicca āgamma ārabbha,
atk-vin01a:924_1: dasannaṃ hitavisesānaṃ nipphattiṃ sampassamānoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:924_7: tassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hoti,
atk-vin01a:924_10: asampaṭicchane ādīnavaṃ sampaṭicchane ca ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā,
atk-vin01a:924_11: na balakkārena abhibhavitvāti etamatthaṃ āvikaronto āha –
atk-vin01a:925_0: Dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyāti dummaṅkū nāma dussīlapuggalā;
atk-vin01a:925_2: vītikkamaṃ karontā vā katvā vā na lajjanti,
atk-vin01a:925_4: te hi sikkhāpade asati “kiṃ tumhehi diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:925_7: katarasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ katamaṃ āpattiṃ āropetvā amhe niggaṇhathā”ti saṅghaṃ viheṭhessanti,
atk-vin01a:925_8: sikkhāpade pana sati te saṅgho sikkhāpadaṃ dassetvā dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena niggahessati.
atk-vin01a:926_0: Pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyāti pesalānaṃ piyasīlānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya.
atk-vin01a:926_1: Piyasīlā hi bhikkhū kattabbākattabbaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ mariyādaṃ ajānantā sikkhattayapāripūriyā ghaṭamānā kilamanti,
atk-vin01a:926_3: Kattabbākattabbaṃ pana sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ mariyādaṃ ñatvā sikkhattayapāripūriyā ghaṭamānā na kilamanti,
atk-vin01a:926_8: Dussīlapuggale nissāya hi uposatho na tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:926_12: bhikkhū anekaggā uddesaparipucchākammaṭṭhānādīni anuyuñjituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-vin01a:926_13: Dussīlesu pana niggahitesu sabbopi ayaṃ upaddavo na hoti.
atk-vin01a:926_15: Evaṃ “pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsu vihārāyā”ti ettha dvidhā attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:927_0: Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāyāti diṭṭhadhammikā āsavā nāma asaṃvare ṭhitena tasmiññeva attabhāve pattabbā pāṇippahāra-
atk-vin01a:927_5: Iti imesaṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya pidhānāya āgamanamaggathakanāyāti attho.
atk-vin01a:928_0: Samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyāti samparāyikā āsavā nāma asaṃvare ṭhitena katapāpakammamūlakā samparāye narakādīsu pattabbā dukkhavisesā,
atk-vin01a:928_1: tesaṃ paṭighātatthāya paṭippassambhanatthāya vūpasamatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:929_0: Appasannānaṃ pasādāyāti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi sati sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ ñatvā vā yathāpaññattaṃ paṭipajjamāne
atk-vin01a:929_1: bhikkhū disvā vā yepi appasannā paṇḍitamanussā,
atk-vin01a:929_2: te “yāni vata loke mahājanassa rajjana- dussana-
atk-vin01a:929_4: tehi ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā ārakā viratā viharanti,
atk-vin01a:930_0: Pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāyāti yepi sāsane pasannā kulaputtā tepi sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ ñatvā yathāpaññattaṃ
atk-vin01a:930_1: paṭipajjamāne bhikkhū vā disvā “aho ayyā dukkarakārino,
atk-vin01a:930_2: ye yāvajīvaṃ ekabhattaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vinayasaṃvaraṃ anupālentī”ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdanti.
atk-vin01a:931_9: Cattāro ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañcāti ayaṃ “adhigamasaddhammo” nāma.
atk-vin01a:931_10: So sabbopi yasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati bhikkhū sikkhāpadañca tassa vibhaṅgañca tadatthajotanatthaṃ aññañca buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanti,
atk-vin01a:931_11: yathāpaññattañca paṭipajjamānā paṭipattiṃ pūretvā paṭipattiyā adhigantabbaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigacchanti,
atk-vin01a:932_0: Vinayānuggahāyāti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi sati saṃvaravinayo ca pahānavinayo ca samathavinayo ca paññattivinayo
atk-vin01a:932_1: cāti catubbidhopi vinayo anuggahito hoti upatthambhito sūpatthambhito.
atk-vin01a:933_0: Sabbāneva cetāni padāni “sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmī”ti iminā vacanena saddhiṃ yojetabbāni.
atk-vin01a:934_0: Api cettha yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu taṃ saṅghaphāsu,
atk-vin01a:934_1: yaṃ saṅghaphāsu taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyāti evaṃ saṅkhalikanayaṃ;
atk-vin01a:934_3: yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyāti evañca ekekapadamūlikaṃ dasakkhattuṃ yojanaṃ katvā yaṃ vuttaṃ parivāre –
atk-vin01a:937_0: Taṃ sabbaṃ veditabbaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ yasmā parivāreyeva āvi bhavissati, tasmā idha na vaṇṇitanti.
atk-vin01a:938_0: Evaṃ sikkhāpadapaññattiyā ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā tasmiṃ sikkhāpade bhikkhūhi kattabbakiccaṃ dīpento “evañca pana,
atk-vin01a:938_5: imaṃ pana mayā iti sandassitānisaṃsaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ evaṃ pātimokkhuddese uddiseyyātha ca pariyāpuṇeyyātha ca dhāreyyātha ca aññesañca vāceyyāthāti.
atk-vin01a:939_0: Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “imaṃ sikkhāpada”nti taṃ dassento “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya,
atk-vin01a:939_2: Evaṃ mūlacchejjavasena daḷhaṃ katvā paṭhamapārājike paññatte aparampi anupaññattatthāya makkaṭīvatthu udapādi.
atk-vin01a:939_4: evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hotīti.
atk-vin01a:939_6: bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ evaṃ paññattaṃ hoti ca,
atk-vin01a:943_1: Idāni yaṃ taṃ aññaṃ vatthu uppannaṃ,
atk-vin01a:943_4: makkaṭiṃ āmisenāti mahāvane bhikkhūnaṃ khantimettādiguṇānubhāvena nirāsaṅkacittā bahū migamorakukkuṭamakkaṭādayo
atk-vin01a:943_6: Tatra ekaṃ makkaṭiṃ āmisena yāgubhattakhajjakādinā upalāpetvā,
atk-vin01a:943_12: Senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantāti te bhikkhū āgantukā buddhadassanāya āgatā pātova āgantukabhattāni labhitvā
atk-vin01a:943_16: Yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamīti tiracchānagatā nāma ekabhikkhunā saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ katvā aññesupi tādisaññeva cittaṃ uppādenti.
atk-vin01a:943_17: Tasmā sā makkaṭī yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
atk-vin01a:943_18: upasaṅkamitvā ca attano vissāsikabhikkhusseva tesampi taṃ vikāraṃ dassesi.
atk-vin01a:944_2: Nimittampi akāsīti yena niyāmena yāya kiriyāya methunādhippāyaṃ te jānanti taṃ akāsīti attho.
atk-vin01a:944_4: Ekamantaṃ nilīyiṃsūti ekasmiṃ okāse paṭicchannā acchiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:945_1: āvusoti sahoḍḍhaggahito coro viya paccakkhaṃ disvā coditattā “kiṃ vā mayā kata”ntiādīni vattuṃ asakkonto “saccaṃ,
atk-vin01a:945_3: tatheva taṃ hotīti āvuso yathā manussitthiyā,
atk-vin01a:945_4: nanu tiracchānagatitthiyāpi taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ tatheva hoti.
atk-vin01a:945_5: Manussitthiyāpi hi dassanampi gahaṇampi āmasanampi phusanampi ghaṭṭanampi duṭṭhullameva.
atk-vin01a:946_1: Antamaso tiracchānagatāyapi pārājiko hoti asaṃvāsoti tiracchānagatāyapi methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā pārājiko yeva hotīti daḷhataraṃ sikkhāpadamakāsi.
atk-vin01a:946_5: Tattha yassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
atk-vin01a:946_8: Tattha lokavajje anupaññatti uppajjamānā rundhantī dvāraṃ pidahantī sotaṃ pacchindamānā gāḷhataraṃ karontī uppajjati,
atk-vin01a:946_10: aññatra supinantāti ayaṃ pana vītikkamābhāvā abbohārikattā ca vuttā.
atk-vin01a:946_11: Paṇṇattivajje akate vītikkame uppajjamānā sithilaṃ karontī mocentī dvāraṃ dadamānā aparāparampi anāpattiṃ kurumānā uppajjati,
atk-vin01a:946_13: “Antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapī”ti evarūpā pana kate vītikkame uppannattā paññattigatikāva hoti.
atk-vin01a:946_16: tasmā ayamanupaññatti rundhantī dvāraṃ pidahantī sotaṃ pacchindamānā gāḷhataraṃ karontī uppajji.
atk-vin01a:947_0: Evaṃ dvepi vatthūni sampiṇḍetvā mūlacchejjavasena daḷhataraṃ katvā paṭhamapārājike paññatte aparampi anupaññattatthāya vajjiputtakavatthu udapādi.
atk-vin01a:947_4: bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ evaṃ paññattaṃ hoti ca idañca aññampi vatthu udapādīti.
atk-vin01a:951_1: Idāni yaṃ taṃ aññampi vatthu uppannaṃ,
atk-vin01a:951_6: Sāsane kira yo yo upaddavo ādīnavo abbudamuppajji,
atk-vin01a:951_8: Tathā hi devadattopi vajjiputtake pakkhe labhitvā saṅghaṃ bhindi.
atk-vin01a:951_9: Vajjiputtakā eva ca vassasataparinibbute bhagavati uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:951_10: Imepi tesaṃ yeva ekacce evaṃ paññattepi sikkhāpade yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjiṃsu…pe…
atk-vin01a:952_0: Ñātibyasanenapīti ettha asanaṃ byasanaṃ vikkhepo viddhaṃsanaṃ vināsoti sabbametaṃ ekatthaṃ.
atk-vin01a:952_5: Tatiyapade pana ārogyavināsako rogo eva rogabyasanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:952_6: So hi ārogyaṃ byasati vikkhipati vināsetīti byasanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:953_11: Vipassakā kusalānaṃ dhammānanti ye aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesu vibhattā kusalā dhammā,
atk-vin01a:953_13: tato tato ārammaṇato vuṭṭhāya teva dhamme vipassamānāti attho.
atk-vin01a:953_20: Anuyuttā vihareyyāmāti gihipalibodhaṃ āvāsapalibodhañca pahāya vivittesu senāsanesu yuttapayuttā anaññakiccā vihareyyāma.
atk-vin01a:954_0: Evamāvusoti thero etesaṃ āsayaṃ ajānanto idaṃ nesaṃ mahāgajjitaṃ sutvā “sace ime īdisā bhavissanti,
atk-vin01a:954_3: Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha tadāyattavuttibhāvena phalaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-vin01a:954_4: Yasmā cassa taṃ okāso hoti tadāyattavuttibhāvena,
atk-vin01a:954_9: Etaṃ ṭhānaṃ vā okāso vā natthi.
atk-vin01a:954_10: Yaṃ tathāgatoti yena tathāgato vajjīnaṃ vā…pe…
atk-vin01a:954_13: Yadi hi bhagavā etesaṃ “labheyyāma upasampada”nti yācantānaṃ upasampadaṃ dadeyya,
atk-vin01a:954_14: evaṃ sante “pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti paññattaṃ samūhaneyya.
atk-vin01a:955_0: So āgato na upasampādetabboti “yadi hi evaṃ āgato upasampadaṃ labheyya,
atk-vin01a:955_2: Sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ pana ṭhito sagāravo ca bhavissati,
atk-vin01a:955_3: attatthañca karissatī”ti ñatvā anukampamāno bhagavā āha –
atk-vin01a:955_5: So āgato upasampādetabboti evaṃ āgato bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā avipannasīlatāya sāsane sagāravo bhavissati,
atk-vin01a:955_6: so sati upanissaye nacirasseva uttamatthaṃ pāpuṇissatīti ñatvā upasampādetabboti āha.
atk-vin01a:956_0: Evaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā āgatesu anupasampādetabbañca upasampādetabbañca dassetvā tīṇipi vatthūni
atk-vin01a:956_1: samodhānetvā paripuṇṇaṃ katvā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetukāmo “evañca pana,
atk-vin01a:956_3: imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti vatvā “yo pana bhikkhu…pe…
atk-vin01a:959_3: Tasmiṃ pana sikkhāpade ca sikkhāpadavibhaṅge ca sakale ca vinayavinicchaye kosallaṃ patthayantena catubbidho vinayo jānitabbo –
atk-vin01a:965_0: Ācariyavādo nāma dhammasaṅgāhakehi pañcahi arahantasatehi ṭhapitā pāḷivinimuttā okkantavinicchayappavattā aṭṭhakathātanti.
atk-vin01a:966_2: ācariyavāde muñcitvā anumānena attano anubuddhiyā nayaggāhena upaṭṭhitākārakathanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:967_0: Apica suttantābhidhammavinayaṭṭhakathāsu āgato sabbopi theravādo “attanomati” nāma.
atk-vin01a:967_1: Taṃ pana attanomatiṃ gahetvā kathentena na daḷhaggāhaṃ gahetvā voharitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:967_5: Sace tattha otarati ceva sameti ca,
atk-vin01a:969_8: Tehi aññamaññaṃ khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvā suttānulomaṃ sutte otāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:969_15: Tehipi aññamaññaṃ khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvā ācariyavādo sutte otāretabbo.
atk-vin01a:969_18: Anotaranto asamento ca gārayhācariyavādo na gahetabbo;
atk-vin01a:970_2: Tehipi aññamaññaṃ khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvā attanomati sutte otāretabbā.
atk-vin01a:971_6: No ce tathā paññāyati na otarati na sameti,
atk-vin01a:971_7: bāhirakasuttaṃ vā hoti siloko vā aññaṃ vā gārayhasuttaṃ guḷhavessantaraguḷhavinayavedallādīnaṃ aññatarato āgataṃ,
atk-vin01a:979_8: Sabbaṭṭhānesu ca khepo vā garahā vā na kātabbāti.
atk-vin01a:981_0: Athāyaṃ tassa kappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti,
atk-vin01a:981_3: Atha paro tassa akappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti,
atk-vin01a:981_4: anena attano gahaṇanti katvā daḷhaṃ ādāya na ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:983_3: Atha paro bahūhi suttavinicchayakāraṇehi kappiyabhāvaṃ dasseti,
atk-vin01a:983_8: Yathā cāyaṃ kappiyākappiye akappiyakappiye ca vinicchayo vutto;
atk-vin01a:984_3: Sabbaso pana kāraṇaṃ vinicchayaṃ alabhantena suttaṃ na jahitabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:984_5: Evaṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade ca sikkhāpadavibhaṅge ca sakale ca vinayavinicchaye kosallaṃ patthayantena ayaṃ catubbidho vinayo jānitabbo.
atk-vin01a:985_0: Imañca pana catubbidhaṃ vinayaṃ ñatvāpi vinayadharena puggalena tilakkhaṇasamannāgatena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:985_3: “Suttañcassa svāgataṃ hoti suppavatti suvinicchitaṃ suttato anubyañjanato”ti idamekaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a:985_4: “Vinaye kho pana ṭhito hoti asaṃhīro”ti idaṃ dutiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:985_5: “Ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hoti sumanasikatā sūpadhāritā”ti idaṃ tatiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:986_2: Suppavattīti suṭṭhu pavattaṃ paguṇaṃ vācuggataṃ suvinicchitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:986_3: Suttato anubyañjanatoti pāḷito ca paripucchato ca aṭṭhakathāto ca suvinicchitaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:987_0: Vinaye kho pana ṭhito hotīti vinaye lajjībhāvena patiṭṭhito hoti.
atk-vin01a:987_1: Alajjī hi bahussutopi samāno lābhagarutāya tantiṃ visaṃvādetvā uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpetvā sāsane mahantaṃ upaddavaṃ karoti.
atk-vin01a:987_3: Lajjī pana kukkuccako sikkhākāmo jīvitahetupi tantiṃ avisaṃvādetvā dhammameva vinayameva ca dīpeti,
atk-vin01a:987_5: Tathā hi pubbe mahātherā tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ nicchāresuṃ –
atk-vin01a:987_10: so vinayaṃ avijahanto avokkamanto lajjībhāvena vinaye ṭhito hoti suppatiṭṭhitoti.
atk-vin01a:987_11: Asaṃhīroti saṃhīro nāma yo pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhato vā uparito vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno
atk-vin01a:987_13: yaṃ yaṃ parena vuccati taṃ taṃ anujānāti;
atk-vin01a:987_15: Yo pana pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāya vā heṭṭhupariyena vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno na vitthunati na vipphandati,
atk-vin01a:987_16: ekekalomaṃ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya “evaṃ mayaṃ vadāma;
atk-vin01a:987_18: yamhi pāḷi ca pāḷivinicchayo ca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ agacchanto tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:988_0: Ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hotīti theraparamparā vaṃsaparamparā cassa suu gahitā hoti.
atk-vin01a:988_3: Sūpadhāritāti suṭṭhu upadhāritā pubbāparānusandhito atthato kāraṇato ca upadhāritā;
atk-vin01a:988_4: attano matiṃ pahāya ācariyasuddhiyā vattā hoti “mayhaṃ ācariyo asukācariyassa santike uggaṇhi,
atk-vin01a:988_5: so asukassā”ti evaṃ sabbaṃ ācariyaparamparaṃ theravādaṅgaṃ āharitvā yāva upālitthero sammāsambuddhassa santike uggaṇhīti pāpetvā ṭhapeti.
atk-vin01a:988_6: Tatopi āharitvā upālitthero sammāsambuddhassa santike uggaṇhi,
atk-vin01a:988_10: moggaliputtatissatthero attano upajjhāyassa siggavattherassa caṇḍavajjittherassa cāti.
atk-vin01a:988_11: Evaṃ sabbaṃ ācariyaparamparaṃ theravādaṅgaṃ āharitvā attano ācariyaṃ pāpetvā ṭhapeti.
atk-vin01a:988_12: Evaṃ uggahitā hi ācariyaparamparā suggahitā hoti.
atk-vin01a:988_13: Evaṃ asakkontena pana avassaṃ dve tayo parivaṭṭā uggahetabbā.
atk-vin01a:988_14: Sabbapacchimena hi nayena yathā ācariyo ca ācariyācariyo ca pāḷiñca paripucchañca vadanti,
atk-vin01a:989_0: Imehi ca pana tīhi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatena vinayadharena vatthuvinicchayatthaṃ sannipatite saṅghe otiṇṇe
atk-vin01a:989_1: vatthusmiṃ codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe sahasā avinicchinitvāva cha ṭhānāni oloketabbāni.
atk-vin01a:990_0: Vatthuṃ olokentopi hi “tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:990_3: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ ekaccaṃ āpattiṃ passati.
atk-vin01a:990_4: So taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
atk-vin01a:991_0: Mātikaṃ olokentopi “sampajānamusāvāde pācittiya”ntiādinā nayena pañcannaṃ āpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ āpattiṃ passati,
atk-vin01a:991_1: so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
atk-vin01a:992_0: Padabhājanīyaṃ olokentopi “akkhayite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
atk-vin01a:992_2: Yebhuyyena khayite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
atk-vin01a:992_3: āpatti thullaccayassā”tiādinā nayena sattannaṃ āpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ āpattiṃ passati,
atk-vin01a:992_4: so padabhājanīyato suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
atk-vin01a:993_0: Tikaparicchedaṃ olokentopi tikasaṅghādisesaṃ vā tikapācittiyaṃ vā tikadukkaṭaṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpattiṃ tikaparicchede passati,
atk-vin01a:993_1: so tato suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
atk-vin01a:994_1: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ yā sikkhāpadantaresu antarāpatti hoti taṃ passati,
atk-vin01a:994_2: so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
atk-vin01a:995_6: ajānantassā”ti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade niddiṭṭhaṃ anāpattiṃ passati,
atk-vin01a:995_7: so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
atk-vin01a:996_0: Yo hi bhikkhu catubbidhavinayakovido tilakkhaṇasampanno imāni cha ṭhānāni oloketvā adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati,
atk-vin01a:996_3: Taṃ cevaṃ vinicchayakusalaṃ bhikkhuṃ koci katasikkhāpadavītikkamo bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā attano kukkuccaṃ puccheyya;
atk-vin01a:996_4: tena sādhukaṃ sallakkhetvā sace anāpatti hoti,
atk-vin01a:996_18: tasmā visesena taṃvatthukaṃ kukkuccaṃ pucchiyamāno “āpattī”ti avatvā sacassa ācariyo dharati,
atk-vin01a:996_19: tato tena so bhikkhu “amhākaṃ ācariyaṃ pucchā”ti pesetabbo.
atk-vin01a:996_20: Sace so puna āgantvā “tumhākaṃ ācariyo suttato nayato oloketvā ‘satekiccho’ti maṃ āhā”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a:996_21: tato anena so “sādhu suṭṭhu yaṃ ācariyo bhaṇati taṃ karohī”ti vattabbo.
atk-vin01a:996_27: Tenāpi “satekiccho”ti vinicchite “sādhu suṭṭhu tassa vacanaṃ karohī”ti vattabbo.
atk-vin01a:996_32: Tenāpi “satekiccho”ti vinicchite “sādhu suṭṭhu tassa vacanaṃ karohī”ti vattabbo.
atk-vin01a:996_36: tato dullabhatarā pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca.
atk-vin01a:996_38: “vivittaṃ okāsaṃ sammajjitvā divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā sīlāni sodhetvā dvattiṃsākāraṃ tāva manasi karohī”ti.
atk-vin01a:996_39: Sace tassa arogaṃ sīlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭayati,
atk-vin01a:996_43: So divasātikkame upaṭṭhānaṃ āgato evaṃ vattabbo –
atk-vin01a:997_6: Ārocitāya cittappavattiyā “natthi loke raho nāma pāpakammaṃ pakubbato.
atk-vin01a:997_8: athassa ārakkhadevatā paracittavidū samaṇabrāhmaṇā aññā ca devatā jānanti,
atk-vin01a:997_9: tvaṃyeva dāni tava sotthiṃ pariyesāhī”ti vattabbo.
atk-vin01a:1001_1: Yaṃ vuttaṃ yo panāti yo yādisotiādi.
atk-vin01a:1001_7: tasmā tassa atthaṃ dassento aniyamena puggaladīpakaṃ yo saddameva āha.
atk-vin01a:1001_9: yo panāti yo yokocīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:1001_11: so avassaṃ liṅga- yutta- jāti- nāma- gotta- sīla- vihāra-
atk-vin01a:1001_13: tasmā taṃ tathā ñāpetuṃ taṃ pabhedaṃ pakāsento “yādiso”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:1001_14: Tattha yādisoti liṅgavasena yādiso vā tādiso vā hotu;
atk-vin01a:1001_15: dīgho vā rasso vā kāḷo vā odāto vā maṅguracchavi vā kiso vā thūlo vāti attho.
atk-vin01a:1001_16: Yathāyuttoti yogavasena yena vā tena vā yutto hotu;
atk-vin01a:1001_17: navakammayutto vā uddesayutto vā vāsadhurayutto vāti attho.
atk-vin01a:1001_18: Yathājaccoti jātivasena yaṃjacco vā taṃjacco vā hotu;
atk-vin01a:1001_19: khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vāti attho.
atk-vin01a:1001_20: Yathānāmoti nāmavasena yathānāmo vā tathānāmo vā hotu;
atk-vin01a:1001_21: buddharakkhito vā dhammarakkhito vā saṅgharakkhito vāti attho.
atk-vin01a:1001_22: Yathāgottoti gottavasena yathāgotto vā tathāgotto vā yena vā tena vā gottena hotu;
atk-vin01a:1001_23: kaccāyano vā vāsiṭṭho vā kosiyo vāti attho.
atk-vin01a:1001_24: Yathāsīloti sīlesu yathāsīlo vā tathāsīlo vā hotu;
atk-vin01a:1001_25: navakammasīlo vā uddesasīlo vā vāsadhurasīlo vāti attho.
atk-vin01a:1001_26: Yathāvihārīti vihāresupi yathāvihārī vā tathāvihārī vā hotu;
atk-vin01a:1001_27: navakammavihārī vā uddesavihārī vā vāsadhuravihārī vāti attho.
atk-vin01a:1001_28: Yathāgocaroti gocaresupi yathāgocaro vā tathāgocaro vā hotu;
atk-vin01a:1001_29: navakammagocaro vā uddesagocaro vā vāsadhuragocaro vāti attho.
atk-vin01a:1001_30: Thero vāti ādīsu vayovuḍḍhādīsu yo vā so vā hotu;
