atk-vin01a:2769_11: Ettāvatā kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:2769_13: Sace kiñci vikkāyikabhaṇḍaṃ pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā āgacchati,
atk-vin01a:2769_14: “idaṃ gahessatha bhante”ti vutte “upāsaka atthi amhākaṃ iminā attho,
atk-vin01a:2769_22: Evampi kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitameva hoti,
atk-vin01a:2769_23: so ce taṃ gahetvā tassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2770_0: Saṅghamajjhe nissajjitabbanti ettha yasmā rūpiyaṃ nāma akappiyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2770_1: “tasmā nissajjitabbaṃ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā”ti na vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2770_2: Yasmā pana taṃ paṭiggahitamattameva na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2770_4: Kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ sappi vāti “pabbajitānaṃ sappi vā telaṃ vā vaṭṭati upāsakā”ti evaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2771_0: Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbeheva paribhuñjitabbanti sabbehi bhājetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2771_2: Aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā ārāmikānaṃ vā pattabhāgampi labhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2771_3: antamaso makkaṭādīhi tato haritvā araññe ṭhapitaṃ vā tesaṃ hatthato gaḷitaṃ vā tiracchānagatapariggahitampi paṃsukūlampi na vaṭṭatiyeva,
atk-vin01a:2771_4: tato āhaṭena phāṇitena senāsanadhūpanampi na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2771_5: Sappinā vā telena vā padīpaṃ katvā dīpāloke nipajjituṃ kasiṇaparikammampi kātuṃ,
atk-vin01a:2771_7: Telamadhuphāṇitehi pana sarīre vaṇaṃ makkhetuṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin01a:2771_13: Taṃ vatthuṃ vissajjetvā katena maggenapi setunāpi nāvāyapi uḷumpenapi gantuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2771_14: tena vatthunā khanāpitāya pokkharaṇiyā ubbhidodakaṃ pātuṃ vā paribhuñjituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2771_15: Anto udake pana asati aññaṃ āgantukaṃ udakaṃ vā vassodakaṃ vā paviṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2771_16: Kītāya yena udakena saddhiṃ kītā taṃ āgantukampi na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2771_17: taṃ vatthuṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjati,
atk-vin01a:2771_21: Yadi bhūmipi bījampi akappiyaṃ neva bhūmiṃ na phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2771_22: Sace bhūmiṃyeva kiṇitvā aññāni bījāni ropitāni phalaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2771_25: bhūmiyaṃ nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2772_0: Sace so chaḍḍetīti yattha katthaci khipati,
atk-vin01a:2772_4: No ce chaḍḍetīti atha neva gahetvā gacchati,
atk-vin01a:2772_6: kiṃ mayhaṃ iminā byāpārenāti yena kāmaṃ pakkamati,
atk-vin01a:2773_0: Yo na chandāgatintiādīsu lobhavasena taṃ vatthuṃ attano vā karonto attānaṃ vā ukkaṃsento chandāgatiṃ nāma gacchati.
atk-vin01a:2773_2: na vinaya”nti paraṃ apasādento dosāgatiṃ nāma gacchati.
atk-vin01a:2773_3: Mohavasena muṭṭhapamuṭṭhassatibhāvaṃ āpajjanto mohāgatiṃ nāma gacchati.
atk-vin01a:2773_4: Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa bhayena chaḍḍetuṃ avisahanto bhayāgatiṃ nāma gacchati.
atk-vin01a:2774_2: akkhīni nimmīletvā nadiyā vā papāte vā vanagahane vā gūthaṃ viya anapekkhena patitokāsaṃ asamannāharantena pātetabbanti attho.
atk-vin01a:2774_3: Evaṃ jigucchitabbepi rūpiye bhagavā pariyāyena bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-vin01a:2774_4: Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa pana kenaci pariyāyena tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2774_6: evaṃ asantasambhāvanāya vā kuladūsakakammena vā kuhanādīhi vā uppannapaccayā neva tassa na aññassa vaṭṭanti,
atk-vin01a:2774_7: dhammena samena uppannāpi appaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin01a:2775_5: Tattha saṅghamajjhepi nisīditvā paribhuñjantassa dussīlassa paribhogo “theyyaparibhogo” nāma.
atk-vin01a:2775_14: evaṃ santepi paṭiggahaṇe satiṃ katvā paribhoge akarontasseva āpatti,
atk-vin01a:2775_15: paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpatti.
atk-vin01a:2776_8: tañhi na puna evaṃ karissāmīti cittādhiṭṭhānasaṃvareneva sujjhanato “saṃvarasuddhī”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:2776_10: tañhi anesanaṃ pahāya dhammena samena paccaye uppādentassa pariyesanāya suddhattā “pariyeṭṭhisuddhī”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:2776_12: tañhi “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevatī”tiādinā nayena vuttena paccavekkhaṇena sujjhanato “paccavekkhaṇasuddhī”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:2776_14: “paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpattī”ti.
atk-vin01a:2777_2: tasmā pitusantakānaṃ paccayānaṃ dāyādā hutvā te paccaye paribhuñjanti.
atk-vin01a:2777_3: Kiṃ pana te bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjanti,
atk-vin01a:2777_5: Gihīhi dinnāpi bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato santakā honti,
atk-vin01a:2777_6: tasmā te bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjantīti veditabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2778_1: te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjantīti.
atk-vin01a:2778_2: Imesu paribhogesu sāmiparibhogo ca dāyajjaparibhogo ca sabbesampi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2780_0: Tattha alajjino lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2780_2: Lajjino alajjinā saddhiṃ yāva na jānāti,
atk-vin01a:2780_4: Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthi,
atk-vin01a:2780_5: tasmā yadāssa alajjībhāvaṃ jānāti tadā vattabbo “tumhe kāyadvāre ca vacīdvāre ca vītikkamaṃ karotha,
atk-vin01a:2780_10: Yopi attano bhārabhūtena alajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ karoti,
atk-vin01a:2780_15: Alajjino pana alajjināva saddhiṃ paribhoge āpatti nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a:2780_16: Lajjino lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo dvinnaṃ khattiyakumārānaṃ suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ bhojanasadisoti.
atk-vin01a:2781_1: Tattha sace puggalopi alajjī piṇḍapātopi adhammiyo,
atk-vin01a:2781_5: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana dussīlo saṅghato uddesabhattādīni labhitvā saṅghasseva deti,
atk-vin01a:2782_0: Apare dve paggahā; dve ca paribhogā – lajjipaggaho, alajjipaggaho; dhammaparibhogo āmisaparibhogoti.
atk-vin01a:2783_6: Itaropi “amhākaṃ ācariyo īdiso ca īdiso cā”ti tassa parisati vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
atk-vin01a:2784_3: Yo pana koṭiyaṃ ṭhito gantho tassa puggalassa accayena nassissati,
atk-vin01a:2785_1: mahābhaye kira ekasseva bhikkhuno mahāniddeso paguṇo ahosi.
atk-vin01a:2785_2: Atha catunikāyikatissattherassa upajjhāyo mahātipiṭakatthero nāma mahārakkhitattheraṃ āha –
atk-vin01a:2785_9: tumhesu nisinnesu gaṇhissāmī”ti paṭṭhapetvā rattindivaṃ nirantaraṃ pariyāpuṇanto osānadivase heṭṭhāmañce itthiṃ disvā “bhante,
atk-vin01a:2785_12: na īdisassa santike dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya”nti āha.
atk-vin01a:2785_13: Tassa pana santike bahū mahātherā uggaṇhitvā mahāniddesaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:2786_0: 586. Rūpiye rūpiyasaññīti ettha sabbampi jātarūparajataṃ rūpiyasaṅgahameva gatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2787_0: Rūpiye vematikoti “suvaṇṇaṃ nu kho, kharapattaṃ nu kho”tiādinā nayena saṃsayajāto.
atk-vin01a:2788_1: Apica puññakāmā rājorodhādayo bhattakhajjakagandhapiṇḍādīsu pakkhipitvā hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ denti,
atk-vin01a:2788_2: coḷabhikkhāya carantānaṃ dassante baddhakahāpaṇādīhiyeva saddhiṃ coḷakāni denti,
atk-vin01a:2788_3: bhikkhū bhattādisaññāya vā coḷakasaññāya vā paṭiggaṇhanti,
atk-vin01a:2788_4: evampi rūpiye arūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ gaṇhātīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:2788_5: Paṭiggaṇhantena pana “imasmiṃ gehe idaṃ laddha”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2789_2: siyā akiriyaṃ paṭikkhepassa akaraṇato rūpiyaaññavādakaupassutisikkhāpadāni hi tīṇi ekaparicchedāni,
atk-vin01a:2792_4: Samāpajjantīti paṭiggahaṇasseva paṭikkhitattā paṭiggahitaparivattane dosaṃ apassantā karonti.
atk-vin01a:2794_0: Rūpiye rūpiyasaññītiādimhi purimasikkhāpade vuttavatthūsu nissaggiyavatthunā nissaggiyavatthuṃ cetāpentassa
atk-vin01a:2794_3: Nissaggiyavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuṃ vā kappiyavatthuṃ vā cetāpentassapi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a:2794_4: Yo hi ayaṃ arūpiye rūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ cetāpetītiādi dutiyo tiko vutto,
atk-vin01a:2794_5: tassānulomattā avuttopi ayamaparopi rūpiye rūpiyasaññī arūpiyaṃ cetāpetītiādi tiko veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:2794_6: Attano vā hi arūpiyena parassa rūpiyaṃ cetāpeyya attano vā rūpiyena parassa arūpiyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2794_8: tasmā pāḷiyaṃ ekantena rūpiyapakkhe ekoyeva tiko vuttoti.
atk-vin01a:2795_0: Dukkaṭavatthunā pana nissaggiyavatthuṃ cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2795_4: kappiyavatthuṃ vā cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2795_10: Na hi dānaggahaṇato añño kayavikkayo nāma atthi,
atk-vin01a:2795_13: Idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ rūpiyena ca rūpiyārūpiyacetāpanaṃ arūpiyena ca rūpiyacetāpanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2795_14: Dukkaṭavatthunā pana dukkaṭavatthuno cetāpanaṃ neva idha na tattha pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2795_17: tatheva tassa vā tena vā cetāpanepi dukkaṭaṃ yuttanti bhagavato adhippāyaññūhi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2796_0: Kappiyavatthunā pana nissaggiyavatthuṃ cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena anāpatti,
atk-vin01a:2796_4: Teneva kappiyavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuṃ cetāpentassa mūlapaṭiggahaṇe tatheva anāpatti,
atk-vin01a:2796_7: Kappiyavatthunā pana kappiyavatthuṃ aññatra sahadhammikehi cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena anāpatti,
atk-vin01a:2796_8: pacchā parivattane upari kayavikkayasikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2797_0: Imassa ca rūpiyasaṃvohārassa garukabhāvadīpakaṃ idaṃ pattacatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2797_1: Yo hi rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā tena ayabījaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-vin01a:2797_2: taṃ koṭṭāpetvā tena lohena pattaṃ kāreti,
atk-vin01a:2797_4: na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātuṃ.
atk-vin01a:2797_5: Sace hi taṃ vināsetvā thālakaṃ kāreti,
atk-vin01a:2797_11: Vāsiphalaṃ tāpetvā udakaṃ vā khīraṃ vā uṇhāpeti,
atk-vin01a:2798_0: Yo pana rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā tena pattaṃ kiṇāti,
atk-vin01a:2798_4: so hi mūle mūlasāmikānaṃ patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hoti.
atk-vin01a:2799_0: Yopi rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā kappiyakārakena saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti vadati.
atk-vin01a:2799_1: Kappiyakārako ca taṃ rūpiyaṃ datvā kammāraṃ saññāpeti,
atk-vin01a:2800_0: Yo pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā “therassa pattaṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti pahitakappiyakārakena saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ
atk-vin01a:2800_1: gantvā pattaṃ disvā “ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā imaṃ dehī”ti kahāpaṇe dāpetvā gahito,
atk-vin01a:2800_2: ayaṃ patto etasseva bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati dubbicāritattā,
atk-vin01a:2801_0: Mahāsumattherassa kira upajjhāyo anuruddhatthero nāma ahosi.
atk-vin01a:2801_1: So attano evarūpaṃ pattaṃ sappissa pūretvā saṅghassa nissajji.
atk-vin01a:2801_3: Taṃ theropi sappissa pūrāpetvā saṅghassa nissajjāpesīti.
atk-vin01a:2802_0: Sace pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā “therassa pattaṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti pahitakappiyakārakena saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ
atk-vin01a:2802_1: gantvā pattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti vā “imāhaṃ gahessāmī”ti vā vadati,
atk-vin01a:2802_2: kappiyakārako ca taṃ rūpiyaṃ datvā kammāraṃ saññāpeti,
atk-vin01a:2803_2: Āpatti dukkaṭassāti sace tena arūpiyaṃ cetāpeti dukkaṭāpatti hoti.
atk-vin01a:2803_4: Arūpiyasaññissa pana pañcahi sahadhammikehi saddhi “idaṃ gahetvā idaṃ dethā”ti kayavikkayaṃ karontassāpi anāpatti.
atk-vin01a:2807_2: Tattha kati hipi tyāyanti kati te ayaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2807_5: ayaṃ dubbalasaṅghāṭi tava kati divasāni bhavissatīti attho.
atk-vin01a:2807_10: Katihipi myāyanti idampi eteneva nayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2807_11: Gihīpi naṃ gihissāti ettha nanti nāmatthe nipāto,
atk-vin01a:2808_2: Tenevassa padabhājane cīvaraṃ ādiṃ katvā dasikasuttapariyosānaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍameva dassitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2808_5: “Iminā imaṃ dehī”tiādinā hi nayena parassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhanto kayaṃ samāpajjati,
atk-vin01a:2809_3: Yato kayitañca hoti vikkayitañcāti yadā kayitañca hoti parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ karontena,
atk-vin01a:2809_5: “Iminā ima”ntiādivacanānurūpato pana pāṭhe paṭhamaṃ attano bhaṇḍaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2810_0: Nissajjitabbanti evaṃ parassa hatthato kayavasena gahitakappiyabhaṇḍaṃ nissajjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2810_1: Ayañhi kayavikkayo ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike avasesehi gihipabbajitehi antamaso mātāpitūhipi saddhiṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2811_1: vatthena vā vatthaṃ hotu bhattena vā bhattaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2811_2: yaṃ kiñci kappiyaṃ “iminā imaṃ dehī”ti vadati, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2811_3: Evaṃ vatvā mātuyāpi attano bhaṇḍaṃ deti, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2811_5: imaṃ te dassāmī”ti vatvā vā mātuyāpi bhaṇḍaṃ attanā gaṇhāti, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2811_6: Attano bhaṇḍe parahatthaṃ parabhaṇḍe ca attano hatthaṃ sampatte nissaggiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2811_7: Mātaraṃ pana pitaraṃ vā “imaṃ dehī”ti vadato viññatti na hoti.
atk-vin01a:2811_12: Tasmā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ parivattentena mātāpitūhipi saddhiṃ kayavikkayaṃ aññātakehi saddhiṃ tisso āpattiyo mocentena parivattetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2812_2: so antarāmagge bhattahatthaṃ purisaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ taṇḍulā atthi,
atk-vin01a:2812_5: Puriso taṇḍule gahetvā bhattaṃ deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2812_10: amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca atthoti bhaṇatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:2812_11: Yo pana evaṃ akatvā “iminā imaṃ dehī”ti parivatteti;
atk-vin01a:2812_14: rajanaṃ vā dārūni vā āharā”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a:2812_16: “Imaṃ odanaṃ bhuñjitvā idaṃ nāma karothā”ti dantakārādīhi sippikehi dhamakaraṇādīsu taṃ taṃ parikkhāraṃ kāreti,
atk-vin01a:2812_22: Sace pana “idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā idaṃ karothā”ti na vadati “idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñja bhuttosi bhuñjissasi,
atk-vin01a:2812_24: Ettha ca kiñcāpi vatthadhovane vā kesacchedane vā bhūmisodhanādinavakamme vā parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ nissajjitabbaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a:2812_25: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā na sakkā etaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ,
atk-vin01a:2812_26: tasmā yathā nissaggiyavatthumhi paribhutte vā naṭṭhe vā pācittiyaṃ deseti,
atk-vin01a:2813_2: so tasmiṃ kayavikkayasaññī vā bhavatu vematiko vā,
atk-vin01a:2813_4: Cūḷattike dvīsu padesu dukkaṭamevāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:2814_1: Agghaṃ pucchatīti “ayaṃ tava patto kiṃ agghatī”ti pucchati.
atk-vin01a:2814_2: “Idaṃ nāmā”ti vutte pana sace tassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ mahagghaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2814_6: Taṃ sutvā itaro “aññaṃ thālakampi dassāmī”ti vadati gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2814_13: Mahagghabhāvaṃ ñatvā vañcetvā gaṇhanto hi gahitabhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā kāretabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin01a:2814_15: sesaṃ mama puññaṃ bhavissatī”ti deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2815_0: Kappiyakārakassa ācikkhatīti yassa hatthato bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-vin01a:2815_1: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ antamaso tassa puttabhātikampi kappiyakārakaṃ katvā “iminā imaṃ nāma gahetvā dehī”ti ācikkhati.
atk-vin01a:2816_0: Idaṃ amhākantiādimhi “idaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ telaṃ vā sappi vā amhākaṃ atthi,
atk-vin01a:2816_2: Sace so taṃ gahetvā aññaṃ deti,
atk-vin01a:2816_3: paṭhamaṃ attano telaṃ na mināpetabbaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:2822_2: Tattha pattavāṇijjanti gāmanigamādīsu vicarantā pattavāṇijjaṃ vā karissanti.
atk-vin01a:2823_1: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇāti tīṇi pattassa pamāṇāni.
atk-vin01a:2823_2: Aḍḍhāḷhakodanaṃ gaṇhātīti magadhanāḷiyā dvinnaṃ taṇḍulanāḷīnaṃ odanaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-vin01a:2823_3: Magadhanāḷi nāma aḍḍhaterasapalā hotīti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2823_7: tāya magadhanāḷiyā diyaḍḍhanāḷi ekā sīhaḷanāḷi hotīti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2823_10: Tadupiyaṃ byañjananti tassa odanassa anurūpaṃ macchamaṃsasākaphalakaḷīrādibyañjanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2824_1: anupahatapurāṇasālitaṇḍulānaṃ sukoṭṭitaparisuddhānaṃ dve magadhanāḷiyo gahetvā tehi taṇḍulehi anuttaṇḍulaṃ
atk-vin01a:2824_2: akilinnaṃ apiṇḍitaṃ suvisadaṃ kundamakuḷarāsisadisaṃ avassāvitodanaṃ pacitvā niravasesaṃ patte pakkhipitvā
atk-vin01a:2824_3: tassa odanassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo nātighano nātitanuko hatthahāriyo sabbasambhārasaṅkhato muggasūpo
atk-vin01a:2824_5: Tato ālopassa ālopassa anurūpaṃ yāvacarimālopappahonakaṃ macchamaṃsādibyañjanaṃ pakkhipitabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2824_9: Evametaṃ sabbampi pakkhittaṃ sace pattassa mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:2824_10: suttena vā hīrena vā chindantassa suttassa vā hīrassa vā heṭṭhimantaṃ phusati,
atk-vin01a:2824_12: Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:2825_4: sace nāḷikodanādi sabbampi pakkhittaṃ vuttanayeneva heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:2825_6: Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:2825_8: Sace taṃ rājiṃ na sampāpuṇāti antogatameva hoti,
atk-vin01a:2825_10: Sace patthodanādi sabbampi pakkhittaṃ heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:2825_12: Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:2825_14: Sace taṃ rājiṃ na pāpuṇāti antogatameva hoti,
atk-vin01a:2825_15: ayaṃ omakukkaṭṭho nāma pattoti evamete nava pattā.
atk-vin01a:2825_16: Tesu dve apattā ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho ca omakomako ca.
atk-vin01a:2825_17: “Tato ukkaṭṭho apatto omako apatto”ti idañhi ete sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2825_18: Ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho hi ettha ukkaṭṭhato ukkaṭṭhattā “tato ukkaṭṭho apatto”ti vutto.
atk-vin01a:2825_19: Omakomako ca omakato omakattā tato omako apattoti vutto.
atk-vin01a:2825_23: Itare pana satta adhiṭṭhahitvā vā vikappetvā vā paribhuñjitabbā,
atk-vin01a:2825_24: evaṃ akatvā taṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti taṃ sattavidhampi pattaṃ dasāhaparamaṃ kālaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2826_1: Nissaggiyaṃ pattaṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjatīti yāguṃ pivitvā dhote dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2826_2: khañjakaṃ khāditvā bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā dhote dukkaṭanti evaṃ payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2827_1: Anāpatti antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vikappetīti ettha pana pamāṇayuttassapi adhiṭṭhānavikappanupagattaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-vin01a:2827_2: ayopatto pañcahi pākehi mattikāpatto dvīhi pākehi pakko adhiṭṭhānupago,
atk-vin01a:2827_8: Sacepi pattasāmiko vadati “yadā tumhākaṃ mūlaṃ bhavissati,
atk-vin01a:2827_11: pākassa hi ūnattā pattasaṅkhaṃ na gacchati,
atk-vin01a:2827_12: mūlassa sakalassa vā ekadesassa vā adinnattā sakabhāvaṃ na upeti,
atk-vin01a:2827_14: tasmā pāke ca mūle ca niṭṭhiteyeva adhiṭṭhānupago hoti.
atk-vin01a:2827_17: so hatthaṃ āgatopi anāgatopi adhiṭṭhātabbo vikappetabbo vā.
atk-vin01a:2827_18: Yadi hi pattakārako mūlaṃ labhitvā sayaṃ vā dātukāmo hutvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:2827_19: tumhākaṃ pattaṃ katvā asukadivase nāma pacitvā ṭhapessāmī”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a:2827_20: bhikkhu ca tena paricchinnadivasato dasāhaṃ atikkāmeti,
atk-vin01a:2827_22: Sace pana pattakārako “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pattaṃ katvā pacitvā sāsanaṃ pesessāmī”ti vatvā tatheva karoti,
atk-vin01a:2827_23: tena pesitabhikkhu pana tassa bhikkhuno na āroceti,
atk-vin01a:2827_24: añño disvā vā sutvā vā “tumhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:2827_28: tassa vacanaṃ sutadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2827_29: Sace pattakārako “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pattaṃ katvā pacitvā kassaci hatthe pahiṇissāmī”ti vatvā tatheva karoti,
atk-vin01a:2827_30: pattaṃ gahetvā āgatabhikkhu pana attano pariveṇe ṭhapetvā tassa na āroceti,
atk-vin01a:2827_32: adhunā ābhato patto sundaro”ti! “Kuhiṃ, āvuso, patto”ti?
atk-vin01a:2827_35: Yadā pana so bhikkhu pattaṃ deti,
atk-vin01a:2827_36: laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2827_37: Tasmā dasāhaṃ anatikkāmetvāva adhiṭṭhātabbo vikappetabbo vā.
atk-vin01a:2828_3: Tesaṃ vasena adhiṭṭhahantena ca “imaṃ pattaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti vā “etaṃ pattaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti vā evaṃ
atk-vin01a:2828_4: sammukhe vā parammukhe vā ṭhitaṃ purāṇapattaṃ paccuddharitvā aññassa vā datvā navaṃ pattaṃ yattha katthaci
atk-vin01a:2828_5: ṭhitaṃ hatthena parāmasitvā “imaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti cittena ābhogaṃ katvā kāyavikāraṃ karontena kāyena
atk-vin01a:2828_9: sace hatthapāse hoti “imaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā.
atk-vin01a:2828_10: Atha antogabbhe vā uparipāsāde vā sāmantavihāre vā hoti,
atk-vin01a:2828_11: ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā “etaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā.
atk-vin01a:2829_6: Sace koci dasa patte labhitvā sabbeva attanāva paribhuñjitukāmo hoti,
atk-vin01a:2829_8: Ekaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāya punadivase taṃ paccuddharitvā añño adhiṭṭhātabbo.
atk-vin01a:2830_0: Evaṃ appamattassa bhikkhuno siyā adhiṭṭhānavijahananti? Siyā.
atk-vin01a:2830_1: Sace hi ayaṃ pattaṃ aññassa vā deti,
atk-vin01a:2833_2: Yena kaṅgusitthaṃ nikkhamati ceva pavisati ca.
atk-vin01a:2833_4: tasmiṃ ayacuṇṇena vā āṇiyā vā paṭipākatike kate dasāhabbhantare puna adhiṭṭhātabbo.
atk-vin01a:2833_5: Ayaṃ tāva “antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vikappetī”ti ettha adhiṭṭhāne vinicchayo.
atk-vin01a:2834_3: Pattānaṃ ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā “imaṃ patta”nti vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ patta”nti
atk-vin01a:2834_4: vā “ete patte”ti vā vatvā “tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2834_7: paribhuñjituṃ vā vissajjetuṃ vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2834_8: “Mayhaṃ santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti evaṃ pana vutte paccuddhāro nāma hoti,
atk-vin01a:2835_1: tatheva pattānaṃ ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā tasseva bhikkhuno santike “imaṃ patta”nti
atk-vin01a:2835_2: vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ patta”nti vā “ete patte”ti vā vatvā pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa attanā
atk-vin01a:2835_3: abhirucitassa yassa kassaci nāmaṃ gahetvā “tissassa bhikkhuno vikappemī”ti vā “tissāya bhikkhuniyā sikkhamānāya
atk-vin01a:2835_4: sāmaṇerassa tissāya sāmaṇeriyā vikappemī”ti vā vattabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2835_9: tissāya sāmaṇeriyā santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti vutte paccuddhāro nāma hoti.
atk-vin01a:2836_1: Pattānaṃ tatheva ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā “imaṃ patta”nti vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ
atk-vin01a:2836_2: patta”nti vā “ete patte”ti vā vatvā “tuyhaṃ vikappanatthāya dammī”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2836_7: Puna tena bhikkhunā “ahaṃ tissassa bhikkhuno dammī”ti vā…pe…
atk-vin01a:2836_12: Tena pana bhikkhunā dutiyasammukhāvikappanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva “itthannāmassa santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi
atk-vin01a:2836_13: vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti vutte paccuddhāro nāma hoti.
atk-vin01a:2837_1: avaseso ca vacanakkamo sabbo paṭhamakathinasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin01a:2840_2: Tattha na yāpetīti so kira yadi ariyasāvako nābhavissā,
atk-vin01a:2840_5: sotāpannattā pana kevalaṃ sarīreneva na yāpeti,
atk-vin01a:2841_1: Ūnapañcabandhanenāti ettha ūnāni pañca bandhanāni assāti ūnapañcabandhano,
atk-vin01a:2841_5: Tattha yasmā abandhanassāpi pañca bandhanāni na pūrenti,
atk-vin01a:2841_8: “Ūnapañcabandhanenā”ti ca vuttattā yassa pañcabandhano patto hoti,
atk-vin01a:2841_11: Bandhanañca nāmetaṃ yasmā bandhanokāse sati hoti,
atk-vin01a:2841_13: tasmā tassa lakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “abandhanokāso nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2842_0: Dvaṅgulā rāji na hotīti mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulappamāṇā ekāpi rāji na hoti.
atk-vin01a:2842_1: Yassa dvaṅgulā rāji hotīti yassa pana tādisā ekā rāji hoti,
atk-vin01a:2842_2: so tassā rājiyā heṭṭhimapariyante pattavedhakena vijjhitvā pacitvā suttarajjuka-
atk-vin01a:2842_4: taṃ bandhanaṃ āmisassa alagganatthaṃ tipupaṭṭakena vā kenaci baddhasilesena vā paṭicchādetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2842_7: Suddhehi pana madhusitthakalākhāsajjulasādīhi bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2842_9: Mukhavaṭṭisamīpe pana pattavedhakena vijjhiyamāno kapālassa bahalattā bhijjati,
atk-vin01a:2842_11: Yassa pana dve rājiyo ekāyeva vā caturaṅgulā,
atk-vin01a:2843_0: Ayopatte pana sacepi pañca vā atirekāni vā chiddāni honti,
atk-vin01a:2843_1: tāni ce ayacuṇṇena vā āṇiyā vā lohamaṇḍalakena vā baddhāni maṭṭhāni honti,
atk-vin01a:2843_4: Atha pana ekampi chiddaṃ mahantaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2844_1: Thero vattabboti patte ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:2844_4: Yo na gaṇheyyāti anukampāya na gaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2844_5: Yo pana santuṭṭhiyā “kiṃ me aññena pattenā”ti na gaṇhāti,
atk-vin01a:2846_0: Na abhogenāti yāgurandhanarajanapacanādinā aparibhogena na paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-vin01a:2846_1: Antarāmagge pana byādhimhi uppanne aññasmiṃ bhājane asati mattikāya limpetvā yāguṃ vā pacituṃ udakaṃ vā tāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2847_1: Sace pana saddhivihāriko vā antevāsiko vā aññaṃ varapattaṃ ṭhapetvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ sāruppo,
atk-vin01a:2847_3: Añño vā taṃ gahetvā attano pattaṃ deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2848_1: Pavāritānanti ettha saṅghavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne pañcabandhaneneva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2848_2: Puggalavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne ūnapañcabandhanenāpi vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2852_3: bhanteti rājā bhikkhū uyyuttappayutte therassa leṇatthāya pabbhāraṃ sodhente disvā ārāmikaṃ dātukāmo pucchi.
atk-vin01a:2853_6: Sā ahosi suvaṇṇamālāti dārikāya sīse ṭhapitamattāyeva therassa adhiṭṭhānavasena suvaṇṇapadumamālā ahosi.
atk-vin01a:2853_7: Tañhi tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ sīse ṭhapitamattameva “suvaṇṇamālā hotū”ti thero adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:2854_3: Kolambepi ghaṭepītiettha kolambā nāma mahāmukhacāṭiyo vuccanti.
atk-vin01a:2854_4: Olīnavilīnānīti heṭṭhā ca ubhatopassesu ca gaḷitāni.
atk-vin01a:2854_5: Okiṇṇavikiṇṇāti sappiādīnaṃ gandhena bhūmiṃ khanantehi okiṇṇā,
atk-vin01a:2854_6: bhittiyo khanantehi upari sañcarantehi ca vikiṇṇā.
atk-vin01a:2855_3: Bhesajjānīti bhesajjakiccaṃ karontu vā mā vā,
atk-vin01a:2855_5: “Gosappī”tiādīhi loke pākaṭaṃ dassetvā “yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti iminā aññesampi migarohitasasādīnaṃ sappiṃ saṅgahetvā dassesi.
atk-vin01a:2855_8: taṃ pana sulabhaṃ vā hotu dullabhaṃ vā,
atk-vin01a:2856_0: Sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbānīti sannidhiṃ katvā nidahitvā paribhuñjitabbāni. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a:2856_1: Pāḷiyā āgatasappiādīsu sappi tāva purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisampi nirāmisampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2856_7: Purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittaṃ ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭati;
atk-vin01a:2856_12: Sace anupasampanno purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitanavanītena sappiṃ katvā deti,
atk-vin01a:2856_16: Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitanavanītena pana yena kenaci katasappi sattāhampi nirāmisameva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2856_17: Uggahitakena kate pubbe vuttasuddhasappinayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:2857_0: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīrena vā dadhinā vā katasappi anupasampannena kataṃ sāmisampi tadahupurebhattaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2857_2: Navanītaṃ tāpentassa hi sāmaṃpāko na hoti,
atk-vin01a:2857_3: sāmaṃpakkena pana tena saddhiṃ āmisaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2857_8: Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitehi kataṃ pana abbhañjanādīsu upanetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2857_9: Purebhattampi ca uggahitakehi kataṃ ubhayesampi sattāhātikkame anāpatti.
atk-vin01a:2857_14: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvā manussasappi ca navanītañca paṭikkhittaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2858_0: Pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ navanītampi purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2858_2: Sattāhātikkame nānābhājanesu ṭhapite bhājanagaṇanāya ekabhājanepi amissetvā piṇḍapiṇḍavasena ṭhapite piṇḍagaṇanāya nissaggiyāni.
atk-vin01a:2858_5: tasmā taṃ dhotaṃ vaṭṭatīti upaḍḍhattherā āhaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:2858_6: Mahāsīvatthero pana “bhagavatā anuññātakālato paṭṭhāya takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsū”ti āha.
atk-vin01a:2858_7: Tasmā navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena dhovitvā dadhitakkamakkhikākipillikādīni apanetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2858_8: Pacitvā sappiṃ katvā paribhuñjitukāmena adhotampi pacituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2858_9: Yaṃ tattha dadhigataṃ vā takkagataṃ vā taṃ khayaṃ gamissati,
atk-vin01a:2858_10: ettāvatā hi savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-vin01a:2858_11: Āmisena saddhiṃ pakkattā pana tasmimpi kukkuccāyanti kukkuccakā.
atk-vin01a:2858_12: Idāni uggahetvā ṭhapitanavanīte ca purebhattaṃ khīradadhīni paṭiggahetvā katanavanīte ca pacchābhattaṃ
atk-vin01a:2858_13: tāni paṭiggahetvā katanavanīte ca uggahitehi katanavavīte ca akappiyamaṃsanavanīte ca sabbo āpattānāpattiparibhogāparibhoganayo
atk-vin01a:2859_0: Telabhikkhāya paviṭṭhānaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ tattheva sappimpi navanītampi pakkatelampi apakkatelampi ākiranti,
atk-vin01a:2859_1: tattha takkadadhibindūnipi bhattasitthānipi taṇḍulakaṇāpi makkhikādayopi honti.
atk-vin01a:2859_2: Ādiccapākaṃ katvā parissāvetvā gahitaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2859_3: paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitabhesajjehi saddhiṃ pacitvā natthupānampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2859_4: Sace vaddalisamaye lajji sāmaṇero yathā tattha patitataṇḍulakaṇādayo na paccanti,
atk-vin01a:2859_5: evaṃ sāmisapākaṃ mocento aggimhi vilīyāpetvā parissāvetvā puna pacitvā deti,
atk-vin01a:2860_0: Telesu tilatelaṃ tāva purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2860_4: Uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittaṃ ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2860_7: Purebhattaṃ tile paṭiggahetvā katatelaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2860_15: Purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā uggahitakatilehi katatelepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a:2861_0: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitakatile bhajjitvā vā tilapiṭṭhaṃ vā sedetvā uṇhodakena vā temetvā katatelaṃ sace

atk-vin01a:2901_11: Sace pana ekāhadvīhādivasena yāva dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya antovasse vā laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca,

atk-vin01a:2902_0: Tattha siyā “vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti vacanato “cātumāsabbhantare yadā vā tadā vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.

atk-vin01a:2916_5: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “yāva pariyosānaṃ vāyāpentassa phalake phalake nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2916_6: Tampi idameva pamāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2917_5: Tattha akappiyasuttaṃ akappiyatantavāyena vāyāpentassa pubbe vuttanayena nissaggiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2917_6: Teneva pana kappiyasuttaṃ vāyāpentassa yathā pubbe nissaggiyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2917_8: Teneva kappiyaṃ akappiyañca suttaṃ vāyāpentassa yadi pacchimacīvarappamāṇena eko paricchedo suddhakappiyasuttamayo,
atk-vin01a:2917_9: eko akappiyasuttamayoti evaṃ kedārabaddhaṃ viya cīvaraṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2917_15: Atha ekantarikena vā suttena dīghato vā kappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ akappiyaṃ katvā vītaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2917_17: Kappiyatantavāyenapi akappiyasuttaṃ vāyāpentassa yathā pubbe nissaggiyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2917_19: Teneva kappiyañca akappiyañca suttaṃ vāyāpentassa sace pacchimacīvarappamāṇā ūnakā vā akappiyasuttaparicchedā honti,
atk-vin01a:2917_22: Atha ekantarikena vā suttena dīghato vā kappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ akappiyaṃ katvā vītaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2918_7: Sace dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā ekato vinanti,
atk-vin01a:2918_13: Sace dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā ekato vinanti,
atk-vin01a:2918_17: akappiyatantavāyena akappiyasuttamayesu pacchimacīvarappamāṇesu paricchedesu vītesu paricchedagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2918_19: Kappiyatantavāyena akappiyasuttamayesu pamāṇayuttesu vā ūnakesu vā dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin01a:2919_0: Atha ekantarikena vā suttena dīghato vā akappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ kappiyaṃ katvā vinanti,
atk-vin01a:2919_1: ubhopi vā te vemaṃ gahetvā ekato vinanti,
atk-vin01a:2920_1: tantavāyopi kappiyo ñātakappavārito vā mūlena vā payojito,
atk-vin01a:2920_3: Dasāhātikkamanapaccayā pana āpattiṃ rakkhantena vikappanupagappamāṇamatte vīte tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2920_6: idaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti niyyātitepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a:2921_0: Sace tantavāyo evaṃ payojito vā sayaṃ dātukāmo vā hutvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:2921_1: tumhākaṃ cīvaraṃ asukadivase nāma vāyitvā ṭhapessāmī”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a:2921_2: bhikkhu ca tena paricchinnadivasato dasāhaṃ atikkāmeti,
atk-vin01a:2922_0: Sace pana tantavāyo “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ cīvaraṃ vāyitvā sāsanaṃ pesessāmī”ti vatvā tatheva karoti,
atk-vin01a:2922_1: tena pesitabhikkhu pana tassa bhikkhuno na āroceti,
atk-vin01a:2922_2: añño disvā vā sutvā vā “tumhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:2922_6: tassa vacanaṃ sutadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2923_0: Sace tantavāyo “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ cīvaraṃ vāyitvā kassaci hatthe pahiṇissāmī”ti vatvā tatheva karoti,
atk-vin01a:2923_1: cīvaraṃ gahetvā gatabhikkhu pana attano pariveṇe ṭhapetvā tassa na āroceti,
atk-vin01a:2923_7: Yadā pana so bhikkhu cīvaraṃ deti,
atk-vin01a:2923_8: laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2924_1: Anāpatti cīvaraṃ sibbetunti cīvarasibbanatthāya suttaṃ viññāpentassa anāpattīti attho.
atk-vin01a:2928_2: Tattha suttaṃ dhārayitvāti suttaṃ tuletvā palaparicchedaṃ katvā.
atk-vin01a:2928_6: Suppavāyitanti suṭṭhu pavāyitaṃ sabbaṭṭhānesu samaṃ katvā tante pasāritaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2928_11: Tanteti tante dīghato pasāraṇeyeva upanetvāti attho.
atk-vin01a:2929_1: Tatra ce so bhikkhūti yatra gāme vā nigame vā te tantavāyā tatra.
atk-vin01a:2929_2: Vikappaṃ āpajjeyyāti visiṭṭhaṃ kappaṃ adhikavidhānaṃ āpajjeyya.
atk-vin01a:2929_3: Pāḷiyaṃ pana yenākārena vikappaṃ āpanno hoti,
atk-vin01a:2930_1: “tassa vacanena āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā”ti suttavaḍḍhanaākārameva dasseti.
atk-vin01a:2931_0: Pubbe appavāritoti cīvarasāmikehi pubbe appavārito hutvā. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-vin01a:2932_0: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2936_8: Pavāraṇāyāti idaṃ pana yā sā dasāhānāgatāti vuttā,
atk-vin01a:2937_1: Idhāpi paṭhamapadassa anupayogattā purimanayeneva bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2937_4: sacepi tāni divasāni accantameva bhikkhuno accekacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya,
atk-vin01a:2937_6: Tena pavāraṇāmāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭhāya uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito hoti.
atk-vin01a:2937_8: atthuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2938_1: tassa pana accāyikabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “senāya vā gantukāmo hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2938_4: Etaṃ accekacīvaraṃ nāmāti etaṃ imehi kāraṇehi dātukāmena dūtaṃ vā pesetvā sayaṃ vā āgantvā “vassāvāsikaṃ
atk-vin01a:2938_5: dassāmī”ti evaṃ ārocitaṃ cīvaraṃ accekacīvaraṃ nāma hotī.
atk-vin01a:2938_6: Chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi paccuddharitvā ṭhapitacīvarampi etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyeva.
atk-vin01a:2939_0: Saññāṇaṃ katvā nikkhipitabbanti kiñci nimittaṃ katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2939_2: Yadi hi taṃ pure pavāraṇāya vibhajanti.
atk-vin01a:2940_1: Accekacīvare accekacīvarasaññīti evamādi vibhajitvā gahitameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2940_6: Akatassa vassikasāṭikacīvarassa anatthate kathine pañca māsā,
atk-vin01a:2940_9: Hemantassa pacchime divase mūlacīvarādhiṭṭhānavasena aparopi eko māsoti ekādasa māsā parihāro.
atk-vin01a:2940_13: tato paraṃ ekadivasampi parihāro natthīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2945_2: Tattha vutthavassā āraññakesūti te pubbepi araññeyeva vihariṃsu.
atk-vin01a:2945_3: Dubbalacīvarattā pana paccayavasena gāmantasenāsane vassaṃ vasitvā niṭṭhitacīvarā hutvā “idāni nippalibodhā
atk-vin01a:2945_9: Bhagavā yasmā paccayā nāma dhammena samena dullabhā,
atk-vin01a:2945_10: sallekhavā hi bhikkhu mātarampi viññāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-vin01a:2945_12: Bhikkhūnaṃ pana anurūpattā araññavāsaṃ na paṭikkhipi.
atk-vin01a:2946_1: Upavassaṃ kho panāti ettha upavassanti upavassa;
atk-vin01a:2946_3: Upasampajjantiādīsu viya hi ettha anunāsiko daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:2946_5: Imassa ca padassa “tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto”ti iminā sambandho.
atk-vin01a:2946_7: Vassaṃ upagantvā vasitvā ca tato paraṃ pacchimakattikapuṇṇamapariyosānakālaṃ yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni sāsaṅkasammatāni sappaṭibhayāni;
atk-vin01a:2946_8: tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto ākaṅkhamāno tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipeyyāti.
atk-vin01a:2946_9: Yasmā pana yo vassaṃ upagantvā yāva paṭhamakattikapuṇṇamaṃ vasati,
atk-vin01a:2946_11: tasmā idaṃ atigahanaṃ byañjanavicāraṇaṃ akatvā padabhājane kevalaṃ cīvaranikkhepārahaṃ puggalaṃ dassetuṃ “vuṭṭhavassāna”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2946_13: Ayañhi ettha attho “vuṭṭhavassānaṃ bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto”ti evarūpānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abbhantare yo koci bhikkhūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:2947_3: parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīlato aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva vihāraparikkhepā minitabbaṃ.

atk-vin01a:2950_0: Samantā gocaragāme nikkhipeyyāti āraññakassa senāsanassa samantā sabbadisābhāgesu attanā abhirucite gocaragāme satiyā aṅgasampattiyā nikkhipeyya.
atk-vin01a:2951_3: Sace pacchimikāya vā upagato hoti chinnavasso vā,

atk-vin01a:2953_0: Puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvāti sace gocaragāmato puratthimāya disāya senāsanaṃ;
atk-vin01a:2953_2: senāsanaṃ āgantvā sattamaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontena gāmasīmampi okkamitvā sabhāyaṃ vā yattha katthaci
atk-vin01a:2953_3: vā vasitvā cīvarappavattiṃ ñatvā pakkamituṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
atk-vin01a:2957_5: Bahū saṅghassa bhattāti saṅghassa bahūni bhattāni anekāni lābhamukhāni;
atk-vin01a:2957_8: Kiṃ panevaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti kasmā na vaṭṭati?
atk-vin01a:2957_9: Ayañhi abhihaṭabhikkhā abhiharitvā ekasmiṃ okāse saṅghassatthāya paṭiyattā abhihaṭapaṭiyatte ca uddissa ṭhapitabhāge ca payuttavācā nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a:2958_2: So hi saṅghassa pariṇatattā hatthaṃ anārūḷhopi ekena pariyāyena saṅghassa santako hoti,
atk-vin01a:2958_3: padabhājane pana “saṅghikaṃ nāma saṅghassa dinnaṃ hoti pariccatta”nti evaṃ atthuddhāravasena nippariyāyatova saṅghikaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2958_6: Pariṇatanti saṅghassa ninnaṃ saṅghassa poṇaṃ saṅghassa pabbhāraṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2958_7: Yena pana kāraṇena so pariṇato hoti,
atk-vin01a:2958_8: taṃ dassetuṃ “dassāma karissāmāti vācā bhinnā hotī”ti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2959_1: Payoge dukkaṭanti pariṇatalābhassa attano pariṇāmanapayoge dukkaṭaṃ,

atk-vin01a:2959_9: ñatvā attano pariṇāmetvā gaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2959_10: “Imassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti evaṃ aññassa pariṇāmentassa suddhikapācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2959_11: Ekaṃ pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā attano,
atk-vin01a:2963_1: Yopi vassikasāṭikasamaye mātugharepi saṅghassa pariṇataṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ ñatvā attano pariṇāmeti,

atk-vin01a:2965_0: Cetiyassa vāti “kiṃ saṅghassa dinnena, cetiyassapūjaṃ karothā”ti evaṃ cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti.
